description.hltext_display: Corona In-N-Out to be demolished, replaced
description.author: BRIAN ROKOSThe Press-Enterprise
description.content:
Get your Double Doubles while you can.
When In-N-Out built its cozy 14-seat restaurant in Corona in 1970, the population of the city was 27,384, according to U.S. Census data. Now, with 150,253 potential customers living in town, the restaurant at the corner of Auto Center Drive and Wardlow Road just doesn't cut it anymore. So sometime next year, bulldozers will demolish the 1,639-square-foot building, and four to five months later, a 77-seat restaurant more than twice its size will replace it. The twin drive-thru lanes will be replaced by a single lane that will wrap around the building.
The Corona Planning Commission approved the proposal Monday, and the City Council still must sign off on the project.
When that happens, anyone not inclined to drive to southern Corona, Norco or Riverside for In-N-Out's iconic hamburgers will have to endure withdrawal during construction. "It's going to put a damper on things," Jeff Charland, the service manager across the street at Cardinale Way Hyundai, said Friday.
Charland walks over to In-N-Out twice a week, usually ordering the Double Double. Sometimes he orders off the secret menu, choosing the Animal Fries that are topped by the burger sauce, onions and cheese.
Joe Ayala and some friends were standing outside in mist and cold Friday eating their hamburgers "because there's nowhere to sit inside," he said. Ayala was glad to hear the new restaurant will have five times the seating.
"That would be nice, especially on days like this," he said.
In-N-Out had considered keeping the restaurant open during construction.
"The size and scope of the project made that impossible," Carl Van Fleet, vice president of planning and development, wrote in an e-mail.
The company is able to build a 3,750-square-foot replacement on 1 acre after purchasing the adjacent land. Van Fleet said the new design will allow cars to move through the drive-thru lane more quickly. Currently, cars sometimes back up onto Wardlow. Only 33 of the chain's 240 restaurants have two drive-thru lanes, Van Fleet said. He said he didn't know when construction will start.
The Planning Commission on Monday also allowed In-N-Out to build a 70-foot-tall sign that is 30 feet higher than what zoning rules allow. The current sign is 41 feet high, according to a staff report.

description.hltext_display: Emporté par le vent, il chute du toit
description.content:
Fernand Garcia était en train de poser les premières tôles du toit lorsque le vent l'a déséquilibré./ Photo DDM, JLBibal
Fernand Garcia, 60 ans, ne passera pas Noël en famille. Un coup de vent lui a été fatal, hier, sur le chantier de Conforama démarré depuis un mois, zone de la Ferraudière. Le chef d'équipe de la société narbonnaise SE-2000, spécialisée dans la couverture étanche et le bardage avait rallié le site, le matin même, pour commencer à recouvrir de tôle la carcasse d'acier hérissée de pylônes. La veille, ses collègues avaient installé les filets de protection. Pour sécuriser les abords du bâtiment en construction, il lui fallait d'abord poser quelques tôles. Une opération délicate qu'il avait accomplie maintes et maintes fois, en dix ans de poste à la SE-2000.
Avec un camarade, perché à sept mètres de hauteur, il était tout à sa tâche lorsqu'une rafale l'a surpris, soulevant violemment une tôle. Emporté, il a chuté. « C'est allé si vite… On était en train de monter le mur lorsqu'on l'a vu à terre », raconte un maçon. Le collègue de Fernand Garcia a pu se raccrocher à un élément de la toiture. Pas le couvreur en chef. Ni l'un ni l'autre n'étaient harnachés.
Grièvement blessé à la tête et au torse, le chef d'équipe a été pris e n charge par les pompiers et le Samu. Évacué au centre hospitalier de Carcassonne, il n'a pas survécu à ses blessures.
Il vivait à Maraussan dans l'Hérault. Il laisse une femme et deux grands enfants.

description.hltext_display: Kako preživjeti sve veće cijene i niži standard: "Klas" pokrenuo lavinu poskupljenja hljeba
description.content:
Povećanje cijena utjecat će na standard 50 posto stanovništva u BiH, kažu u Udruženju za zaštitu potrošača KS
Veličina slova:
M. Avdić 22/12/2010 07:00:00
Poskupljenje hljeba najviše će osjetiti penzioneri i nezaposleni
Informacija da je sarajevska kompanija „Klas“, u vlasništvu Hilme i Muje Selimovića, povećala cijenu hljeba za 15 posto, izazvala je pravu lavinu novih najava o poskupljenjima. Tako su jučer i iz Udruženja pekarskih obrtnika FBiH najavili da će uskoro i mali pekari povećati cijene hljeba.
Svjetsko tržište
- Stanje na svjetskom tržištu i poskupljenje brašna, šećera, ulja i nafte ne ostavlja nam ništa drugo nego da povećamo cijene - kazao nam je Sead Đipa, predsjednik Udruženja.
Narednih 15 do mjesec dana hljeb će poskupjeti i u manjem entitetu, potvrdio je za „Avaz“ predsjednik Udruženja pekara RS Saša Trivić.
- Cijena brašna u posljednjih šest mjeseci sa 0,42 KM povećana je na više od 70 feninga po kilogramu. No, prošle godine imali smo sličnu situaciju kao sada i čim je pojeftinilo brašno, mi smo snizili i cijene hljeba - navodi Trivić.
U Udruženju za zaštitu interesa potrošača KS upozoravaju da će poskupljenje hljeba utjecati na standard skoro 50 posto stanovništva u BiH.
Kupovna moć
- Najteže će biti penzionerima i nezaposlenima, koji će, da bi kupili hljeb, morati štedjeti na drugim stvarima. Možda se ne čini povezanim, ali smatram da uskoro možemo očekivati povećanje dugovanja za komunalije, kao i povećanje cijena u ugostiteljskim objektima - kazao nam je Mesud Lakota, sekretar Udruženja.
S ovom ocjenom slažu se i u Pkretu potrošača RS te ističu da proizvođači nisu dobro procijenili stanje u zemlji i kupovnu moć stanovništva.
- Želje proizvođača hljeba su nerealne i pitanje je koliko će moći biti realizirane. Smatram da će zbog ovog povećanja mnogi od njih morati staviti ključ u bravu - smatra Dragovan Petrović, sekretar Pokreta.
Radivojević traži reakciju inspektora
Federalni ministar trgovine Desnica Radivojević tražit će od nadležnih inspekcija da kontroliraju proizvođače i trgovce kako bi ih spriječili da prekorače zakonske marže na hljeb i brašno.
- S obzirom na to da će poskupljenje hljeba biti veliki udar na standard socijalno ugroženih kategorije, na današnjoj sjednici Vlade tražit ću da najugrožniji dobiju pakete s osnovnim namirnicama iz robnih rezervi. Nažalost, u Federalnoj direkciji robnih rezervi nemamo dovoljno pšenice da bismo mogli znatnije stabilizirati tržište brašna i hljeba u Federaciji - objašnjava Radivojević u izjavi za „Avaz“.
Skuplje i u Tuzli
Da će i stanovnici Tuzlanskog kantona od 1. januara naredne godine jesti skuplji hljeb, potvrdio nam je jučer Raif Brkić, predsjednik Grupacije proizvođača pekarskih proizvoda i tjestenina tog kantona, koja okuplja oko 300 pekara. Prema njegovim riječima, bijeli hljeb od 350 grama sa sadašnjih 70 feninga poskupjet će na 0,80 KM.
Cijene hljeba u regionu
Država Cijena hljeba (1 kg)
BiH (FBiH) 2,01
BiH (RS) 2,00

description.hltext_display: Quick Payday Loans Online...
description.content:
Payday Loans are small, short-term loans that destined to cover your expenses until your next payday. They are also called online cash advance or personal loans and are increasingly popular in the United States.
No matter how sharp is one's budget planning skill there will always be uncertainty and unexpected bills to pay - such as a car repairing bill, medical bill or a utility bill.
It is proven that payday loans are in fact cheaper than bounced checks fees or utility cut-offs.
Benefits of instant payday loans are:
* Safe & Secure - Online application process
* Fast Cash Advance Delivery - Wired to Your Bank Online, in max.24hours
* Instant Approval - Instant loan decisions without credit checks or faxing.
* No Obligation Application - Up-front fee disclosures before loan commitment.
Don't forget that fast cash advance is a short-term type of loan and as such, it is just normal for it to have higher interest rates as compared to other types of personal loan. Problems regarding the payment will only arise if the person fails to pay the payday loan on the agreed upon date. This will cause for the interest to accumulate.

description.hltext_display: Predsjedavajući Vijeća ministara BiH Nikola � pirić svojoj savjetnici sredio dvije direktorske pozicije
description.content:
Predsjedavajući Vijeća ministara BiH Nikola Špirić proteklih je dana načinio kadrovsku vratolomiju nezabilježenu u poslijeratnoj BiH. Kako saznaje „Avaz“, Špirić je uz pomoć kolega državnih ministara svojoj savjetnici Sanji Jokić u svega tridesetak dana sredio dvije direktorske pozicije!? Špirićeva savjetnica najprije je 18. novembra na sjednici Vijeća ministara imenovana za zamjenika direktora Agencije za rad i zapošljavanje BiH. No, što je sigurno - sigurno, šef Špirić svoju savjetnicu istovremeno je držao i na konkursu za direktora Službe za zajedničke poslove institucija BiH!
Nakon što je Jokić „prošla“ i na drugom konkursu, ispostavilo se da je više ne zadovoljava čelno mjesto u Agenciji. Sada se, naime, želi domoći pozicije u instituciji koju zovu zlatna koka, s obzirom na to da se u Službi za zajedničke poslove vrte ogromne pare i da preko nje prolaze svi tenderi i nabavke za Vijeće ministara.
U svom pismu Vijeću ministara, poslanom 13. decembra, Sanja Jokić zahtijeva razrješenje s funkcije zamjenika direktora Agencije za rad i zapošljavanje, iako je na tu poziciju tek imenovana, da bi mogla preuzeti direktorsku poziciju u Službi za zajedničke poslove?!
- Molim vas da prijedlog za donošenje Rješenja o razrješenju s navedene funkcije uvrstite na narednu sjednicu Savjeta ministara BiH navodi, između ostalog Jokić u svom nesvakidašnjem pismu.
Zahvalnica“ Draganu Saviću
„Avaz“ je došao i u posjed dokumenta (Mišljenje komisije Agencije za državnu službu nakon provednih ispita za direktora Službe za zajedničke poslove) iz kojeg se vidi da je iz utrke za direktorsku poziciju u Službi otpao Dragan Savić, Špirićev dugogodišnji čovjek od povjerenja u ovoj instituciji. Tako se Špirić zbog savjetnice na kraju svog mandata na neslavan način „odužio“ čovjeku koji mu je, kako se priča u kuloarima Vijeća ministara, „zaposlio pola familije“.
Direktori Jokić, Jahjaefendić i Brković
Uz Srpkinju Sanju Jokić, buduću direktorsku postavu Službe za zajedničke poslove institucija BiH trebali bi činiti i Bošnjakinja Meliha Jahjaefendić (drugi mandat) te Hrvat Dragan Brković (također drugi mandat). U Službi se, inače, direktor i zamjenici, koji su iz tri konstitutivna naroda, rotiraju svakih osam mjeseci, kao u Predsjedništvu BiH.

description.hltext_display: Krah omiljenog partnera Federalne vlade: Slovenska kompanija SCT pred bankrotom!
description.content:
Izgradnja dva velika projekta u BiH kasnit će nekoliko godina
Veličina slova:
G. Mrkić 22/12/2010 07:30:00
Koridor 5C: Dugogodišnja kašnjenja zbog lošeg izbora partnera
Ono na šta „Dnevni avaz“ upozorava već godinu - da slovenska građevinska kompanija SCT neće moći realizirati velike projekte na izgradnji autoputa u BiH, sada je potvrđeno.
Ogromni dugovi
Kako su javili slovenski mediji, ova firma nalazi se na rubu propasti. Riječ je o omiljenom partneru Federalne vlade, koji je u našoj zemlji dobivao najunosnije poslove. Dnevnik.si piše da SCT- u zbog sve većih dugova, koji trenutno iznose 200 miliona eura, prijeti odlazak u stečaj. Navode da je firma nagomilala ogromne dugove prema izvođačima radova u BiH, a da je slična situacija i na drugim tržištima.
Navodno, Uprava SCT-a već izrađuje program prisilnog poravnanja dugova, zbog čega bi bez posla moglo ostati 1.000 radnika. Dnevnik ističe da su za neke firme u grupaciji već predloženi stečajni postupci.
- Zbog velikih finansijskih problema SCT nije uspio osigurati bankovne garancije za dogovorene poslove u Libiji, a u pitanje su došli i cestovni projekti u BiH - prenosi portal poslovni.hr.
Slovenski stručnjaci slažu se da ovu kompaniju čeka skori krah. Profesor iz Ljubljane Jože Damijan kazao je da je „bankrot SCT-a sada još samo pitanje sata“.
Projekti u BiH
SCT u našoj zemlji realizira dva velika projekta na koridoru 5C, oba vrijedna po 110 miliona maraka. Jedan je prva dionica sarajevske zaobilazice, gdje je ostalo da se uradi još oko 25 posto posla, a radovi su trebali biti okončani još u oktobru. Drugi je tunel Vijenac, između Kaknja i Zenice, čije probijanje Slovenci nisu ni počeli, iako rok teče od 2. avgusta. Za završetak ovih projekata morat će se izabrati novi izvođač, a to je procedura koja traje oko pola godine. Zbog toga će, uz dosadašnja kašnjenja SCT-a, izgradnja ovih dijelova autoputa kasniti možda i nekoliko godina.
Dva zaposlena
Podsjetimo, „Avaz“ je prošle sedmice objavio da je ova firma u BiH potpuno krahirala i da u našoj zemlji trenutno ima samo dva zaposlena. Također, javili smo da su radovi na dva gradilišta u BiH potpuno obustavljeni, a da Slovenci našim kooperantima duguju najmanje devet miliona maraka.

description.hltext_display: Nakon povećanja plata: Ogromne naknade za odvojeni život i smještaj u Vladi FBiH
description.content:
Uredba usvojena na prošloj sjednici Vlade FBiH u Mostaru, mimo dnevnog reda
Veličina slova:
M. Kukan 22/12/2010 08:00:00
Vlada FBiH: Nezajažljivost ni u tehničkom mandatu nema kraja
Nakon što je prije mjesec na vanrednoj telefonskoj sjednici Vlada Federacije BiH u tehničkom mandatu izglasala novu osnovicu za obračun plaća u organima vlasti FBiH, povećavši plaće ministrima, poslanicima, premijeru, predsjednici i potpredsjednicima većeg bh. entiteta i za više od 600 maraka, prošle sedmice tajno je donijela i najnoviju uredbu kojom se dodatno enormno povećavaju njihova primanja.
Ko je bio protiv
Kako saznaje „Dnevni avaz“, na samom kraju prošlosedmične sjednice u Mostaru Vlada je mimo dnevnog reda usvojila Uredbu o naknadama članovima Vlade FBiH i njihovim savjetnicima koje nemaju karakter plaća. Riječ je o enormnim naknadama za odvojeni život od porodice, zatim za zakup stana za službene potrebe te troškove smještaja, koje će primati članovi Vlade i njihovi savjetnici, a kojih je na desetine, s obzirom na to da premijer, njegovi zamjenici i svaki ministar imaju i po nekoliko savjetnika.
Prema našim saznanjima, protiv ove uredbe na sjednici Vlade glasali su tek premijer FBiH Mustafa Mujezinović i njegov zamjenik Gavrilo Grahovac, a vrijedi spomenuti da se radi o ljudima koji žive u Sarajevu, gdje je i sjedište Vlade, i svakako ne bi imali pravo na ove vrste naknada. Donošenje ovakve uredbe još je skandaloznije kada se zna da su federalne vlasti prije nekoliko mjeseci, pod izgovorom zahtjeva MMF-a i potrebe ujednačavanja propisa o plaćama budžetskih korisnika, donijele Zakon o plaćama i naknadama u organima vlasti FBiH.
Stvaranje šarenila
Predstavnici vlasti tvrdili su da će se upravo tim zakonom eliminirati svi ostali propisi i odluke koje su u ovoj oblasti stvarale šarenilo i netransparentnost u visini plaća i naknada funkcionerima. Tim zakonom, osim osnovnih plaća, uređene su i naknade za topli obrok, godišnji odmor, plaćeni dopust i službena putovanja. No, uporište za najnoviju uredbu Vlada je našla u članu 13. Zakona, prema kojem će izabrani dužnosnici, nosioci izvršnih funkcija i savjetnici koji borave izvan mjesta prebivališta svoje porodice, a koje je udaljeno više od 70 kilometara od sjedišta institucije, imati pravo na ove naknade. Ne treba sumnjati da će takvu uredbu donijeti i administrativne komisije Parlamenta FBiH kako bi iste prinadležnosti imali i parlamentarci.
Uhljebljenje savjetnika
Naš list doznaje i da je za današnju sjednicu Vlade predviđeno rješavanje statusa brojnih savjetnika, koje će njihovi ministri pokušati uhljebiti kao državne službenike u ministarstvima kako ne bi ostali bez posla nakon formiranja nove izvršne vlasti u FBiH.
Visina novih naknada
ČLANOVI VLADE
500 KM - naknada za odvojeni život članovima Vlade FBiH čije je mjesto prebivališta udaljeno više od 70 kilometara od sjedišta institucije u kojoj rade
500 KM - za zakup stana za one koji nemaju osiguran službeni smještaj
200 KM - dodatna suma za naknadu troškova smještaja
500 KM - naknada za smještaj za one koji imaju osiguran službeni smještaj
SAVJETNICI
400 KM - naknada za odvojeni život savjetnicima čije je mjesto prebivališta udaljeno više od 70 kilometara od sjedišta institucije u kojoj rade
300 KM - naknada za zakup za savjetnike koji nemaju osiguran službeni smještaj
200 KM - naknada savjetnicima koji imaju osiguran smještaj, ali za njega plaćaju sve troškove

description.hltext_display: 《婆婆来了》即将上星 沙溢诠释80后“凤凰男”
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
沙溢挑战凤凰男
由沙溢等实力派演员领衔主演的家庭伦理剧《婆婆来了》，是一部反应现实生活中婆媳关系的电视剧，即将在浙江卫视独家上星播出。该剧正在全国各地方频道热播，收视率一路攀升，深受广大观众的喜爱。婆媳大战再次上演，沙溢此次挑战备受夹板儿气的“凤凰男”王传志，深切感受男人不好做。
从农村考入名牌大学的沙溢与富家女何琳一见钟情，私定终身，本以为由此将开始幸福甜蜜生活的小两口，却因为农村婆婆的到来打破一切，从此矛盾重重、冲突不断。夹在其中的沙溢倍感艰难，深有感触地道出了很多男人的心声：“一边是自己的妈妈，肯定是说不得的，另一边是自己深爱的老婆，也舍不得大骂，所以我整天只能低头叹气，需要一个出口了，真的是憋得太难受了。”沙溢凭借其真实细腻的表演、朴实忠厚的扮相，淋漓尽致的塑造了一个极具代表性的80后“凤凰男”形象。
该剧不同于以往讲述婆媳大战的家庭伦理剧，将视野放得更宽，触及到城市对城市、城市对农村、农村对农村三种不同形态的婆媳关系。生活环境、生活习惯、地方习俗等完全不相同的婆媳相处之道，都反映出这些普遍生活会广泛出现，比较现实的婚姻生活问题。该剧在地方台热播时，深受观众喜爱，不论是50后还是到80后都能在剧中找到属于自己的角色。《婆婆老了》即将作为浙江卫视2011年的开年大戏，于明年1月6日在浙江卫视独家上星播出，必将引起更大一轮的影响和关注。

description.hltext_display: Enjoy Prepaid ? getting ready to designate its new winners
description.content:
Getting a chance to win is easier than one may think: it’s enough to complete the form on either of their websites (www.EnjoyPrepaid.com or www.NobelCom.com) and participants have one chance in the draw; a chance can also be obtained with a new purchase or recharge, on either of the two websites.
But the dream vacation if not the only gift Nobel is offering: customers can also win free calling cards, laptops or camcorders in the monthly and quarterly draws. And this comes as an added bonus to the services the company is offering.
EnjoyPrepaid has been on the market for a long time and has maintained its high standards as far as quality and reliability are concerned and they seem to be constantly improving their products by adding new features. The latest one is "Call Me" and is part of the customer support service: customers simply dial 1-760-208-1108, wait for the prompt and hung up. An EnjoyPrepaid customer support representative returns the call within moments.
And also, for over a year now, Nobel has kept up a Facebook page where they share news about their products and also give out information on discount codes, so this might be helpful for anyone who’s interested in being up to date with what the company is doing.

description.hltext_display: バロテッリ、ウィルシャーの存在を知らず？
description.content: ［Goal.com］ マンチェスター・シティＦＷマリオ・バロテッリは２１日、イタリア『トゥットスポルト』から２３歳以下の選手に対する年間最優秀若手選手賞「ゴールデンボーイ」を受賞した。アーセナルＭＦジャック・ウィルシャーやアトレティコ・マドリーＧＫダビド・デ・ヘアらを制し、最優秀若手選手の称号を手にした形だが、本人はウィルシャーのことを知らないそうだ。『トゥットスポルト』が伝えた。「正直に言って、ジャック・ウィルシャーって誰か知らないんだ。次にアーセナルと対戦するときは、彼に注目してみるよ。ゴールデンボーイ賞を見せて、彼じゃなくてオレが勝ち取ったんだって伝えるかもしれないね」「ゴールデンボーイ」は、トッテナムＭＦラファエル・ファン・デル・ファールトやマンチェスター・ユナイテッドＦＷウェイン・ルーニー、バルセロナＦＷリオネル・メッシ、アーセナルＭＦセスク・ファブレガス、アトレティコ・マドリーＦＷセルヒオ・アグエロ、ミランＦＷアレシャンドレ・パトらが獲得。イタリア人としてはバロテッリが初の受賞となる。

description.hltext_display: Bad Credit Payday Loans: ...
description.content:
Car insurance is a necessity these days. Yet knowing the ins and out of car insurance can save a person a bundle. Many factors influence the premium for your Motor insurance policy. Your insurer will have asked you many questions whilst producing your quote - some of which will affect your premium and some will not. Below we discuss the key variables that are within the policyholder's control.
Age
The older you are, the less likely you are to make a claim. As a result insurance companies charge lower premiums for more mature drivers.
Sex
Women are statistically less likely to have an accident and, if they do, it's less likely to be serious. Because of these statistics women benefit from lower premiums. It is also worth noting that if you represent one half of a couple you should consider having the female as the primary driver with the male as the second driver.
Location
A big influence on the cost of your car insurance is where you live. The chance of your car being broken into or stolen is a key concern for the insurer. More urban areas traditionally facing greater risk of theft and therefore tend to be more expensive than countryside locations.
Excess
By agreeing to pay a greater excess on each claim you can reduce your car insurance premiums. This is because you are reducing the liability of the insurer and therefore in return they are able to offer you a lower premium.
Your Vehicle
The cheaper and slower your vehicle the lower your premiums are likely to be. If you are looking to buy a new vehicle make sure you fully consider the cost of insurance – you may be able to buy the car but can you afford to run it?
Consolidating policies
By insuring a number of vehicles with the same insurer, or by trying to take out home and life insurance through your car insurer, you may be able to secure a ‘bulk buy’ discount.
Parking
Where you park your vehicle overnight is also very important to the insurers. If it is kept in a locked garage, you should be offered a lower premium than if you leave it unattended in the street.
Mileage
You can control your insurance premiums by restricting your annual mileage. However, be aware that if you exceed the restricted number of miles you'll then become uninsured!
One final piece of advice. A large percentage of car insurance is now sold on the Internet. That's because it's convenient and cheap. Many insurers now give a further 10%-15% discount if you buy online.

description.hltext_display: Bowl preparations hearten Irish coach
description.author: Tony Krausz
description.content:
Notre Dame�s practice Tuesday gave coach Brian Kelly a good indication that the Irish (7-5) are ready to play Miami (7-5) in the Sun Bowl on Dec. 31 in El Paso, Texas. �It was supposed to be tag-off (Tuesday), and it ended up being tackling. That�s a good sign,� Kelly told reporters Tuesday. �I�ve been on teams that didn�t want to play the bowl game. They just wanted to get through it and get the season over and get out of here. These guys want to play the game. They got a lot of gas in their tank, and that�s a good thing at this point.� Notre Dame completes practices in South Bend today before the team disperses for Christmas, and the coaches and players will reconvene in El Paso on Sunday.
The Irish used this week to install the game plan, and Kelly said one of the keys to a good bowl game is proper planning. �We try to create a very solid schedule for them and do a lot of the preparation work before we get there,� Kelly said. �We want them to enjoy the bowl experience. If you can enjoy it knowing you�ve got a lot of that work taken care of, I think it helps you leading into the game.� The Irish will head to Texas with no major injury issues. �No ankles, no hamstrings,� Kelly said. �(Receiver Duval Kamara) has got a bit of a ligament, thumb � whatever they call it. We kept him out (of practice Tuesday). � I don�t see that to be a long-term problem.� Kelly is also making sure there is no chance his players will wander into Juarez, Mexico, which is plagued by drug-related murders, by taking their passports. �That�s serious. Don�t go over the border, or you may not come back, simply,� Kelly said. �Now I know El Paso is the safest city in the country, but it�s serious. This isn�t, �Hey, let�s give it a shot, guys, and jump in the car and see what it�s like.� You can�t go there, or nobody is going to be able to help you. There�s just been too much turmoil. � You take the passports, they can�t get back. These guys are smart enough to know that.�

description.hltext_display: MAGNA ANNOUNCES MANAGEMENT CHANGE
description.content:
AURORA, ON, Dec. 21 /CNW/ - Magna International Inc. (TSX: MG; NYSE: MGA) announced today that Belinda Stronach will be resigning from her role as Executive Vice-Chair and member of the Board of Directors, effective December 31 , 2010.
Stated Michael D. Harris, Lead Director, "The Board wishes to express our sincere and deep appreciation to Belinda for the valuable contribution she has made to Magna over many years and we wish Belinda every success in the future."
As previously disclosed, the Nominating Committee of Magna's Board is in the process of reviewing the composition of the Board. The Nominating Committee has retained Russell Reynolds Associates, an internationally recognized firm, to assist in its search for potential future Board members, including a director to fill the vacancy created by Ms. Stronach 's resignation.
About Magna
We are the most diversified global automotive supplier. We design, develop and manufacture technologically advanced systems, assemblies, modules and components, and engineer and assemble complete vehicles, primarily for sale to original equipment manufacturers ("OEMs") of cars and light trucks. Our capabilities include the design, engineering, testing and manufacture of automotive interior systems; seating systems; closure systems; body and chassis systems; vision systems; electronic systems; exterior systems; powertrain systems; roof systems; hybrid and electric vehicles/systems as well as complete vehicle engineering and assembly.
Magna has over 92,000 employees in 245 manufacturing operations and 80 product development, engineering and sales centers in 25 countries.
To view this news release in HTML formatting, please use the following URL: http://www.newswire.ca/en/releases/archive/December2010/21/c7066.html

description.hltext_display: Mortgage Loans: The 411 T...
description.content:
Mortgage loans are the loans that are obtained by keeping a security against the amount of loan opted for. Most of the population that opt for mortgage loans try to apply for the home mortgage loan. The reason why most people opt for home mortgage loan is that against a home mortgage one can apply for and get a larger amount of loan.
Although the home mortgage loan is an easy way to getting credit, but if not properly managed it can lead to heavy debts. There are a number of things that a person should consider before applying for the home mortgage loan. First of all a person who wishes to apply for the home mortgage must check if the home mortgage is actually required. Although this is a good way to get credit, it still is a loan and not an income. Most people make a mistake in differentiating loan money and an earned money. The loan amount is meant to be return and hence one should first see if the loan is actually required.
The second point that must be noted is that the bigger the loan amount you apply for the bigger is the interest rate of repayment. Since the lender incurs a greater risk when providing a bigger loan, the interest rates for repayment of the loan would also be higher> thus before taking the loan one should check if he can repay the loan within the specified time limit. The home mortgage loan is a loan and not money earned, and hence it has to be repaid.
A person who wishes to apply for the home mortgage must always check his credit history. Whenever a borrower applies for a loan the first thing that the lender would check is the credit history. If the credit history of a person is not good then no loan is issued. Therefore before applying for a mortgage loan one should make sure that the credit history is good and no loan is yet to be paid.
It is interesting to note that the credit history of every individual is maintained and is modified annually, so it makes very easy for the money lending companies to check the credit details of a person.
One should try to keep the expenses under control. Spending too much and then applying for loan to make the payments for the extra expenses is not what a wise person would do.
Mortgage loans are meant to meet the necessities and not to overspend the money carelessly. Those who donâ€™t maintain a financial record of the cash flow often find themselves in trouble. Thus one should try to limit the expense and try to live within the earnings.
Mortgage loans must be opted for very carefully as there is a high rate of interest associated with them. It should be considered as an option only if no other choice exists. Also before applying for the mortgage loans one should make sure that the previous dues is all clear.

description.hltext_display: YASED'İN 30. YILI
description.content:
YASED?İN 30. YILI Kısa adı YASED olan Yabancı Sermaye veya Uluslar Arası Yatırımcılar Derneği kuruluşunun 30. yılı nedeniyle, İstanbul Conrad Otel?de bir toplantı düzenledi. Toplantının açılış konuşmasını yapan, ekonomiden sorumlu Başbakan Yardımcısı ve Bakan Sn. Ali Babacan, ekonomiyle ilgili oldukça doyurucu bir konuşma yaptı. Sn. Babacan, dünyada yaşanan kriz şartlarını Türkiye?nin nasıl absorbe ettiğini, krizden çıkış koşullarının neler olabileceğini ve önümüzdeki dönem senaryolarına ayrıntıyla değindi. Haklı olarak olumlu bir tablo ortaya koydu. Türkiye?de serbest kur, serbest ticaret ve serbest rekabet şartlarının yaratılması gerektiğini, buna çalıştıklarını, bankacılık sektörünün sağlam olduğunu ve bankaların kredi vermek için yarıştıklarını, yabancı sermayenin Türkiye?ye gelişi ve yabancı sermayeli şirketlerin kuruluş prosedürlerini ve bürokrasiyi azalttıklarını ifade etti. Doğrudan Başbakan?a bağlı olan Türkiye yatırım ve tanıtma ajansının, yabancı sermaye ve yabancı şirketleri Türkiye?ye çekmek için büyük çaba içinde olduğunu belirtti. Bir soru üzerine, yabancıların Türkiye?de mülk edinmelerinin önündeki engellerin kaldırılmasını çalışıldığını ifade etti. AKP Hükümetinin bu genç ve bilgili ve güzel konuşan, eğitimini ABD?de yapan Bakanını dinlerken, etkilendim.
YASED toplantısında daha sonra söz alan konuşmacılar, Türkiye?deki bürokratik zorluklardan, devlet dairelerindeki işlerin yavaş işlemesinden, ARGE çalışmalarında ve araştırmalarda milli gelirden ayrılan payın azlığından, Türkiye?de henüz ürünlerde markalaşmanın gerçekleşemediğinden ve Türkiye?de büyük çapta işsizlik ve cari açık olduğundan şikayet ettiler. Bununla beraber, yabancı yatırımcılar, Türkiye?de çalışmaktan, yatırım yapmaktan pişman olmadıklarını, siyasi istikrarın önemli olduğunu ve Türkiye?nin batı dünyasından ayrılarak, herhangi bir eksen değişikliğine yönelmemesini tavsiye ettiler. Gerçekten Türkiye için yabancı sermayenin, doğrudan yatırımların önemi fevkalade büyüktür. Bir konuşmacının belirttiği gibi, Türkiye hızlı kalkınmayı benimseyen bir ülkedir. Hızlı kalkınma, ekonomik büyüme, yeni yatırım kapasiteleri için, sermaye gereklidir. Türkiye milli gelirinin azlığı, tasarrufların yetersizliği nedeniyle, Türkiye yabancı sermaye ihtiyacı duymaktadır. Bir konuşmacının dediği gibi, mademki Türkiye?de tasarruflar düşüktür, sermaye terakümü yetersizdir, öyleyse Türkiye başka ülkelerin tasarruf ve sermayelerini kullanmalıdır. Bunun adı da yabancı sermaye yatırımlarıdır. Kendi konusunda tanınan, isim ve marka olmuş dünya şirketleri gelecekler, Türkiye?de yatırım yapacaklar, fabrikalar ve tesisler kuracaklar, istihdam ve katma değer yaratacaklar, ürettikleri malları iç veya dış piyasaya satarak, para kazanacaklar ve kazandıkları bu paradan elde ettikleri kârları da kendi ülkelerine götüreceklerdir. Bunda şaşılacak bir husus yoktur, mekanizma her yerde böyle işlemektedir.
Ne yazık ki tüm dünyanın yararlandığı yabancı sermayeye karşı, Türkiye?de bazı çevreler şüpheler yaratmakta ve yabancı sermaye yatırımlarını aşağılamaktadırlar. Yabancı şirketleri, yabancı adamları yalvar yakar getireceksin, yatırım ajansları, yabancı sermaye daireleri kuracaksın, sana her türlü imkanı sağlıyorum, gel yatırım yap diyeceksin, sonra gelenlere hakaret edip, onları tu kaka edeceksin. Dünyada dönen yabancı sermaye miktarı bir trilyon doların üzerindedir. Ne yazık ki Türkiye, yıllarca bu meblağdan sadece bir milyar dolar kullanabilmiştir. Son beş yılda bir ara bu rakam 22 milyar dolara çıkabilmişse de, son yılda tekrar yedi milyarlara düşmüştür. Oysa Çin?in 130 milyar dolar, Yunanistan, Macaristan, Polonya?nın 60-70 milyar dolar hatta AB üyesi olan Romanya ve Bulgaristan?ın 50 milyar dolarlar seviyesinde yabancı sermaye çektiği göz önünde tutulmalıdır. Ancak adamı yalvar yakar getirip, hakaret edip ülkeden kovmaya çalışırsan, aleyhte nümayişler düzenlersen, Türkiye?nin yabancı sermayeden istifa etmesi sadece hayal olur. Mısır?dan şeker şurubu elde eden, dünyanın en büyük şirketlerinden birine yapılan muameleler, hala akıllardadır. Hatta ne yazık ki tehdit hala devam etmektedir. Bu şirkete hükümetler rica ediyor. Gel bizim ülkemizde yatırım yap diyor. Araziyi ve diğer imkanları ve teşvikleri tahsis ediyor. Şirkete yasal olarak gerekli olan resmi, yatırım, çevre, tarım ruhsatları veriliyor. Tekrar ediyorum bütün bunların altında resmi rakamların, mülki ve yerel idarenin imzaları vardır. Ancak aradan zaman geçiyor, sen tarıma ayrılan arazide fabrika yaptın, çek git fabrikanı kapat deniliyor. Gittim, bu fabrikanın yerini gördüm. Bahsettiğim yabancı sermayeli şirket, tarıma dayalı sanayi kurmuş, doğayı, çevreyi kesinlikle kirletmemektedir. Yöneticilerin ve işçilerin hepsi Türk?tür. Sen hem yap diye yabancı sermayeye izin veriyorsun, sonra da yanlış araziye yatırım yaptın diye sürgün etmeye kalkıyorsun. Şimdi sıkı durun, gidip gördüğüm bu tarıma dayalı üretim yapan tesisin yanında, çevreyi ve doğayı pisleten, tahrip eden, havaya simsiyah dumanlar saçan demir çelik tesisi mevcut. Asıl bu tesis doğayı tahrip ettiği için oraya yapılmaması gerekir. Eğer kaldırılacaksa, tarıma dayalı sanayi tesis değil, bu tesis kaldırılmalıdır. İşte Türkiye?nin gerçekleri budur. Şimdi siz dünyada bir trilyonun üzerinde olan yabancı sermayeden pay alacağım diye, istediğiniz kadar çaba harcayınız.
YASED konferansında dikkatimi çeken bazı noktalar benim her vesile ile altını çizdiğim hususlardır. Türkiye dünyada büyük stratejik ve jeopolitik konuma sahip bir ülkedir. Ancak Türkiye, hem Avrupa?ya, hem Orta Doğu?ya, Arap dünyası, Asya ve Uzak Doğu?ya yakın, tam ortada bulunduğu konumu yeterince değerlendirememektedir. Oysa bu konum, Türkiye?ye büyük pazar avantajları sağlamaktadır. Öte yandan Türkiye petrol, doğal gaz gibi doğal kaynaklardan yoksundur. Ancak, bu kaynakların üretim merkezlerinin tam ortasında köprü konumundadır. Türkiye?de tasarruf ve sermaye yetersizliği, yani ekonomik büyümenin ve kalkınmanın finansmanı yetersizdir. İşsizlik büyük sorundur, buna karşılık işçi ücretleri yüksek ve çalışanların verimliliği düşüktür. Diğer taraftan, dünyanın 16?ncı Avrupa?nın 6?ncı büyük ekonomisiyiz diye övünüyoruz. Oysa, Birleşmiş Miletler kalkınma programının insanca yaşma göstergelerine göre, Türkiye 182 Birleşmiş Milletler üyesi arasında, 94. sırada yer almaktadır. Türkiye?de iş yapabilme kolaylıkları, yabancı sermayeye sağlanan imkanlar ve verilen önem açısından da, Türkiye gene 60?ncı sıradadır. Bu durum, yabancı sermaye alanında, Türkiye?nin alması gereken önemli mesafeler olduğunun göstergesidir.
YASED tüm bu eksiklikleri gidermek, yabancı sermayeli şirketlere sahip çıkmak ve onların sorunları hakkında hükümetlerin dikkatini çekmek için, önemli bir fonksiyon yerine getirmeye çabalamaktadır. YASED?in 30. yılını kutlarken, Conrad Otelinde düzenlenen toplantının başarı ile organize edilmesini sağlayan Devlet Planlama Teşkilatından arkadaşım, Genel Sekreter Sn. Mustafa Alper?i ve YASED Başkanı Sn. Piraye Antika?yı tebrik ediyorum.

description.hltext_display: Two Prithvi-II missiles test-fired successfully
description.content:
Tags: Prithvi-II missile, test fired, Orissa
Share
Translate into:
Balasore: Two Prithvi-II nuclear-capable ballistic missiles with a strike range of 350 km were successfully test-fired in an hour's gap on Wednesday as part of user trials by the Army from the Integrated Test Range (ITR) at Chandipur off Orissa coast.
"Two indigenously developed surface-to-surface Prithvi-II missiles were test-fired from the ITR and both the trials were fully successful," ITR Director SP Dash said.
The missiles, mounted on mobile launchers and aimed at different targets, were test-fired from launch complex-3 in the ITR at around 08:15 and 09:15 hrs, defence sources said.
The test-firing of the sleek missiles, already inducted into the armed forces, were routine trials conducted by personnel of Strategic Force Command (SFC), they said.
"The entire trajectory of the twin trial was tracked by a battery of sophisticated radars, electro-optic telemetry stations and ships launched in the down range impact point area in the Bay for post-launch analyses," the sources said.
During the last user trial from the same launch complex on September 24 this year, the missile had failed to perform due to some technical problems.
"Prithvi-II missile had proved its robustness and accuracy repeatedly during many trials earlier," a Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) official said.
With a maximum strike range of 350 km, Prithvi-II is capable of carrying a pay-load of 500-1000 kg warhead.
"Taken from routine production lot during earlier user trials by Indian Army, the missile had achieved single digit accuracy reaching close to zero circular error probability (CEP)," the sources said.
The missile, having required features to deceive any anti-ballistic missile, had demonstrated flight duration of 483 seconds reaching a peak altitude of 43.5 kms during user’s trial in 2008.
Similarly, as part of operational exercises by armed forces, two Prithvi-II missiles, aimed at different targets at 350 km from launch point of ITR were successfully launched within minutes of each other on October 12, 2009 and all mission objectives were met, sources said.
The twin trials conducted today proved the accuracy and precision capability of Prithvi-II and would go a long way in further development of the missile, experts said.
Prithvi, the first ballistic missile developed under the country's prestigious Integrated Guided Missile Development Programme (IGMDP), is propelled by liquid propulsion twin engine.
With a length of nine meter and one meter diameter, Prithvi-II uses an advanced inertial navigation system with manoeuvring trajectory.
The sleek surface-to-surface missile had proved its accuracy when the army test-fired it in a ‘salvo mode’ on March 27 and June 18 this year from ITR, Chandipur. It was the fourth successful Prithvi-II flight within a period of eight months.

description.hltext_display: Balanced attack allows Dallas to complete Florida sweep
description.content:
The Mavericks now are 10-1 on the road and have won four in a row and 16 of 17 overall after running past Orlando in the fourth quarter for a 105-99 victory at Amway Center.
It was a balanced attack that earned the second half of the Florida sweep. Caron Butler led the way with 20 points and Tyson Chandler had 16 and six Mavericks hit double figures.
The Mavericks were up by as much as 12 in the fourth quarter and were up 97-89 until Dwight Howard hit two free throws and Jason Richardson knocked in a 3-pointer to make it 97-94 with 56.6 seconds left.
Jason Terry , just as he had the night before in Miami, stepped up with a 20-footer with 39.1 showing. But new Magic man Hedo Turkoglu made two free throws. The Magic fouled Shawn Marion with 26.5 left and he made both free throws. After another Richardson 3-pointer, Dirk Nowitzki was fouled and hit two free throws with 24 seconds on the clock to make it 103-99.
Richardson finally missed a triple and Terry hit two more free throws to ice it.
It was a rough night for Dirk, although also a momentous one. At one point late in the third quarter, four of the Mavericks' starters had scored in double figures and Nowitzki was the only one who wasn't.
The Mavericks got two baskets from Dirk in the first six minutes. He wouldn't score another basket until the fourth quarter. At one point in the third quarter, he was on his right side, rolling a plastic cylinder under his hip. Not sure if there was an injury involved there.
Then, on the first possession of the fourth quarter, Jason Terry found Nowitzki outside the 3-point arc, and he rifled in a triple to give him 11 points on the night, moving him ahead of Larry Bird for 25th on the NBA's all-time scoring list. Bird had 21,791 points. Nowitzki finished the night with 21,798.
The Mavericks needed Nowitzki's trifecta to start the fourth. It put them ahead 79-72. Brendan Haywood then had back-to-back dunks to make it 83-74. The lead did not go below five points after that.
They used the long-ball to take down the Magic, making 12 shots from beyond the arc, just two off of their season high. Caron Butler hit four of his six tries.
--Eddie Sefko
• • •

description.hltext_display: 重傷のベン・アルファ、早ければ２月に復帰も
description.content: ［Goal.com］ 今年１０月のマンチェスター・シティ戦でＭＦナイジェル・デ・ヨングのタックルを受け、左足のひ骨とけい骨を骨折したニューカッスルＭＦハテム・ベン・アルファ。当初はシーズン絶望、良くても終盤の復帰と言われた同選手だが、代理人によれば早期の復帰が期待できるようだ。代理人のスタインロッド氏は『ジャーナル』に対し、１００％断言はできないとしながらも、ベン・アルファが早ければ２月上旬にも復帰できる可能性があると明かした。「ハテムは本当に、本当によくやっている。月曜から金曜までハードワークし、かなり良くなっているよ。当初の診断から言えば、私はかなりうまくいくと思う。１００％と言うことは決してできないけど、２月の第１週で復帰できるかもしれない。そうなったらファンタスティックだね」「それより遅くなるかもしれないし、早くなるかもしれない。だが、みんなが考えていたよりも良いことだろう。ニューカッスルのクラブドクターが先週、彼を診察している。ドクターはハテムの回復ぶりを本当に喜んでいたよ」マルセイユからニューカッスルにレンタル移籍中のベン・アルファは、負傷するまで好パフォーマンスで高い評価を受けていた。ニューカッスルはシーズン後に完全移籍で獲得するオプションを有しており、同選手が早期復帰を成し遂げ、再びチームに貢献することを願っているだろう。

description.hltext_display: Debt problems in Nottinghamshire predicted to get worse warn Baines and Ernst
description.content:
(PRLEAP.COM) Baines and Ernst, one of the UK’s largest providers of debt solutions, has warned that personal debt levels are set to rise across the UK over the coming 12 months. New statistical data from the business, which specialises in setting up Debt Management Plans and Individual Voluntary Arrangements (IVA) with creditors on behalf of overindebted consumers, shows that in Nottinghamshire the average unsecured debt levels increased by 9.41% when comparing Quarter 3 to Quarter 2 of 2010.
Commenting on the new figures, Nick Pearson, Director of External Affairs, from Baines & Ernst said "Unmanageable personal debt is already a major problem for many households in Nottinghamshire. Nationally, it is estimated that average unsecured household debt is £8,590 (excluding mortgages) rising to £29,929 when including mortgage debt (Credit Action/ October 2010). The fact that Unsecured and Secured debt levels in Nottinghamshire are increasing will add to their woes"
Figures published by "Credit Action" showed that across the UK 1 person every 52 seconds of the working day is declared bankrupt or insolvent and over 100 homeowners are being repossessed by their mortgage lender every day. As a result it has been calculated that lenders write off over £38m a day in bad debt.
Pearson continued that "given the likely impact of the recent Coalition Government Comprehensive Spending Review on employment, with some half a million people expected to lose their jobs as a result of spending cuts, we believe that the number of people with debt problems is likely to increase rapidly over the next 12 months. Added to this any rise in interests rates will also be a trigger for repayment problems for many homeowners who have become used to paying their mortgage at historically low interest rates."
Notes:
About Paymex Group:
- Founded in 1996 as Baines & Ernst, Paymex Group Ltd is one of the UK’s largest and longest established providers of debt solutions;
- Helped over 140,000 people to get their finances under control;
- Nearly £1bn of unsecured debts under management
- Member of the Debt Resolution Forum and the Debt Managers Standards Association. Baines & Ernst as a member of DEMSA has demonstrated compliance with the Office of Fair Trading Approved Code of Conduct scheme;
- Committed to the ethos and ethics of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) and is a member of the charity Business in the Community;
- Paymex have adopted the FSA’s Treating Customers Fairly principles throughout the business.
- Paymex were winners of the "Debt management provider of the year" 2010 at the Insolvency and Rescue Awards. One of the specialist advisors from the Baines and Ernst Debt Relief Order Team was named as "Debt Adviser of the Year" at the 2010 "Credit Today" magazine awards
- Baines and Ernst are part of the Paymex Group - Winners "Debt Management Provider of the Year" at the Insolvency & Rescue Awards 2010.
For further information contact
Nick Pearson
Director of External Affairs

description.hltext_display: Yanks' luxury tax $18 million
description.content:
New York was hit with an $18 million luxury tax Tuesday by Major League Baseball. The tax was New York�s lowest since 2003 and down from $25.7 million last year, when the Yankees won the World Series. �Atta baby. And right now we�re in the $170s,� Yankees general manager Brian Cashman said, looking ahead to his 2011 payroll.
Season-ending payroll information and the tax was sent to teams Tuesday and obtained by The Associated Press.
Boston is the only other team that will have to pay. The Red Sox, who missed the playoffs this year, exceeded the payroll threshold for the first time since 2007 and owe $1.49 million. Reliever Bobby Jenks and the Boston Red Sox finalized a $12 million, two-year contract.
The former Chicago White Sox closer joins a bullpen that already has Jonathan Papelbon and Daniel Bard working the late innings. Former Oakland outfielder Travis Buck signed a minor league contract with Cleveland. � Former Texas right-hander Rich Harden is rejoining Oakland after finalizing $1.5 million, one-year contract. � Milwaukee and infielder Craig Counsell are reported to have agreed to a $1.4 million, one-year contract. � Seattle traded catcher Rob Johnson to San Diego for a player to be named later or cash considerations. � Toronto signed outfielder Corey Patterson and right-handers Winston Abreu and Brian Stokes, lefties Sean Henn and Mike Hinckley and catcher Ryan Budde to minor league contracts.

description.hltext_display: West Africa Reiterates Commitment to War Against Cyber Crime
description.content:
Lagos The need to fiercely fight against cyber crime and foster legitimate economic opportunity in West African has been described as a must for the public and private sectors.
Speaking at the first West Africa Cyber crime summit held recently in Abuja, Vice President Namadi Sambo, said Cyber crime is a cross-industry and international phenomenon which takes full advantage of the opportunities provided by the Internet.
Sambo said the public and private sectors must continue to fathom ways to position the fight against cyber crime as a national priority to help the economic development of the region.
According to him, "Cyber security is not only something difficult to tackle, but also requires creative thinkers, talented policy makers who will understand and make people understand why and how a strong cyber security framework is a must for the creation of a vibrant national economy."
Hosted in a region which has some of the highest numbers of cyber crime incidents in the world, the summit which had over 200 people in attendance from across the world, focused on the theme, "The Fight against Cyber crime: Towards Innovative and Sustainable Economic Development." It was organised by the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) in collaboration with the United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC), the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) and Microsoft.
The summit, which explored the need to strengthen trust by developing partnerships among various stakeholders at the national and international level.
Government, civil society, academics, industry and international organizations, showcased the best practices and case studies of partners' organization in combating cyber crime.
As co-sponsors of the summit, Microsoft Nigeria and the Microsoft Digital Crimes Unit said they have also been actively working with international stakeholders, including the EFCC of Nigeria on programs to fight Internet fraud in West Africa, a problemmes that continues to victimize people around the world.

description.hltext_display: Private Medical Insurance...
description.content:
Medical insurance is a necessity today. We scrimp and save over the latest designer wear, even the hottest cars or fancy jewelry but only a handful of people have actually thought about protecting their financial future with private medical insurance. This beauty behind having a private medical insurance is that it enable you to live your life free from unwanted worry if you were to get sick or have an accident that results in unexpected medical bills.
If you're wise you'll get coverage while you can still qualify for and afford it, which is before you need it. If you wait until you've been injured or sick, in most cases you won't qualify and if you do the monthly premiums will be extremely high.
Although, private medical insurance doesn't cover long-term illnesses, it's designed to cover the financial burden of short-term illnesses and injuries, many people opt choose private medical insurance since it can be a real help for certain emergencies.
An added perk of private medical insurance is that you actually get to choose which hospital you would like to be treated in, what specialist you would like to consult and what treatment you receive. In most instances, you will also feel like your money's well spent because you'll have the added perk of having your own private room complete with a television and other comforts of home.
If you are seriously thinking of buying private medical insurance, you'll have to research which one of the vast number of reputable insurance companies actually provides the best overall coverage. Which one provides the best balance between premium cost and benefits so that if you ever need it, you'll get your money's worth with no surprises.
After applying for coverage, the carrier will send you their insurance policies to insure that you adhere to their requirements and standards. When it comes to which private medical insurance plan that'll best suits your needs and budget, it is wise to ask the insurance company that you're applying for a complete comparison analysis of the types of private medical insurance that they offer.
I've listed a few samples of possible private medical insurance coverage below:
- In Patient: As a patient, this is wherein you end up staying in the hospital for one or more days.
- Out Patient: From simple treatments to mere consultations, the patient is not asked to stay in the hospital for observation or recovery anymore.
- Day Patient: Similar to In-patient coverage, this is where you still stay in the hospital but for less than a day, usually in the morning.
There is actually a great range of available payment options for private medical insurance buyers from the ever-popular, low cost coverage, which usually offers only limited coverage to the more extensive wide-ranging coverage and benefit plans. It is fairly simple to be approved for day and out-patient private medical insurance coverage, with in-patent being a bit more difficult due to the higher risk involved with extended hospital stays.
Your physician as well as the resident specialist in the hospital also needs to sign your claim forms to reassure the company that you have actually been treated for the said illness or injury.

description.hltext_display: Fried Zucchini at Bad Boy Burgers
description.content:
Bad Boy Burgers
815 Vista Ave. 208-331-1580
Related Locations
Bench 815 S. Vista Ave.
(based on 3 user reviews)
West Boise 7000 W. Fairview Ave.
208-373-0020
Be the first to review this location!
A cheeseburger is not generally considered part of a balanced daily diet. But if you look at it carefully, the burger's individual items have plenty of nutritional merit and follow the food pyramid guideline: meat (protein), cheese (dairy), lettuce/tomato/pickle (vegetables), bun (breads/grains), mayonnaise (fats).
It's this kind of thinking that makes eating deep-fried vegetables so much easier, psychologically at least. Yes, they are deep fried and probably going to get dipped into some kind of creamy sauce. But underneath all of that greasy, crispy breading is a vegetable, so it's not all bad. Right?
It's not hard to get on board with this kind of thinking, especially after a taste of the fried zucchini at Bad Boy Burgers on Vista Avenue. Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, these little treats are tastier than a truckload of fries. So what if the white paper bag, stuffed to overflowing, is nearly translucent with grease by the time you get it into the car? And who cares if the green and white of the zuke is hidden behind the golden brown of breading? Are you with me? Zucchini is so low in calories and so high in Vitamin C that a little batter couldn't possibly cancel those benefits. Plus, consuming it is purported to reduce the risk of contracting multiple sclerosis.
For $2.95 an order, you'll not only get to satisfy your fried-food fetish, you'll be able to tell yourself you ate something healthy and your wallet will also be in good shape when you're done.
Sometimes it's all in how you look at something.

description.hltext_display: Slash signs up Alter Bridge frontman for new album
description.content:
Myles Kennedy has officially confirmed that he will sing on Slash's next solo album.
The Alter Bridge frontman, who sang on the tracks Back From Cali and Starlight on Slash's eponymous 2010 solo album, as well as touring with the guitar legend throughout this year, told Pulse Radio:
"It's very flattering. I think there's kind of a cool thing we got going. We really enjoy working with each other. I know they're auditioning singers now for Velvet Revolver, so I don't know if they find the right guy if that'll affect things timing-wise [for slash's next solo album]. I'm not really sure. But the plan right now is that yeah, we'll do a record together down the road."

event_or_fact.property: he will sing on Slash's next solo album.

description.hltext_display: Cortisone shot allows Woods to prime game
description.content: Mark Steinberg, his agent at IMG, said Woods had intended all along to have the shot after the Chevron World Challenge, which ended Dec. 5. Woods has nearly two months off before his next tournament at Torrey Pines. Houston asked the NBA for a disabled player salary cap exception in the wake of Yao Ming�s season-ending ankle injury. � Los Angeles Clippers forward Craig Smith will miss at least two weeks with a herniated disc in his lower back. � Charlotte recalled point guard Sherron Collins after a five-game stint with Maine of the D-League. � Phoenix released center Earl Barron. Kansas State guard Jacob Pullen, a preseason All-American was suspended by the NCAA for three games and forward Curtis Kelly was indefinitely suspended for receiving impermissible benefits in connection with the purchase of clothing at a local department store. � Mississippi State sophomore Renardo Sidney was suspended indefinitely for �conduct detrimental to the team.� The Jordan Brand Classic high school basketball all-star games are moving to Michael Jordan�s arena in Charlotte, N.C. The event April 16 will shift from Madison Square Garden in New York to Charlotte�s Time Warner Cable Arena. Manny Pacquiao plans to fight Sugar Shane Mosley in his next bout May 7 in Las Vegas. Promoter Bob Arum told The Associated Press that the deal will be done after Mosley�s lawyers approve the final paperwork for the WBO welterweight title fight at the MGM Grand Garden Arena. David Haye is offering Wladimir Klitschko a 50-50 split of the earnings in order to secure a heavyweight unification fight next year. Haye, the WBA champion, has been unable to negotiate a match after withdrawing from a fight with Klitschko in 2009. Michigan State will be without leading receiver B.J. Cunningham for the Capital One Bowl after he broke his foot in practice. � Joe Paterno celebrated his 84th birthday with two practices as the Nittany Lions prepare to play Florida in the Outback Bowl on Jan. 1. � Tennessee reported secondary violations to the NCAA after discovering 36 student-athletes were given special treatment at the Knoxville bar where a fight involving Volunteers football players broke out in July. Los Angeles defenders A.J. DeLaGarza and Sean Franklin are among 12 players with no international experience selected for a U.S. national team training camp ahead of the Americans� exhibition against Chile. Los Angeles says Landon Donovan will forgo the chance to be loaned to a European club during the offseason. Roger Federer has beaten Rafael Nadal 4-6, 6-3, 6-3 in the first of two exhibition matches between the world�s top two tennis players in Zurich.

event_or_fact.property: the deal will be done after Mosley?s lawyers approve the final paperwork for the WBO welterweight title fight at the MGM Grand Garden Arena.

description.hltext_display: Private Medical Insurance: The 411
description.content:
Medical insurance is a necessity today. We scrimp and save over the latest designer wear, even the hottest cars or fancy jewelry but only a handful of people have actually thought about protecting their financial future with private medical insurance. This beauty behind having a private medical insurance is that it enable you to live your life free from unwanted worry if you were to get sick or have an accident that results in unexpected medical bills.
If you're wise you'll get coverage while you can still qualify for and afford it, which is before you need it. If you wait until you've been injured or sick, in most cases you won't qualify and if you do the monthly premiums will be extremely high.
Although, private medical insurance doesn't cover long-term illnesses, it's designed to cover the financial burden of short-term illnesses and injuries, many people opt choose private medical insurance since it can be a real help for certain emergencies.
An added perk of private medical insurance is that you actually get to choose which hospital you would like to be treated in, what specialist you would like to consult and what treatment you receive. In most instances, you will also feel like your money's well spent because you'll have the added perk of having your own private room complete with a television and other comforts of home.
If you are seriously thinking of buying private medical insurance, you'll have to research which one of the vast number of reputable insurance companies actually provides the best overall coverage. Which one provides the best balance between premium cost and benefits so that if you ever need it, you'll get your money's worth with no surprises.
After applying for coverage, the carrier will send you their insurance policies to insure that you adhere to their requirements and standards. When it comes to which private medical insurance plan that'll best suits your needs and budget, it is wise to ask the insurance company that you're applying for a complete comparison analysis of the types of private medical insurance that they offer.
I've listed a few samples of possible private medical insurance coverage below:
- In Patient: As a patient, this is wherein you end up staying in the hospital for one or more days.
- Out Patient: From simple treatments to mere consultations, the patient is not asked to stay in the hospital for observation or recovery anymore.
- Day Patient: Similar to In-patient coverage, this is where you still stay in the hospital but for less than a day, usually in the morning.
There is actually a great range of available payment options for private medical insurance buyers from the ever-popular, low cost coverage, which usually offers only limited coverage to the more extensive wide-ranging coverage and benefit plans. It is fairly simple to be approved for day and out-patient private medical insurance coverage, with in-patent being a bit more difficult due to the higher risk involved with extended hospital stays.
Your physician as well as the resident specialist in the hospital also needs to sign your claim forms to reassure the company that you have actually been treated for the said illness or injury.

description.hltext_display: More Cold Weather Brews
description.content:
These three brews are all great for winter consumption but are all very different: a Finnish ale with juniper twigs, another stand out from Colorado's New Belgium Brewing and the much anticipated holiday release from Boise's own Sockeye Brewing.
Huvila Arctic Circle Ale
There's a distinctive herbal quality to this delightful Finnish brew, something like a cross between the pine notes of retsina and the aroma of those old school, unsweetened Y&S licorice sticks, all backed by light toast. That herbal licorice quality definitely comes through on the palate, but in a very appealing way, along with lightly sweet malt and spicy hops. Touches of rye and black tea color the finish in this uniquely delicious and exceptional ale.
New Belgium Lips of Faith Vrienden
In collaboration with New England's Allagash Brewing, New Belgium has created this unusual ale employing Brett yeast and Lactobacillus, while adding hibiscus flowers and endive to the mix. It sounds like a strange formulation but it works beautifully. You get the funky aromas expected from Brett--that earth and spice mix--along with a lightly sour tang. On the palate, that sour quality is present but subdued, blending nicely with smooth malt and subtle hops. Nice apple and citrus flavors are also present, but endive? Thankfully, not so much.
Sockeye Winterfest
This winter seasonal is brewed with the recipe that I prefer--there's enough sweet malt to fit the style but with the balancing hop bite I love (think Sierra Nevada Celebration). It pours a dark amber with a thick tan head that slowly dissolves, leaving a nice lacing. Resiny hops dominate the nose, backed by notes of citrus and caramel. Again, balance is the key with those toasty malt flavors playing beautifully against the ripe citrus and bitter hops. I wish more Boise brewers bottled.

description.hltext_display: Invest In Affordable Protection When Away Says Crime Prevention Products
description.content:
With many Britons travelling to join their families during the festive season of Christmas and New Year, respected security providers such as Crime Prevention Products highly recommend homeowners and tenants invest in affordable protection to give them peace of mind while away.
Current crime statistics show that approximately 50% of all burglaries occur when a house or a flat is unoccupied, whereas less than 1% of burglaries occur in properties with effective alarm systems. For a small fee, a Wireless Burglar Alarm can ensure homes remain safe and sound while people enjoy the holidays with their loved ones, especially bearing in mind that most burglaries are opportunistic in terms of criminals scouting for easy and fast access without any protection measures.
With the advancement of wireless alarm technology, there is a practical and cost-effective way unlike never before to make a home unappealing to criminals. Wireless burglar alarms operate using motion detection Passive Infrared technology in other words they can sense an increase in body heat when an intruder gains access to a premises. They can also be combined with magnetic sensors attached to windows or doors that trigger an alarm when they are opened.
The main difference between a wireless burglar alarm and the traditional hard-wired alarm is that its component parts (i.e. the control panel, sensors and alarm) all communicate via radio signals, instead of being electrically wired. This means that they are much easier to install whereas many traditional alarms require electrical expertise to configure, their wireless counterparts can be easily setup by almost anyone.
The benefits of using a wireless burglar alarm are:
Cash savings by not having to hire a professional to install them.
Their sensor location is flexible as there are no complex electrical wiring limitations to consider. This factor also removes the risk of potential damage and upheaval which comes from connecting hard-wired alarms in a property.
Additional sensors can be easily added if further security is needed.
They can be removed and re-installed in a different building without any fuss this makes them a perfect solution for people who rent their homes because often landlords will not allow alterations such as tampering with the electrical wiring.
Cost wise, a wireless burglar alarm is far more economical than a hard-wired system (which will also include installation fees). These days they are available to suit every budget, with prices starting at just £30.
Terry Rattee, Owner of Crime Prevention Products, commented, "Since wireless burglar alarms are both highly affordable and very easy to install, there really should be no reason why both property owners and tenants don’t invest in one to keep their homes safe while they are out enjoying the holidays. If you compare the small upfront fee of a wireless alarm compared to the unpleasant experience and resulting costs of a burglary, to be honest it’s a no-brainer. We hope everyone takes this on board so that they can be sure to have a happy Christmas."
CONTACT INFORMATION
Terry Rattee
Crime Prevention Products Ltd

entity.property: using motion detection Passive Infrared technology
CONTACT INFORMATION Terry Rattee Crime Prevention Products Ltd

description.hltext_display: New-look Magic falls to Mavericks
description.content:
Caron Butler scored 20 points, Dirk Nowitzki had 17 and the streaking Mavericks became the latest team to topple the reconstructed Magic in a 105-99 victory Tuesday night. �We still know who they had,� Nowitzki said of a Magic team that just overhauled its roster. �Dwight (Howard) is their focus. They have a bunch of shooters, Jameer (Nelson) and all those guys.� In other words, still not good enough to beat the NBA�s elite. Nowitzki also passed Celtics great Larry Bird for 25th on the NBA�s career scoring list, finishing the night at 21,798 points. Tyson Chandler added 16 points to help the Mavericks pull away in the fourth quarter for their 16th win in 17 games.
A night after snapping Miami�s 12-game winning streak, they shot 50 percent from the floor, including 46 percent from three-point range. �We feel like we�re one of the best teams in the league, if not the best right now,� Butler said. �We�re playing great basketball, so we want to capitalize on every opportunity.� And Orlando provided a perfect one. The Magic again looked like a team that hasn�t had time to hold a practice since newcomers Gilbert Arenas, Jason Richardson and Hedo Turkoglu were acquired on Saturday. They�ve lost the first two games since the pair of blockbuster trades and dropped eight of their last nine.
The latest came on another monster night for Howard, who had 26 points and 23 rebounds but got no help from his new teammates. Howard has had at least 20 rebounds in three straight games. �It can�t get any worse,� Howard said of his team�s slide. Their next two games come against the league�s top two teams: San Antonio and Boston.
The struggles were a big reason they orchestrated two trades that brought Arenas from Washington and Turkoglu, Richardson and Earl Clark from Phoenix. They gave up Rashard Lewis, Vince Carter, Mickael Pietrus and Marcin Gortat, plus a 2011 first-round draft pick, in the deals.
The three biggest newcomers have so far been unspectacular. After a loss at Atlanta in their first outing together, their home debuts were equally troubling: Arenas had two points (1 for 6), Turkoglu nine points (2 for 11) and Richardson 10 points (4 for 13). �None of those guys are shooting the ball very well right now,� Magic coach Stan Van Gundy said. �I don�t know if it�s being in a new situation or putting too much pressure on themselves. All three of them are struggling to shoot the ball.� The problem now is sorting out how this revamped roster is supposed to work.
BULLS 121, 76ERS 76: Derrick Rose and Luol Deng each scored 22 points, and host Chicago won for the eighth time in nine games.
Andre Iguodala scored 17 points and reserve Thaddeus Young added 12 for Philadelphia.
THUNDER 99, BOBCATS 81: Kevin Durant scored 32 points and Oklahoma City erased a 69-68 deficit entering the fourth quarter with a 25-3 run in Charlotte, N.C.
Stephen Jackson scored 20 points and Boris Diaw added 13 points, seven rebounds and eight assists for the Bobcats.
NETS 101, GRIZZLIES 94: Brook Lopez scored 26 points, Sasha Vujacic added a season-high 16 in Memphis, Tenn., as New Jersey snapped a 10-game road losing streak. Marc Gasol scored 19 points and O.J. Mayo added 17 for the Grizzlies.

event_or_fact.property: a season-high 16 in Memphis, Tenn., as New Jersey snapped a 10-game road losing streak

description.hltext_display: 《爱情连连看》“重磅剩女”主动出击 表白成功
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
浙江卫视《爱情连连看》的舞台一直都是一男PK多女的爱情挑战，20日的节目尾声上演了温馨感人的女追男PK赛。在最后一个环节中，女嘉宾红艳直接对男选手马贤达表明爱意，甚至几度在舞台上哽咽，最终红艳的真心打动了男嘉宾，两人甜蜜牵手成功。其他的三位选手中，来自东北的麻醉医师张英焕也在《爱情连连看》的舞台收获了真爱。
31岁，130斤，相貌平平事业蒸蒸日上的红艳可以算的上是大龄剩女的典型代表。家庭的温暖，爱人的怀抱，这些年轻女孩们唾手可得的东西，对她来说都是可遇不可求的稀罕物。和年轻女孩相比，红艳更明确自己的定位，经历过一次车祸的她，对财富权利这些身外之物并不看重，只是希望能找到一位情投意合的人步入婚姻。
只身到上海打拼的江苏小伙马贤达在《爱情连连看》的舞台以一身黑色大衣示人，按他自己的话说是“遮着点身材”。幽默乐观的他很快就赢得了现场不少女孩子的青睐，在节目中大多数时候都沉默着的红艳甚至直接开口告白：“我一看到你，就觉得很喜欢。”也许是被红艳的执着所感动，其他女孩纷纷选择了让贤，为红艳和马贤达营造“二人时光”。
牵手成功后，红艳激动的落下眼泪，将脸埋在马贤达臂膀，接受在场观众的祝福。红艳的勇敢让人感慨，马贤达的抉择让人鼓舞。也许人们对“姐弟恋”还不是特别赞同，或者不看好一方特别主动的恋爱，事实上，每一个人都有追求自己幸福的权利，人们不应该仅凭个人好恶去随意评价他人的选择。在相亲热浪还未退去的当下，越来越多的人选择相亲，看重的只是对方的长相和财富。“拜金教”、“外貌协会”的成员人数不断增加，畸形的相亲态度和价值观影响了她们的判断。爱情并不是用金钱和帅气的外表堆积起来的，唯有真心的付出才能有所收获。红艳的勇敢与坚强让观众们看到，原来相亲并不都是作秀，爱情有些时候是需要主动出击的。《爱情连连看》见证了大龄“重磅剩女”的奇迹，祝福红艳和马贤达能有美好的未来。

description.hltext_display: Aker Solutions bags Ekofisk work
description.content:
ConocoPhillips has conditionally awarded a contract for engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) for the topside for the Ekofisk 2/4 Z platform to Aker Solutions.The award is subject to project approval by the PL018 licence group, expected in the first quarter, and Norwegian authorities' approval of the plan for development and operation (PDO) which should be granted in the second quarter of next year.
Financial details were not made public.

description.hltext_display: Siddle to keep on sledging
description.content:
Australia paceman Peter Siddle has vowed to keep on sledging after claiming it helps him perform better.
Siddle was involved in an angry exchange with England's Matt Prior during the 267-run victory in Perth, with the wicketkeeper taking offence to some of the comments made after he had been bowled for 12 in the first innings.
However Siddle remains unrepentant about the whole incident, insisting instead that the episode was "just part of the game".
"It's always going to be there, we fight hard in the field and the emotions come out," he said.
"It's always around and no doubt going to be around in the future as well.
"I think that's part of my game anyway. When I play my best that's what I'm doing anyway. Sometimes it comes off and sometimes it doesn't, in this case it has.
"It's just both teams going hard at it. It's good fun out there - they're at us, we're at them and it makes the game a bit more lively and no doubt the spectators like to see it.
"I enjoy having some fun with the batters and it's just the way I like to play my cricket, so if it helps the other boys get the job done, I'm happy to do it."
Meanwhile Siddle is confident Australia captain Ricky Ponting will be fit for the Boxing Day Test in Melbourne.
Ponting fractured his little finger parrying an attempted catch to Brad Haddin to dismiss Jonathon Trott in the second innings at Perth.
However Siddle said: "It's looking good, he's come over here confident, and he said he's holding the bat fine and all that type of thing.
"It doesn't matter how sore you are or how injured you are I don't think you ever want to miss a Boxing Day test, so I think everyone will definitely be 100 per cent fit for this one."

event_or_fact.property: It's looking good, he's come over here confident, and he said he's holding the bat fine and all that type of thing.; It doesn't matter how sore you are or how injured you are I don't think you ever want to miss a Boxing Day test, so I think everyone will
It's always going to be there, we fight hard in the field and the emotions come out

description.hltext_display: スナイデル：「アヤックスの監督になりたい」
description.content: ［Goal.com］ インテルＭＦヴェスレイ・スナイデルが、母国オランダの『フットボール・インターナショナル』に対し、将来は古巣アヤックスの指揮官になりたいとの希望を明かした。「いつかアヤックスに戻り、監督をすることができたら、本当にファンタスティックだろうね。そしてそうなれると思っている。指揮官として成功するための物が、自分にはあると思っているよ」また、ユトレヒト出身のスナイデルは、キャリアの最後に地元のクラブでプレーすることも頭にあるようだ。「キャリアの終盤にユトレヒトへ戻る？ クラブに成功をもたらしたフランス・ファン・セウメレンとは、コンスタントに連絡しているんだ。彼のプランが好きなんだよ。彼がやることのすべてには、必ずアイディアがあるんだ」

description.hltext_display: Boudreau gets pass on cursing
description.content:
Boudreau is a former player and coach with the Komets. Boudreau�s expletive-filled rant at his struggling team during the first episode of HBO�s �24/7� series about Washington and the Pittsburgh Penguins has drawn plenty of buzz ? and admonishment from his mother.
But Bettman called it a natural part of �the ultimate reality show.� �You�re watching a team and in particular a coach going through a very difficult time,� Bettman said at a media breakfast Tuesday to promote the Winter Classic between the two teams. �No one in this room is prudish enough to think that locker room language isn�t coarse.� Boudreau didn�t have a lot to curse about Tuesday night as Andrew Gordon had a goal and assist for his first two NHL points, and the Washington Capitals earned their second straight victory by beating the New Jersey Devils 5-1.
Washington is enjoying a winning streak after snapping an eight-game losing streak with a victory at Ottawa on Sunday. John Carlson added a goal and an assist, and Michal Neuvirth made 35 saves.
The Capitals jumped back over Atlanta into first place in the Southeast Division.
The Devils (9-22-2), who have the second-worst record in the NHL, dropped their ninth straight road game and third overall. New Jersey got even at 1 when Patrik Elias scored a power-play goal 4:56 of the second period, but the Capitals then took over.
New Jersey has scored only 10 goals in seven games.
Washington took command during a stretch of 6:31 in the second period when Jay Beagle, Jason Chimera and Carlson scored to make it 4-1. Mike Knuble netted the final goal for the Capitals, who had points from 12 players.
BLUE JACKETS 3, FLAMES 1: Mathieu Garon made 29 saves in his debut as the No. 1 goalie, and host Columbus snapped a four-game losing streak.
Jakub Voracek, Jared Boll and Rostislav Klesla, scored for Columbus, which had only two wins in 12 games.
Olli Jokinen had the lone goal for Calgary, which lost its third straight.
Rookie Henrik Karlsson made 34 stops in his seventh outing of the season for the Flames.
BLUES 4, THRASHERS 2: At Atlanta, Ty Conklin stopped 37 shots and Alexander Steen gave St. Louis the lead for good with a goal late in the second period.
The Blues led 3-1 before Dustin Byfuglien scored for Atlanta with 7:23 remaining. Atlanta�s best chance to pull even came when B.J. Crombeen was called for slashing with 1:58 left.
The Thrashers pulled goalie Chris Mason for an extra skater, but an empty-net goal by Vladimir Sobotka in the final minute clinched the win for the Blues.
Brad Boyes and Alex Pietrangelo also scored for St. Louis.
Bryan Little scored Atlanta�s first goal in the first period.
SABRES 5, DUCKS 2: Tyler Ennis scored two goals to lift host Buffalo.
Ryan Miller, making his 11th straight start, earned his 199th NHL win. His shutout bid was spoiled when Corey Perry scored a power-play goal with 4:24 to go in regulation. Miller finished with 21 saves.
Craig Rivet had a goal and assist, Drew Stafford and Nathan Gerbe also scored, and Derek Roy and Jordan Leopold added a pair of assists each for the Sabres.
Perry added a second goal, and backup Curtis McElhinney made 37 saves for Anaheim.

description.hltext_display: Tuesday Night Flights
description.content:
Flight of the concord grapes. Related Events
Staff PickMembers Pick
Tuesday Night Flights@ Grape Escape
Tuesdays, 5 p.m.
3 going/interested
Related Locations
Boise Downtown 800 W. Idaho St.
208-368-0200
(based on 2 user reviews)
Pug Ostling, the purveyor of Boise's Grape Escape, recently said that the "right" wine is the one that you like. Oh so true. Wine drinkers know that a grilled rib eye begs for a full-bodied red, and that a spicy Thai dish pairs well with a pinot grigio. Roasted chicken in a cream sauce? Bring on the chardonnay. Margherita pizza? Perhaps a nice syrah. But who says that these "rules" are steadfast? Ostling says to go with the one that grabs you--and he should know, he has run Grape Escape for 35 years. The wine bar and eatery has been offering wine flights--a great way to taste and compare several wines at once--for 16 of them. He and his staff, including chef Josh Jeffrey who was recently brought on (see boiseweekly.com for more), are committed to lining 'em up and providing a mid-week opportunity to find the one that makes you sit back and forget the daily grind for a while.
Grab a table inside or brave the weather and plant yourself on the patio to people watch on one of downtown Boise's busiest corners. Wine flights consist of five samples of different wines for $5, $6 or $7, depending on which ones spark your interest. Ostling and his staff are willing and more than able to help the novice wine drinker make a selection and to offer extra info to connoisseurs. If you didn't know before, you do now--there's a new day of the week to look forward to: T.G.I.Tuesday.

description.hltext_display: Thanks to J.J. Barea, Jason Kidd could be better than ever when Mavericks need him most
description.author: EDDIE SEFKO
description.content:
ORLANDO -- Jason Kidd played just over 33 minutes Tuesday night against Orlando. On Monday, he put in more than 38 minutes worth of duty at Miami.
That is the sort of back-to-back playing time that he hasn’t had very often this season. But because of sensible playing time up to now, it means Kidd is capable of putting in bigger minutes with less of a fatigue factor on occasion.
For the year, he continues to average less than 33 minutes per game, a huge improvement on the 36 minutes he averaged last season.
The reduced minutes, made possible because J.J. Barea has done a solid job running the team for longer stretches, are going to serve Kidd well down the line. And in tough matches like the last two games, it allows Kidd to air out his court time to whatever is needed, knowing that it’s not going to happen every night.
Having a fluky five-day break after the Orlando game doesn’t hurt, either. And there is no way the Mavericks are going to make Kidd play any obscenely high minutes during the regular season.
"In the big picture, we know there’s going to be an occasional 37 or 38 minute night,’’ coach Rick Carlisle said. "We’re always keeping these things in our mind and I don’t see any scenario where on a consistent basis we’ll be running his minutes up high.’’
That’s the wise course of action. And because of that strategy, it’s OK to blow out Kidd’s minutes when the need is really there.
• • •
