description.hltext_display: Correcting the Calcium Myth: Functional Medicine Authority Explains the Real Role of Calcium in Osteoporosis
description.content:
(EMAILWIRE.COM, December 22, 2010 ) Greenville, SC – In the name of strong bones, Americans are swallowing billions of calcium tablets every year. According to a leading Functional Medicine practitioner, however, most of the calcium consumed in this way ends up being flushed down the toilet. Because of misconceptions about the relationship between calcium and osteoporosis, health-conscious consumers who rely on calcium supplements to protect their bones are not only wasting money but also missing their actual opportunity to prevent osteoporosis (www.yourmedicaldetective.com ).
“Osteoporosis is not a deficiency of calcium in the bone,” explains Dr. Ron Grisanti, D.C., the founder of Functional Medicine University, a post-graduate medical training program. “Rather, it is a breakdown in the matrix of the bone. If you have ever watched a construction crew creating a concrete sidewalk, you probably saw them pouring concrete over metal rods or mesh. You can think of the concrete as the minerals of the bone and the reinforcing rods as the bone matrix. If they poured concrete without the reinforcing rods, in no time the concrete would crumble and fall apart. The same is true of bone. When its fibrous protein matrix deteriorates, the bone cannot hold minerals, and it begins to lose mineral density over time.”
It takes a healthy balance of all essential minerals to prevent osteoporosis, Dr. Grisanti notes. Adding calcium only, by taking calcium supplements, doesn’t affect deficiencies in the other ingredients equally needed for healthy bone formation – including silica, magnesium, manganese, copper, selenium, iodine and phosphorus. “If the fibrous tissue of the bone couldn’t hold the calcium it already had, it can’t hold the calcium in a supplement, either,” he notes. “In fact, one very interesting study showed that supplementing all the minerals other than calcium cut the amount of bone loss in half for osteoporosis patients.”
Dr. Grisanti recommends the Essential Mineral Blood Test to determine whether or not the body has the right balance of nutrients for strong and healthy bones.

description.hltext_display: Hochpustertaler Dolce Vita in den Post Alpina-Hotels
description.author: Veröffentlicht von mkSalzburg
description.content: Die Hochpustertaler Familie Wachtler ist seit drei Generationen in der Gastronomie tätig. Heute betreibt sie rund um Innichen, vor der bizarren Kulisse der Südtiroler Dolomiten, drei hervorragende Adressen: Das Dolce Vita Family Chalet Post Alpina****, das Dolce Vita Alpina Posthotel**** und die Dolce Vita Alpina Postresidence***. (firmenpresse) - Alle drei Häuser haben sie sich dem süßen Leben verschrieben und dem ganz individuellen Urlaubserlebnis. Egal ob man in Vierschachen in einem Chalet mit heimeliger Almdorfatmosphäre, Wellnessoase Vita Alpina und allem Komfort residieren möchte, in einem Viersternehotel in Innichen mit allem Drum und Dran oder in einem Appartement, in dem man die Annehmlichkeiten des Hotels ebenso in Anspruch nehmen kann, in Wachters Post-Alpina-Adressen steht individueller Urlaubsgenuss an erster Stelle. Die Kleinen ab drei Jahren sind im Miniclub sechs Tage pro Woche bestens betreut. Für die reinweißen Seiten des Winters stehen die sieben Skigebiete des Hochpustertals und die weiteren weltberühmten Pisten von Dolomiti Superski im Umkreis. Erreichbar ist Innichen einfach aus allen Himmelsrichtungen, von München sind es etwa 3,5 Stunden. AnreiseDolce Vita Family Chalet Post Alpina**** -Auto (D, A): A22 Brennerautobahn Ausfahrt Brixen Richtung Bruneck 30 km weiter bis Innichen (durch das Dorf 4 km weiter Richtung österreichische Grenze nach Vierschach) -Bahn (D, A): Südbahn: Wien Villach Spittal Lienz Innichen auf Wunsch Shuttle ins Hotel -Flug (D): Flughafen Bozen/I (105 km entfernt) Flughafen Innsbruck/A (134 km entfernt) Chaleturlaub im Vierschachener Almdorf 2006 hat sich Familie Wachtler mit dem Dolce Vita Family Chalet Post Alpina im charmanten Ort Vierschach bei Innichen einen Lebenstraum erfüllt: Die zehn urigen Chalets sind wie in einem Pustertaler Almdorf um ein Haupthaus angelegt. Sie sind 40 bis 126 Quadratmeter groß und bieten von der Alpina Residence bis zum Dolce Vita Chalet heimeligen Viersternekomfort. Praktischerweise liegen sie direkt an der Skiabfahrt des Helm, der wiederum mit Sexten zu einer Skischaukel verbunden ist. Im Haupthaus der Post-Chalets sorgt die Wellnesswelt Vita Alpina mit einem In- und Outdoorpool, einer Finnischen und einer Crystal-Sauna, einem Dampfbad, einem Beauty-Tempel, eigenen Familienbereichen und zahlreichen Anwendungsbereichen für Massagen, Bäder, Packungen und Behandlungen für zwei, die sich gern haben, für Entspannung pur. Kulinarisch schlägt man an der Grenze zu Österreich die Brücke zwischen traditioneller Hochpustertaler Kochkunst, der mediterranen cucina italiana und der österreichischen Küche. Knödelvariationen und Gerstsuppe sollten Feinschmecker bei einem Besuch im Dolce Vita Family Chalet Post Alpina unbedingt einmal probieren. Für die jüngsten Familienmitglieder gibt es eine eigene Karte. Wer lieber in seinem Chalet diniert, der kann aus der Take-away-Karte sein Abendessen auswählen und nach Hause liefern lassen. Das ist auch praktisch für Kinder, die sich in den Chalets über viel Platz von 40 bis 166 m2 und heimeliges Familienleben freuen können. In dem Mitgliedsbetrieb der Südtiroler Familienhotels kommen Kids auch in vielen weiteren Punkten groß raus: im täglichen Miniclub, im Spielraum mit Tischfußball, einer Playstation, im Kinderkino oder bei einem Besuch der Ställe der Bauern in der Nachbarschaft. InklusivleistungenDolce Vita Family Chalet Post Alpina**** -Anreise: 1 kostenloser Garagenplatz pro App. kostenloser Transfer BahnhofHotel bei An- und Abreise -Wellness: Hallenschwimmbad beheizter Außenpool Sauna & more-Bereich Relax-Ruheraum mit Wasserbetten Fitnessraum mit Nautilus-Geräten -Skifahren: Skipass direkt an der Rezeption Anmeldung zum Skikurs direkt im Hotel Begleitung der Kinder zum Treffpunkt mit dem Skilehrer Skiraum Skiverleih direkt im Haus -Kinder: Miniclub für Kinder ab 3 von Mo. bis Sa. von 16 bis 22 Uhr Kinderspielraum Playstation, Tischtennis und Tischfussball Kinderkino abwechslungsreiches Wochenprogramm Kinderspielplatz im Freien Hotelurlaub in Innichens Traditionsadresse Der Traditionsbetrieb der Familie Wachtler steht im Zentrum von Innichen: Das Dolce Vita Alpina Posthotel**** wurde durch die Arbeit von drei Generationen zu dem, was es heute ist: ein charmantes Viersternehotel im Südtiroler Pustertal, in dem sich gewachsene Gastfreundschaft mit italienischer Leichtigkeit verbinden. Karl und Wilma Wachtler führen als Seniorchefs mit den Kindern Barbara und Andreas den Betrieb. Die vielen Stammgäste schätzen die mit stilvollen Möbeln ausgestatteten Zimmer und die traditionellen Stuben. Die Küche des Hauses variiert gekonnt zwischen Südtiroler Spezialitäten von Knödeln bis Schlutzer und mediterranen Genüssen, etwa ausgezeichnetem Meeresfischen. Zum Ausspannen laden die Panoramadachterrasse vor den Zinnen der Dolomiten, das Hallenbad und die Sauna im Hotel sowie die Vita Alpina im vier Kilometer entfernten Dolce Vita Family Chalet Post Alpina in Vierschach ein. Alle Einrichtungen des Dolce Vita Alpina Posthotels stehen übrigens auch den Gästen des Appartementhauses Dolce Vita Alpina Postresidence zur Verfügung, auch der Miniclub für die Kleinen ab drei Jahren, der zwischen 16 und 22 Uhr von Animateuren betreut wird. InklusivleistungenDolce Vita Alpina Posthotel**** & Dolce Vita Alpina Postresidence*** -Anreise: Parkplatz einige Meter vom Hotel entfernt (Garage: 9 Euro pro Tag) kostenloser Transfer vom Bahnhof ins Hotel bei der An- und Abreise -Wellness: Hallenschwimmbad Finnische Sauna Türkisches Dampfbad (weitere Wellnessbehandlungen im Schwesterbetrieb Post Alpina in Vierschach) -Skifahren: Skipass direkt an der Rezeption Anmeldung zum Skikurs direkt im Hotel gratis Shuttlebus vom Hotel zum Skiberg Haunold Begleitung der Kinder zum Treffpunkt mit dem Skilehrer Skiraum 10 % Rabatt auf Ski und Skischuhe vom Partner Papin Sport -Kinder: Miniclub für Kinder ab 3 Jahren täglich von 16 bis 22 Uhr Kinderanimation (Dezember bis März) Kinderspielraum Kinderkino abwechslungsreiches Wochenprogramm Kinderspielplatz im Freien 6.171 Zeichen Abdruck honorarfrei, Belegexemplar erbeten! description.hltext_display: Santa Claus to visit aquarium
description.author: Maryjean Cannata
description.content:
WOODS HOLE —
Santa Claus will make his annual visit to the Woods Hole Science Aquarium on Thursday, Dec. 23, 4 to 6 p.m. The aquarium, operated by NOAA’s Northeast Fisheries Science Center, is normally open on Thursdays from 11 a.m. to 4 p.m., but will remain open until 6 p .m. on Dec. 23 for this special visit. An art activity for younger children will be provided, and light snacks will be served. Admission is free. For further information go to nefsc.noaa.gov/press.

description.hltext_display: TOSHIBA: NEI NEGOZI GIAPPONESI ARRIVA LA PRIMA TV IN 3D SENZA OCCHIALI
description.content:
(ASCA-AFP) - Tokyo, 22 dic - Arriva la prima tv in 3D che non ha bisogno di occhiali speciali per creare l'illusione di profondita' dell'immagine. A lanciarla oggi sul mercato giapponese e' Toshiba.
Uno dei primi esemplari del Regza GL1 e' stato esposto in vetrina da un negozio nel pieno centro di Tokyo, scatenando la curiosita' dei passanti. Al momento e' in vendita solo il modello da 12 pollici al prezzo di 1.400 dollari, ma gia' da sabato sara' disponibile il modello da 20 pollici.red-luq/cam/rob

description.hltext_display: Disminuidos Bucks vencen a Lakers en Los Angeles
description.content:
LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Los campeones defensores del baloncesto de la NBA, Los Angeles Lakers, fueron sorprendidos y humillados el martes en su casa por unos disminuidos Milwaukee Bucks, que los derrotaron por 98-79.
De regreso en un entorno familiar después de ganar cinco de sus últimos seis partidos como visitantes, los Lakers no pudieron mantener su consistencia contra un equipo que no contó con Brandon Jennings debido a una lesión.
Earl Boykins anotó 22 puntos como suplente para los Bucks, incluidos cuatro triples, mientras que el escolta John Salmons contribuyó con 20 tantos y el atacante Ersan Ilyasova sumó 17.
Fue un desempeño inspirado del visitante, que disputó su segundo partido desde que se supo que Jennings estaría ausente al menos cuatro semanas con una fractura al pie izquierdo.
El escolta Kobe Bryant marcó 21 puntos para los Lakers, que tuvieron un porcentaje de efectividad desde el campo del 46 por ciento, en una noche para el olvido comparado con el 51 por ciento de Milwaukee.
El español Pau Gasol marcó 15 tantos y Lamar Odom sumó 12, mientras Los Angeles bajó su rendimiento a 21-8 esta temporada.
Los Bucks, que habían perdido sus anteriores tres partidos, tuvieron un comienzo sorpresivamente fuerte, poniéndose dos veces al frente por siete puntos antes de que terminasen el primer cuarto ganando 25-22.
Los suplentes Shannon Brown y Matt Barnes ayudaron a encender una remontada de Los Angeles en el segundo cuarto antes de un lapso flojo que los dejó perdiendo 50-46 en el mediotiempo.
Los Lakers nuevamente lograron remontar, un tiro de Gasol igualó el marcador 63-63, antes de que los Bucks terminasen el tercer cuarto con una ventaja de cuatro puntos sin respuesta con el marcador 72-66.
Con una sorprendente victoria a la vista y los Lakers siendo abucheados por un estadio lleno, Milwaukee logró un final convincente.
El escolta reserva Boykins marcó dos triples antes de que Andrew Bogut diera a los Bucks una ventaja de 13 puntos con una bandeja inversa cuando restaban cuatro minutos y 26 segundos en el reloj -la mayor de la noche.
Otro triple de Boykins puso a los visitantes 92-77 al frente antes de que Bryant fuera expulsado del juego por una segunda falta técnica, mientras los aficionados desencantados de los Lakers se dirigían a las salidas.
Los Lakers enfrentarán su mayor prueba de la temporada el sábado, cuando reciban a LeBron James y a los Miami Heat el día de Navidad.
El próximo partido de los Bucks será el jueves de visitantes contra Sacramento Kings.
(Editado en Español por Ricardo Figueroa)

description.hltext_display: 109-117. Ellis dirige el ataque y triunfo de los Warriors
description.content:
Redacción (EEUU), 21 dic (EFE).- Monta Ellis anotó nueve de sus 36 puntos en el tiempo de prórroga y llevó a los Warriors de Golden State a una victoria por 109-117 sobre los Kings de Sacramento.
Los Warriors (10-18), que habían perdido 14 de los últimos 16 partidos, remontaron una desventaja de 16 puntos en el último cuarto para forzar el partido a la prórroga.
Reggie Williams aportó 24 puntos, el alero Dorell Wrigh consiguió 17 y David Lee agregó 15 puntos y 12 rebotes para los Warriors.
Mientras que Beno Udrih consiguió su mejor anotación en su carrera, con 34 puntos, y Carl Landry salió del banquillo para conseguir 22 puntos y 10 rebotes para los Kings, que han perdido seis partidos consecutivos y 20 de los últimos 22 disputados.
Con su derrota los Kings se mantienen con la peor marca de la liga con registro de 5-21.
El escolta dominicano Francisco García aportó cinco puntos en 23 minutos de acción, al encestar 2 de 8 tiros de campo, incluido 1 de 5 triples, logró tres rebotes y entregó tres asistencias.EFE

description.hltext_display: Euro se detiene en Asia cerca de mínimos contra franco suizo
description.content:
TOKIO (Reuters) - El euro se detenía en Asia tras caer a nuevos mínimos contra el franco suizo y el dólar australiano, pero la moneda única estaba atrapada en un lento descenso, en opinión de operadores.
La agencia de calificación Moody's advirtió que podría recortar el rating de Portugal mientras que Fitch podría hacer lo mismo con Grecia.
"Aunque se puede suponer que el mercado se había vuelto insensible a estas noticias, la evidencia sugiere lo contrario ante una ampliación de los spreads de los periféricos y la presión para el euro", dijo David Watt, estratega de divisas de RBC Dominion en una nota a cliente.
(Reporte adicional de Wayne Cole y Reuters Analyst Krishna Kumar en Sídney; Traducido por la Redacción de Madrid; Editado por Ricardo Figueroa)

description.hltext_display: 政府資助一千多萬辦電視頒獎禮及音樂節
description.content:
政府將撥款一千多萬元資助明年3月舉辦的亞洲「彩虹獎」電視頒獎典禮及香港亞洲流行音樂節。
彩虹獎由香港電視專業人員協會舉辦，用以表揚亞洲區內優秀電視作品，預算需要一千萬元以上製作費。
政府會透過「創意智優計劃」資助其中530萬元，另外政府會透過同樣計劃撥款547萬元，資助由國際唱片業協會舉辦的音樂節，音樂節會有7個國家及地區的歌手參與，兩項活動除了香港市民可以觀賞，亦會透過電視轉播至亞洲其他地區，預計數千萬觀眾能夠收看。

description.hltext_display: Nikkei cierra con baja después de máximo 7 meses intradía
description.content:
TOKIO (Reuters) - El índice Nikkei cerró con ligera baja el miércoles tras alejarse del máximo de siete meses que tocó durante la sesión y unos comentarios bajistas del primer ministro sobre la economía.
El Gobierno rebajó su visión sobre el sentimiento exportador y empresarial debido a una desaceleración de la recuperación económica en Asia y un yen persistentemente alto. Asimismo, dijo que la economía está en punto muerto y en una situación difícil por la alta tasa de desempleo.
La tónica de fondo en el mercado, de reducida actividad por las fiestas navideñas, seguía fuerte, permitiendo que el Nikkei alcanzara durante la jornada su mejor nivel desde 14 de mayo.
El índice Nikkei cerró con baja de 24,05 puntos, un 0,23 por ciento, a 10.346,48 tras abrir a 10.348,48 y oscilar entre 10.327,60 y 10.394,22.
(Traducido por la Redacción de Madrid; Editado por Ricardo Figueroa)

description.hltext_display: Euro sale de mínimos, persisten dudas por crisis de deuda Europa
description.content:
SINGAPUR (Reuters) - El euro recuperó parte de sus pérdidas contra las principales divisas el miércoles, pero las señales de que la crisis de deuda de la zona euro está lejos de terminar mantendrán a la moneda única a la defensiva.
Los mercados de acciones de Asia mantuvieron sus ganancias del martes en las pocas operaciones previas a las fiestas después de previsiones optimistas y un flujo de actividades de fusiones levantó a las acciones europeas y de Wall Street, empujando a las acciones de Estados Unidos a máximos no vistos en más de dos años.
El euro alcanzó mínimos récord en las primeras operaciones en Asia frente al franco Suizo y el dólar australiano de alta rentabilidad y operaba cerca de un mínimo de tres semanas contra el dólar después de advertencias a Portugal y Grecia de que enfrentarían más rebajas de sus índices.
Pero la poca liquidez y los rumores de ofertas de los bancos centrales de Asia para prestar algo de apoyo. Un reporte de que Pekín ha prometido una mayor "acción concertada" para ayudar a Europa a estabilizar su sistema financiero. También parece ofrecer a algunos jugadores una excusa para recortar sus posiciones en euros.
Según el Financial Times, los funcionarios, que declinaron ser identificados, dijeron que el viceprimer ministro Wang Qishan entregó garantías de que China aumentaría su apoyo a los esfuerzos de estabilización de Europa "si fuese necesario".
El euro subió un 0,2 por ciento contra el dólar en el día hasta 1,3124 dólares, pero analistas técnicos de Credit Suisse dijeron en una nota que el euro necesita superar los 1.3250 puntos para evitar el ser presionado por debajo de los 1.30 dólares esta semana.
Analistas esperan que el euro siga bajo presión por una constante publicación de noticias de ratings desfavorables. Muchos sostienen que los mercados ya estaban dando una valoración aún más oscura a los miembros más débiles de la zona euro -Grecia, Portugal, España, Irlanda y Bélgica- y que las agencias de calificación estaban actuando para ponerse al día.
La posibilidad de que las grandes deudas acumuladas durante la crisis financiera mundial plague a los gobiernos europeos durante años también pesó en la moneda británica, ya que la libra esterlina terminó cerca de mínimos de tres meses después de las noticias de requerimientos récord de préstamos.
Sin embargo, la penumbra no es universal y los mercados de acciones lograron sacar pequeñas ganancias, apoyados por las expectativas de una revisión al alza en Estados Unidos del PIB para el tercer trimestre, la que debería conocerse a las 1330 GMT.
Las acciones en Tokio inicialmente se acercaron a un nuevo máximo de siete meses después del salto de un 1,5 por ciento en la sesión del martes, pero perdieron algo de terreno en la sesión de la tarde al ceder un 0,2 por ciento.
"En las divisas y los mercados de bonos europeos la aversión al riesgo está prevaleciendo. Pero en muchos otros mercados hemos visto la toma de riesgos", dijo Tohru Sasaki, estratega jefe de JPMorgan Chase Bank en Tokio.
La noticia de una sorpresiva caída en los inventarios de crudo de Estados Unidos y de una ola de frío en el país y en Europa llevaron brevemente los precios del crudo sobre los 90 dólares el barril -un nivel que ha alcanzado sólo dos veces en los últimos dos años. Los futuros para febrero eventualmente se ajustaron justo por debajo de la marca de los 9 dólares, ganando 11 centavos en el día.
El oro, que se beneficia de las rachas de angustia de los inversores como resultado de su condición de refugio, subía cerca de 5 dólares la onza en el día, hasta 1.390 dólares, apoyado por las preocupaciones de deuda de la zona euro, pero bien por debajo de su máximo histórico de 1.430 dólares que alcanzó anteriormente este mes.
(Reporte adicional de Asian bureaus; Editado en Español por Ricardo Figueroa)

description.hltext_display: Crecerá economía japonesa 1.5 por ciento en 2011
description.content:
Tokio, 22 Dic (Notimex).- La economía japonesa crecerá 1.5 por ciento en términos reales durante el año fiscal 2011, una baja respecto al actual periodo en que se espera alza de 3.1 por ciento, indicó hoy la Oficina del Gabinete de este país.
La baja se atribuyó al consumo privado que se mantiene débil mientras
Para el año fiscal 2011, que inicia en abril próximo, se prevé que para mediados del año siguiente el índice de precios se mantenga sin cambio, luego de su caída en cifras anualizadas, pero sin que signifique la detención de la crónica deflación japonesa.
La cifra de crecimiento de 3.1 por ciento para este año es una actualización del pronóstico previo que se ubicaba en 2.6 por ciento, y se originó en el crecimiento de la producción doméstica gracias a la política gubernamental de estímulos.
El fin de esos programas, que incluyó subsidios para la compra de automóviles y aparatos domésticos amigables con el medio ambiente, afectará la expansión de la economía, añadió el reporte.
Datos recientes muestran que la producción industrial empieza a caer, en particular entre los fabricantes de automóviles, en línea con el fin de los estímulos en 2011.

description.hltext_display: El aeropuerto de Heathrow aumenta los vuelos tras el caos por el frío
description.content:
Londres, 22 dic (EFE).- El aeropuerto londinense de Heathrow, el mayor de Europa, aumentará el número de vuelos tras el caos de los últimos días por culpa de la nieve caída en el Reino Unido, donde los servicios ferroviarios también se han visto afectados.
Según informaron hoy fuentes de ese aeropuerto, Heathrow espera operar dos tercios de sus vuelos, después de que ayer reabriera su segunda pista una vez que los servicios de limpieza retiraran por completo la nieve que la cubría desde el pasado sábado.
Pese a todo, Heathrow ha pedido a los pasajeros que se pongan en contacto con sus respectivas aerolíneas antes de viajar hasta la terminal aérea para asegurarse de que sus vuelos operarán hoy.
"Ahora trabajamos con las aerolíneas para volver al programa normal lo antes posible. Lamentamos mucho los trastornos que el tiempo causa a nuestros pasajeros", señaló un comunicado de Heathrow.
El pasado sábado, Heathrow se vio obligado a cerrar por completo y funcionó bajo mínimos durante los tres días posteriores.
Otros aeropuertos británicos han advertido de que habrá problemas en sus servicios, especialmente en los de Edimburgo (Escocia), Birmingham (centro de Inglaterra) y Gatwick (sur de Londres).
Miles de británicos debían haber viajado en los últimos días al extranjero, según la asociación de viajes Abta, que calcula en cuatro millones los ciudadanos de este país que quieren pasar las Navidades en el extranjero.
El Eurostar, el tren que une Londres con París y Bruselas, tendrá hoy un servicio casi normal, ya que operará 43 de los 53 servicios, informó la compañía, si bien pidió que sólo los pasajeros que tienen billetes para viajar hoy se presenten apenas una hora antes de la hora de salida del tren en la estación londinense de St. Pancras.
Las esperas de pasajeros que querían viajar en el Eurostar desde Pancras llegaron el lunes hasta ocho horas.
La nieve ha causado un auténtico caos en los distintos medios de transportes, incluidos los ferroviarios y por carretera, lo que ha creado problemas para miles de personas que por estas fechas viaja en automóvil para visitar a sus familias con motivo de la Navidad.
En algunas zonas de Inglaterra los servicios ferroviarios sufren retrasos y algunas cancelaciones.
Los responsables de la red de carreteras han advertido a los automovilistas que viajen sólo si es absolutamente necesario después de que muchos de ellos desoyesen anteriores mensajes en ese sentido y se viesen atrapados en las carreteras.
El Servicio Meteorológico ha informado de que se esperan más nevadas en Gales, noroeste y este de Inglaterra. EFE

description.hltext_display: 10 airport security tips to remember before you go
description.content:
10 security-line tips for travelers from the Transportation Security Administration:
â€” Bring proper ID: that means a passport, a driver's license or a military ID.
â€” Don't forget your boarding pass.
â€” Put large liquids in checked luggage. Otherwise, put 3.4 ounce (100ml) bottles or less in one quart-sized, clear, plastic, zip-top bag. One bag per passenger allowed.
â€” Take all loose items like coins, keys and phones out of your pockets and place them in a bin at the security checkpoint. Better yet, keep all of that in your carry-on until you go through security.
â€” Wear slip-on shoes.
â€” Remember to remove laptops and other electronics from your carry-on for extra screening.
â€” Put your winter coat in your carry on or in your checked bag â€” this saves time from having to take it off in the security line.
â€” Don't try to board with hazardous items. Sharp objects such as knives and ski poles are prohibited in carry on bags. Place those things in your checked luggage. Same goes for baseball bats, hockey sticks and most tools.
â€” Certain items like fireworks and flammable paints are always banned in checked and carry-on luggage.
â€” Be nice. Don't threaten the TSA agent, don't joke about bombs and don't get physical with the screener. The more pleasant you are, the quicker the security process will be.

description.hltext_display: UNIVERSITA': GELMINI, DISAGIO GIOVANI MERITA RISPOSTE RESPONSABILI
description.content:
(ASCA) - Roma, 22 dic - ''Il disagio di parte del mondo giovanile merita adeguate risposte da chi ha responsabilita' di governo. La stessa responsabilita' pero' impone preliminarmente il dovere della verita' e non consente proposte demagogiche impossibili da realizzare''. Inizia cosi' la lettera aperta che il ministro dell'Istruzione Mariastella Gelmini ha inviato al direttore del Corriere della Sera.
Il ministro sostiene che ''e' innegabile che, oggi, le aspettative dei giovani siano peggiori di quelle dei loro padri. Continuare a rimandare le decisioni significa solo lasciar persistere un vuoto.
Concordo pienamente che istruzione, lavoro e welfare - sottolinea la Gelmini - siano i punti fondamentali per delineare corrette politiche in favore delle nuove generazioni. Su questi stessi temi infatti abbiamo ragionato, per assicurare ai nostri ragazzi le tutele e le garanzie necessarie per affrontare il mondo del lavoro''. La riforma dell'istruzione tecnica e professionale, ad esempio, rileva la Gelmini, ''punta all'innalzamento della qualita' della formazione, per combattere l'abbandono scolastico e creare professionalita' necessarie al mondo del lavoro''.fdv/cam/rob

description.hltext_display: 國家宗教事務局反駁梵蒂岡批評「冒失無理」
description.content:
國家宗教事務局反駁梵蒂岡日前針對中國天主教全國代表會議的批評，認為「非常冒失，而且十分無理」。
梵蒂岡本月17日發表聲明，強烈譴責中國天主教全國代表會議選出新領導層，認為是違反宗教自由和人權，並已損害教廷與北京之間的對話與信任氣氛。
國家宗教事務局發言人說，中國天主教愛國會、中國天主教主教團是依法登記的合法團體，每5年召開代表會議，修改章程，選舉產生領導機構，確定工作任務和行動目標。中國天主教代表會議制度不涉及天主教教義問題，不違背天主教基本信仰，不存在其他國家或外國組織承認與否的問題。

description.hltext_display: Redlands: Dog park wins council approval
description.content:
Six years after fundraising began for a dog park in Redlands, the City Council on Tuesday approved plans to build one at Ford Park.
Redlands Unleashed Fidos and Friends, or RUFF, has raised about $75,000 for construction of the city's first dog park, much of it through small contributions.
"A lesser group would have given up," Councilman Paul Foster said in commending the group.
The organization's members cheered loudly when the council unanimously approved an agreement that calls for RUFF to build the 1.2-acre off-leash park, including fencing, gates, benches and other amenities. The city will install a short rural road and parking area, surfaced with ground-up asphalt to be recycled from a city paving project planned on Church and Center streets and Alessandro Road, said Rosemary Hoerning, city utilities and engineering director.
The parking lot almost became a stumbling block for RUFF. The group did not anticipate paying to construct a lot and argued that it wasn't necessary because existing lots at the park in eastern Redlands were adequate.
"We have the financial resources for a dog park," Richard Feenstra, the group's construction manager, told the council on Tuesday. "But we're encumbered by the requirement for a $100,000 parking lot."
The council will consider a contract for the street resurfacing project on Jan. 4, and will include a requirement that the contractor deliver the grindings to Ford Park, where city workers will spread and compact them.
The park will offer separate areas for large and small dogs. RUFF members have agreed to continue fundraising to cover ongoing costs of maintenance, including trash collection.
Last spring the group hosted three fundraising bicycle rides as part of the Redlands Bicycle Classic, earning about $4,000. The group hopes to make the rides an annual fundraiser.
RUFF member Jeff Screnka told the council that the group is ready to build the park.
"We hope to have a groundbreaking soon so the community can see that we really are going to build this dog park," he said.
Reach Jan Sears at 951-368-9477 or jsears@PE.com

description.hltext_display: Ian Hart & Domhnall Gleeson
description.content:
Ian Hart, 46, and Domhnall Gleeson, 27, star in BBC Two drama When Harvey Met Bob on 26 December. It examines the working relationship between Live Aid's Harvey Goldsmith and Bob Geldof.
Domhnall also features in Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows: Part 1, and the Coen brothers' version of True Grit, which hits UK cinemas on 14 January.
Ian, how did you get the Harvey Goldsmith look?
I have got a bit of weight on me in the form of a padded suit, just to add on a few pounds. I did put on about a stone, but that wasn't sufficient, which I still haven't lost. I'm half way there. It's actually not that bad a resemblance thanks to the creative talents of the make-up department and the hair department.
Domhnall, how easy or hard was it playing Bob Geldof?
I worked very hard on trying to get the physicality and get the vocal thing across. Whether I'm successful or not, I guess other people will be the judge of that. None of it is a million miles away from where I am so I was quite lucky.
When Harvey Met Bob was a pretty speedy production wasn't it?
Ian: There's a lot to be done in a short space of time, but that's the nature of the beast. I enjoyed it. It's one of the most pleasant jobs and enjoyable jobs I've done in a long, long time.
Domhnall: It was a very short shoot, 16 days shooting, which isn't a lot at all, so there was a fervour when we were shooting and an on edge feel about the whole thing. That was great because you can only imagine what it was like trying to get Live Aid together in something like three months or whatever it was. I think it lent itself to it actually.
Ian, how was it working with Domhnall?
Lovely! I'm a big fan of Dom Gleeson's. He is fabulous. I think he's a lovely actor, a lovely human being and a lovely man to be with. That's probably part of why I had such a good time. Everybody on the job was in good form. It was a very pleasant environment.
"It was a very short shoot...so there was a fervour when we were shooting...you can only imagine what it was like trying to get Live Aid together in something like three months or whatever it was. I think it lent itself to it actually."
Domhnall, how was it working with Ian?
He's a legend. I was so excited to work with him and when I found out he was doing it I was just over the moon, because the scenes between Bob and Harvey Goldsmith are central to the whole thing. When I heard that someone of his calibre, that I was going to be in a room with him, it just took a lot of the pressure off.
Ian, what were your memories of Live Aid?
I was working at a plastics factory in Camden in 1985 so I'd have been at work until whenever. Then I'd have gone home and had my tea, then gone to the pub. I don't have a strong memory of the day. I didn't have a TV you see in those days. It was all a blur. Last week's a blur!
Domhnall, did you meet Geldof?
No, I didn't. He read the script apparently and he approved the whole thing, so he was okay with it, and then you just kind of go your own route. I doubt he would have had much interest in meeting me and the version I had to offer mightn't have been exactly what he had in mind, so you don't want to get caught up in that.
I had the autobiography and I had the footage to look at, and there was such a strong sense of the man coming through all that stuff because he wears his heart on his sleeve. I felt that was a version of Geldof I could access myself without having to go to meet him.
"I had the autobiography and the footage to look at, and there was such a strong sense of the man coming through all that stuff because he wears his heart on his sleeve. I felt that was a version of Geldof I could access myself without having to go to meet him."
Ian, tell us about your new project, Crikey Villains.
I did a short with a friend a couple of years ago. He's fleshed that out and re-written it to a feature, so I came back and did a day as he's a mate of mine. I did about two hours' work. It's no hardship for me to do half a day's work.
Domhnall, was it fun working with your father Brendan on Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1?
Yeah, I'm in a scene with my dad in that, but I'd acted with him previously as well. It's always good to see him do his thing though I have to say.
Working with the Coen brothers on True Grit must have been an ambition.
Domhnall: Yes, that's one ticked off the list. It was a fantastic script. I was very lucky to be in it. It was the part Dennis Hopper played in the John Wayne version.
And how was it working with Jeff Bridges?
Domhnall: I'd worked with him previously actually, but he was just as good second time round if not better.
When Harvey Met Bob is shown on BBC Two on 26 December.

description.hltext_display: BREAKING NEWS: Calvo names cabinet members for education, Public Health, Agriculture, National Guard
description.content:
The Calvo-Tenorio team has named their selections to lead several agencies as well as the chief education advisor.
- Vincent Leon Guerrero, retired Department of Education Special Education deputy superintendent, will be the Governor’s Special Assistant, Chief Education Advisor
- Linda Unpingco-DeNorcey will be the Department of Public Health and Social Services director
- Leo Casil will be the Department of Public Health and Social Services deputy director
- Major Gen. Benny Paulino, U.S. Army Ret. will be the Adjutant General of the Guam National Guard
- Mariquita “Tita” Taitague will serve as Department of Agriculture director
- Miki Yokozeki-Marks will be the Governor’s Protocol Officer.
The press release provided some background information on the newly named cabinet members:
Vincent Leon Guerrero, MSW
Vincent Leon Guerrero retired as Guam's longest serving associate superintendent of Special Education (1993-2005). Under his leadership, numerous programs were developed in response to parental concerns. In particular, the early intervention program's component for autism received praise from U.S. DOE officials. He served three times on the negotiating team for the Department of Education's collective bargaining agreement, twice as chief negotiator. Leon Guerrero was also appointed to serve as acting director of education on several occasions. He retired in 2005, after 33 years of service to the government. Most recently, he worked at the University of Guam's Center for Excellence in Developmental Disabilities Education, Research, and Service (Guam CEDDERS). He holds a Bachelor in Social Service degree from San Jose State University and a Master in Social Work Degree from the University of Hawaii, Manoa.
Equally important to the economic viability of the island is the sustainability the governor-elect wants to build from the military buildup, improvements to public health and the development of agriculture.
“We are serious about hiring the best people to serve,” Lt. Governor-elect Tenorio said. “Our health, agriculture and military affairs agencies are critical to the economic sustainability. We chose the best people to serve and we’re excited they are joining our administration to help Guam.”
Linda Unpingco-DeNorcey, MPH
Unpingco-DeNorcey, MPH worked up the ranks at the Department of Public Health and Social Services, serving more than 20 years at the agency. She has held her current position of Health Services Administrator for the past 12 years. Unpingco-DeNorcey administers and manages the operations and finances of the Northern and Southern Region Community Health Centers. She also wrote grants that brought in millions of dollars that were critical to the construction, renovation, and expansion of these two federally-qualified health centers. These grants also increased medical capacity at the health centers (e.g. hiring of physicians and support staff). She holds a Bachelor of Science in Biology Degree from University of San Francisco and a Master in Public Health Degree from San Jose State University. In 2005, the federal government selected Unpingco-DeNorcey to attend the preeminent Healthcare Executive Program at the University of California, Los Angeles.
Leo Casil, MBA
Casil is a financial manager and has the expertise to help Unpingco-DeNorcey manage the tens of millions in resources to provide public health and social services to thousands on the island. He currently is the Deputy Director of Catholic Social Services and served previously as its fiscal manager. He has served in the private sector since 1983, leading his own company and working as the Controller of Calvo Enterprises. He started his career in 1969 in the U.S. Navy, then joined public service in 1973 as a statistician with the Department of Commerce. He worked his way up, becoming Deputy Director of the Bureau of Budget and Management Research, Special Assistant to the Governor for Federal Programs and Director of Administration. He holds a Bachelor of Business Administration degree from the University of Portland and a Master of Business Administration degree from the University of Guam.
Major General Benny Paulino, MPA (U.S. Army Ret.)
General Paulino was drafted to the Army in July 1970. He was commissioned as 2nd Lieutenant shortly after in September 1971. General Paulino spent 26 years in active duty service in various commands and staff positions. He spent those years in units around the world, including those stationed in Europe and Asia. He retired as a full Colonel. Following retirement, General Paulino assumed command of the Guam Army National Guard in 1996. He held that position until 2002. As Adjutant General he also had authority over the Office of Civil Defense and the Veterans Affairs Office. General Paulino served as Homeland Security Advisor to Governor Carl Gutierrez in 2002. Most recently, he chaired the Calvo Tenorio transition subcommittee on expansion and military buildup. In addition to his professional work, he is also an active volunteer at San Isidro Church in Malojloj and is the volunteer state chairman for the Employee Support of the Guard and Reserves (ESGR) on Guam. He holds a Bachelor in Mathematics degree from San Jose State University and a Master of Arts in Public Administration degree from Central Michigan University.
Mariquita “Tita” Taitague
Taitague has been a farmer for 25 years, where she built a very successful agriculture business. She is an expert in identifying supply and demand for produce production, and in planning and coordinating farm operations. She is proficient in materials management, financial management, U.S. Department of Agriculture produce reports for eligibility of farm aid and insurance, and U.S. Environmental Protection Agency certification for the purchase and restricted use of pesticides. She holds a Bachelor of Business Administration degree in Accounting from the University of Guam.
Miki Yokozeki-Marks
Yokozeki-Marks is the Director of Revenue at the Hilton Guam Resort and Spa. She has been a leader in the hospitality industry for 18 years. She previously worked for the Balboa Bay Club and Resort in New Port Beach, California as the Revenue Manager. Prior to that, she managed the revenues for five resort properties under Joibevivre Hospitality, which owns 24 properties in the San Francisco Bay Area. She built relationships all over the world in the hotel industry. Yokozeki-Marks speaks conversational Japanese. She holds an Associate in Arts degree from Santa Monica College, California.

description.hltext_display: Small Businesses With Samsung Telephone Systems Can Save Money Thanks To Abbeytelecom.com
description.content:
(EMAILWIRE.COM, December 22, 2010 ) Manchester, Lancashire - Small and medium sized businesses that have installed Korean telephone systems can now economise on alterations and adjustments to their phone systems. Small businesses do not have to call out a chargeable telecoms engineer to perform minor program tweaks to their telephone systems anymore. Abbeytelecom.com features around 60 audio visual clips that assist small businesses to alter their own telephone systems. The good news is that this is a totally complimentary service; there is no requirement to pay anything to AbbeyTelecom.com for watching them.
Small businesses are often delayed for days before a telephony engineer’s visit to implement tiny amends to their telephone system. They not only have to wait for the technician to arrive to make the modifications that they need but, they also have to cough up a considerable fee for the technician’s attendance. All these hassles can be easily overcome with the assistance of AbbeyTelecom.com.
AbbeyTelecom.com is the first phone systems company to produce such a resource and to dedicate a website for this purpose. This micro-site is earliest of its kind on the web. Currently it is hosting in excess of 60 instructional demos and more topics will be added regularly. This telecommunications outfit is already producing fresh films to expand the existing collection. This online library, on telephone systems for small business, has received a huge welcome from commercial managers as it facilitates them to eradicate a large figure from the bottom line on their overheads. Fine tuning to OfficeServ and DCS telephone systems can be made at zero cost with simply a little listening time. Furthermore, this facility assists a great deal in carbon savings as it cuts down unnecessary and costly car journeys.
This ground breaking initiative by AbbeyTelecom.com is just the beginning and it will probably trigger many such services for different telephone systems for small businesses, as viewing numbers demonstrate that it has become highly popular.

description.hltext_display: Panasonic Viera TX открывает доступ к 3D. "Хай-тек" с Григорием Шабановым
description.content:
Если вы часто ходите в кинотеатр, то без сомнения заметили, что все больше фильмов на широком экране выходит в формате 3D, конечно не во всех из них это обусловлено замыслом режиссера, но ведь и цвет стал художественным приемом далеко не сразу. С домашним, трехмерным контентом все обстоит немного хуже, пока это всего несколько десятков фильмов, однако их количество тоже постоянно растет. Кроме того на рынке стали появляться доступные 3D-телевизоры такие как Panasonic Viera TX-PR42GT20, его цена около 50 тысяч рублей.
Надо сказать, что всего у компании сейчас есть две новинки в линейке 3D - это 42-дюймовая модель, о которой я уже начал говорить и впечатляющий 65-дюймовый плазменный Full HD трехмерный монитор, естественно более дорогой. О ней как-нибудь в другой раз, а пока поговорим о новинке, которая ближе к народу.
Не секрет, что плазменные телевизоры - это традиционно высокое качество изображения. Но есть и недостаток каждый новый кадр на плазме зависит от предыдущего. Поэтому, когда очень яркий объект движется по темному экрану, за ним идет шлейф. Трехмерному Viera TX практически удалось победить эту беду. Хвост появляется лишь в очень темных сценах. За то, когда это случается, - мозг зрителя готов взорваться. Дело в том, такого рода явления приводят к наложению картинки и очень неприятному эффекту двоения. Впрочем, как я уже сказал, такое происходит очень редко, вообще специалистам Panasonic удалось практически исключить артефакты. Во многом это заслуга очков, компания спроектировала их специально для своих телевизоров - затворы в них открываются не "параллельно" (как у большинства), а последовательно, то есть в момент переключения кадров, когда всякая гадость лезет на экран, очки находятся в закрытом состоянии, и зритель не видит дефектов.
Вообще в новой серии плазменных панелей множество улучшений сделано впервые. Например, используется специальная технология отображения черного цвета, элемент экрана в момент воспроизведения черного полностью "погашен" - за счет этого достигается высокое качество картинки. А отдельно нужно сказать о технологии Viera Cast. Если подключить телевизор к Интернету, то откроется доступ ко многим мультимедийным возможностям. Так, например, можно смотреть онлайновые передачи от EuroNews, видео с Youtube и даже общаться по Skype, правда, для этого понадобится специальная HD веб-камера.
Если вы часто ходите в кинотеатр, то без сомнения заметили, что все больше фильмов на широком экране выходит в формате 3D, конечно не во всех из них это обусловлено замыслом режиссера, но ведь и цвет стал художественным приемом далеко не сразу. Если вы часто ходите в кинотеатр, то без сомнения заметили, что все больше фильмов на широком экране выходит в формате 3D, конечно не во всех из них это обусловлено замыслом режиссера, но ведь и цвет стал художественным приемом далеко не сразу. © Государственный интернет-канал "Россия" 2001 - 2010. description.hltext_display: Western-Klassiker: "Spiel mir das Lied vom Tod" (mit Bild)
description.author: Veröffentlicht von ots
description.content: (ots) - "Spiel mir das Lied vom Tod" bei kabel eins Der Farmer McBain (Frank Wolff) wird mit seinen drei Kindern von dem eiskalten Killer Frank (Henry Fonda) erschossen. Die junge Witwe McBain (Claudia Cardinale) erfährt, dass ihr Mann beim Bau einer Bahnlinie im Wege stand. Trotzig tritt sie nun das Erbe ihres Mannes an. Unterstützt wird sie dabei von einem namenlosen Mundharmonikaspieler (Charles Bronson) und dem Banditen Cheyenne (Jason Robards). Es kommt zu einem großen Showdown zwischen dem Killer und dem geheimnisvollen Mundharmonikaspieler mit seiner Todesmelodie ... kabel eins zeigt "Spiel mir das Lied vom Tod" am Samstag, 25. Dezember 2010, um 20.15 Uhr. Foto: © Paramount Pictures Dieses Bild darf bis Ende Dezember 2010 honorarfrei fuer redaktionelle Zwecke und nur im Rahmen der Programmankuendigung verwendet werden. description.hltext_display: Etrion Completes Ruffano Solar Park in Italy
description.content:
{"s" : "etx.to","k" : "a00,a50,b00,b60,c10,g00,h00,l10,p20,t10,v00","o" : "","j" : ""}
GENEVA, SWITZERLAND--(Marketwire - Dec. 22, 2010) - Etrion Corporation ("Etrion" or the "Company") (Toronto:ETX.TO)(Toronto:ETX.TO), an independent solar power producer, announces the completion of the Ruffano solar park in Puglia, Italy.
Marco Northland, Etrion's CEO, commented, "We are pleased to announce the completion of another solar park in Italy. We continue to execute on our projects under construction and expect to exit the year with almost 50 MW operational."
The Ruffano park has a total capacity of 1 MW and is expected to produce over 1.7 million kilowatt hours ("kWh") of clean electricity and more than 600,000 euros of earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization ("EBITDA") per year.
The project benefits from the 2010 feed-in-tariff of 0.346 euros per kWh plus a market price of approximately 0.08 euros per kWh.
The Italian feed-in-tariff is a premium purchase price for solar electricity that is guaranteed by the Italian government for 20 years from the start of operations.
The 1 MW Ruffano park is a ground-based solar PV power plant using SunPower's high-efficiency PV modules and single axis tracker technology with Siemens inverters.
Centrobanca, an Italian bank, provided 83% of the financing for the project with a 17.5-year, non-recourse loan.
About Etrion
Etrion Corporation develops, builds, owns and operates solar power plants in Italy. Etrion currently owns 42 megawatts (MW) of operational, ground-based solar photovoltaic (PV) power plants, has 16 MW of solar parks under construction and approximately 200 MW of solar development pipeline in Italy. Etrion is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange and the NASDAQ OMX Stockholm exchange (ticker symbol "ETX").
For additional information, please visit the Company's website at www.etrion.com.
Forward-Looking Information:
This press release contains certain "forward-looking information". All statements, other than statements of historical fact, that address activities, events or developments that the Company believes, expects or anticipates will or may occur in the future (including, without limitation, statements relating to the Ruffano solar park, the production capacity thereof and the expected cash flow therefrom) constitute forward-looking information. This forward-looking information reflects the current expectations or beliefs of the Company based on information currently available to the Company as well as certain assumptions, including, without limitation, assumptions as to the price at which the Company will be able to sell electricity from the project and an assumption that the Company will be able to realize EBITDA margins for the project that are equivalent to the average margins for similar projects. Forward-looking information is subject to a number of significant risks and uncertainties and other factors that may cause the actual results of the Company to differ materially from those discussed in the forward-looking information, and even if such actual results are realized or substantially realized, there can be no assurance that they will have the expected consequences to, or effects on the Company. Factors that could cause actual results or events to differ materially from current expectations include, but are not limited to, the failure to obtain necessary regulatory and other approvals.
Any forward-looking information speaks only as of the date on which it is made and, except as may be required by applicable securities laws, the Company disclaims any intent or obligation to update any forward-looking information, whether as a result of new information, future events or results or otherwise. Although the Company believes that the assumptions inherent in the forward-looking information are reasonable, forward-looking information is not a guarantee of future performance and accordingly undue reliance should not be put on such information due to the inherent uncertainty therein.

description.hltext_display: Chatroom
description.content:
When strangers Jim, Eva, Emily and Mo meet William online in his new 'Chelsea Teens' chatroom, they're completely seduced by his fast-talking, charismatic character. But beneath the surface lies a much darker truth. William is a dangerous loner, a dysfunctional teenager channelling all his energies into cyberspace. He's become an analyser, a calculating manipulator who finds it almost impossible to interact normally with others in the real world, instead turning his hand to manipulating people online.
Verdict is a psychological thriller that has none of the scares of The Ring 2 director Hideo Nakata’s previous work or Japanese horror in general. Nakata garners good to middling performances from his young cast and a slightly hysterical one from the in-demand Aaron Johnson. It’s a topical piece that shows the internet as a breeding ground for bullies, social misfits and a grooming boot camp for those already halfway there.
Director: Hideo Nakata
Cast: Aaron Johnson, Imogen Poots, Hannah Murray, Daniel Kaluuya, Matthew Beard, Megan Dodds
Released: 26 December 2010
Click for the full GaydarNation review and post your own review and rating.

description.hltext_display: CINA: BANDITO INGLESE DA PUBBLICAZIONI, NUOCE A PUREZZA LINGUA NAZIONALE
description.content:
(ASCA-AFP) - Pechino, 22 dic - Per preservare la ''purezza'' della lingua cinese, giornali, riviste, libri e siti internet in Cina non dovranno piu' usare termini inglesi in testi in cinese. L'uso sempre piu' diffuso di parole e abbreviazioni in inglese ''nuoce gravemente alla standardizzazione e alla purezza della lingua scritta e orale cinese'', secondo una direttiva emessa ieri dall'Amministrazione generale della stampa, e pubblicata oggi.
Questa pratica ''distrugge un ambiente linguistico e culturale sano e armonioso ed esercita un'influenza nefasta sulla societa''', dichiara l'istituzione: ''Di conseguenza e' vietato usare termini stranieri, come parole e abbreviazioni inglesi in pubblicazioni in cinese, e creare termini che non sono ne' cinesi ne' stranieri, con significati poco chiari''.
Qualunque societa' contravvenga la direttiva andra' incontro a ''sanzioni amministrative''.
red/cam/rob

description.hltext_display: Generationswechsel in der BAT-Stiftung für Zukunftsfragen / Reinhardt folgt auf Opaschowski
description.author: Veröffentlicht von ots
description.content: (ots) - Nach über dreißig Jahren übergibt Professor Dr. Horst W. Opaschowski (69) die Wissenschaftliche Leitung der Stiftung für Zukunftsfragen, eine Initiative von British American Tobacco, zum Jahreswechsel an seinen Nachfolger Professor Dr. Ulrich Reinhardt (40). Opaschowski hatte 1979 - gemeinsam mit dem Unternehmen British American Tobacco - dieses in Deutschland einmalige Freizeit- und Zukunftsforschungsinstitut gegründet und war jüngst für sein Engagement vom Bundespräsidenten mit dem Bundesverdienstkreuz 1. Klasse ausgezeichnet worden. Ihm folgt Prof. Dr. Reinhardt, der seit über zehn Jahren die Geschicke der Stiftung mitgestaltet hat und in den vergangenen Jahren als geschäftsführendes Vorstandsmitglied tätig war. Er wird die inhaltliche Auseinandersetzung mit gesellschaftlichen Zukunftsfragen und -problemen ökonomischer, ökologischer und sozialer Art fortsetzen und dem Stiftungsgrundsatz treu bleiben: Die Welt im Wandel - der Mensch im Mittelpunkt. Pressekontakt: Stiftung für Zukunftsfragen. Eine Initiative von British American Tobacco Presse und Öffentlichkeitsarbeit Lena Peleikis phone: +49 40 4151 2264 e-mail: Lena_Peleikis(at)bat.com Weitere Infos zur Pressemeldung: http://

description.hltext_display: Third-Party Logistics Provider, Kane Is Able, Announces New Board of...
description.content:
Kane is Able, Inc. (KANE) today announced its new Board of Directors. The Board combines two pre-existing entities: the company owners and KANE’s advisory board. The integration of the two marks the first time non-family members will have a vote in determining company direction and strategy. The Board will provide guidance and accountability to the operations leadership team as the company focuses on the future.
The Board of Directors includes Kane family members Joan Kane, Kathleen Calpin, Richard Kane, Eugene Kane, Jr., Christopher Kane, Edward Kane, Michael Kane, and Kelly Stark.
Lee Stucky, retail industry executive and former Senior Vice President and Chief Administrative Officer for Wal-Mart International, will serve as Board Chairman. Stucky was hand-selected for the Chairmanship role by Gene Kane, the former Board Chairman who passed away recently at the age of 80.
Joining Stucky on the Board are:
Martin C. Murphy, supply chain executive with more than 30 years in consumer packaged goods (CPG) industry leadership roles within finance, procurement and logistics
Tom Escott, logistics industry veteran and past president of Schneider Logistics
Tom Speh, Associate Director of MBA programs at Miami University and past president of the Council of Supply Chain Management Professionals
Tom Hall, senior operating executive with experience in global business management, operations, strategic planning, financial management, and personnel development
Richard Kane, President and CEO of Kane Is Able, says “We pride ourselves in being a family-owned, professionally managed company. The new Board is the next logical step in our company’s growth and will help propel us into the future.” Kane added, “It’s important to continue to grow the company the ‘Gene Kane way,’” referring to his father, “taking care of our customers by providing exceptional service wrapped in a culture of honesty, integrity, and treating customers like family. Gene Kane set the wheels in motion for the new Board structure, which will be an important and lasting part of his powerful legacy.”
Eugene J. Kane, Sr. took over his father’s freight business in 1955. He took a two-truck operation, added supply chain services like warehousing, distribution, and packaging, and transformed KANE from a regional trucking company into a national third-party logistics provider with more than 1000 tractors and trailers and 8.5 million square feet of distribution center space across the country.
ABOUT KANE
Founded in 1930, Kane Is Able is a third-party logistics provider that helps consumer packaged goods (CPG) companies warehouse and distribute goods throughout the U.S. The company’s CPG logistics services include integrated warehousing, packaging and transportation services specially designed to meet the needs of CPG manufacturers.

description.hltext_display: Christmas Pick-Ups
description.content:
It’s the time of year when gay boys and gals can find the scene even more wildly exuberant than usual - what with venues putting on a party atmosphere and a more willing attitude of stressed folks to relax and let themselves go. So, it’s not difficult to get swept up in a whirlwind of seasonal good cheer, flirting and the general frisson of booze induced frolicking.
Let’s face it, no one wants to have a boring Christmas and New Year - everyone wants to make it memorable – and with that comes a more adventurous spirit for sex and romance.
Even if Santa hasn’t been that kind to you on the 25th, what better way to make up than with a steamy yuletide snog and bonk. The only problem is that along with the heady partying and desperation to have a good time, also often comes impaired judgement!
So here are some guidelines to help prevent sensitive souls from ending up a tearful wreck or feeling like the ditched bride when the fairy lights of love have been extinguished and your heart, like empty bottles of Bailey’s, are dumped in the recycle bin.
Bounders
There are two types of cad on the gay scene that come to the fore during the seasonal festivities – one is the ‘married’ geezer looking out for a festive fling while the boyfriend is off playing Santa to the parents, and the other less devious perhaps but equally troublesome is the Christmas charity case.
You know the type, or you should do by now! He’s full of charm, a bit short of cash, wonderful with his tongue and hands but as solvent and dependable as a Northern Rock bank account. His smooth talking lips will not only lap their way around your nipples but also lick out your well stocked fridge. He may be fun, but don’t expect so much as Hallmark card of gratitude when the party’s over and your booze cupboard is as dry as the Sahara desert. You won’t see him again until February - in a pub or on the street - and somehow he’d have developed early dementia and won’t recognise you.
B&B
Again two types here, the bed and breakfast guy who’s basically the night ‘bonker’ who leaves you sore after a cup of Cafe Hag and the more terminal kind – the bonker and boarder who, having ascertained during your less sober moments that you have a spacious flat with a spare room and internet access, will eat you out of house and home, bring his mates over, run up a huge telephone bill and then after the last cocktail sausage has been scoffed will mysteriously disappear like the Panto Genie – possibly with your mum’s Christmas pressie.
Only really worth the hassle if he looks like Jason Statham and is hung like King Kong. I mean who wouldn’t mind being abused by that combination?
My Boyfriend Doesn’t Understand Me!
Not that a randy boy minds too much if his gorgeous festive totty is already hitched and even carries a pic of his civil partnership in his wallet, no the problems start when the object of insincere affection (that’s you!) becomes a little too smitten with Mr Married, then what seemed like a leaf out of Mills & Boon can so easily turn to an episode of EastEnders. Grim.
Just because he licked whipped cream off your love tool during that crazy New Year’s party and made you feel as giddy as a sixth form girl on her first date, remember it’s all an illusion. As soon as the last party balloon is burst and the bedspread has to be bunged in the washer, Mr Married will be retreating back to dependable domicility faster than Kate Moss can lance a pimple on her nonce.
Beware the charming Mr Darcy, who appears across the neon lit dance floor while fake snow drops from the rafters. He’s already got his house boy and he’s at home planning a February cruise for them both.
Sex And Sensibility
There’s no doubting that a surfeit of booze impairs even the brightest of judgement makers but a combination of drugs will just render you with the intellectual capacity of Jade Goody. Not a good way to be when you’re surrounded by others desperate to have a good time at all costs and the temptation of sex means you’ll do it with anything and not necessarily with everything. So use your noddle. If you know you’ll end up caned this season then make sure you’re prepared beforehand with a packet of condoms, a charged up mobile and more wisely with some mates who know who you’re going off with. A serial killer has to start somewhere! If you don’t care about your security and sexual health, then it’s doubtful anyone else will, especially someone who just sees you as party cracker to be pulled and discarded with.
Office Parties
The old wise adage about never mixing business with pleasure is really put to the test during the silly season of festive partying. Is it really wise to start fondling the firm’s accountant who signs your cheques in a drunken stooper with the breath of a camel with halitosis? Or worse, French kiss the bosses boyfriend in the cloakroom when CCTV cameras have been capturing every incriminating frame?
Unless you can handle office gossiping, ribbing and the embarrassment of looking across at a colleague whose face can no longer command respect since it went down on your fun pole – you’re better sticking to a couple of shorts and a Babycham before risking daily humiliation or an unexpected career change.
Booze And Drugs
Even the most boring church-going, flower arranging, Daily Mail reading village spinster can be transformed into a ravenous slapper with a desire to show off her Marks and Sparks undies when she’s hit the sherry bottle too many times. It’s not just the morning after hangover that can be a killer to deal with but having to come to terms with the fact that you were the easy lay for the least attractive guest at the party! Much worse. You may not remember the ugly details but your friends and colleagues will never let you forget it. Self respect is soooooo difficult to regain. For more serious repercussions refer to above.
Best Mates
Not everything works out as well as an episode from Hollyoaks. Even if you do recall fancying that mate who goes all the way back to secondary school, do you really want to risk a lifetime friendship for a quick gobble – even if it’s happily reciprocated - that took place during a momentary lapse of sanity? Beware - booze, drugs and silly party games can turn even Maria von Trap into a knicker waving, boob flashing Abi Titmuss.
Mobiles Are A Boyz Best Friend
It’s amazing how many chancers like to have their cake and eat it – like sleazy straight medallion men from the 70s. They’ll take you out to a nightclub, dump you like yesterday’s breakfast once you’re there, but after they’ve sated their egos with some opportunistic cruising, they’ll return after the New Year countdown presuming they’ve still got a guaranteed bonk for the night. Or did that just happen to me?
Of course it’s easy enough to deliver a few choice words and exit the building with Diva like credulity, if it happens to be central – but if you’re out in the sticks and clueless about where there’s a bus or cabbie to whisk you back to civilisation – then make sure you have your mobile with you. Nothing worse than being left standing out in the cold with straight revellers from Cinderella’s with not so much as a greasy chip to keep you warm.
Christmas Video Romance
Well, we all know how genuine George Michael’s hetero romance was in the snowball throwing, chestnuts by the roaring fire ‘Last Christmas’ pop video in the 80s, don’t we! Beware the season of wishful thinking, childlike dreams and a surfeit of sweet sentimental songs doesn’t lull you into a false sense of ‘I’ve found my dreamboat’ hopefulness.
Sharing a Christmas kiss, romantic smile, sexy glance etc is all well and good but don’t assume it’s a marriage proposal destined for appearances as a loving couple on Property Ladder! Enjoy the frivolity of it all but listen to Sally Sensible at the back of your brain. A true lasting love – not one just for smooching under the mistletoe or on the sofa while Where Eagles Dare plays on the box – will call back after the silly season.
If a frivolous, fun and feisty roll in the snow with a horny hunk is all you want this Christmas, then go for it - but safely! A seasonal shag, no matter how short lived always beats playing Twister with Auntie May and your six year old niece but not if it has life-long implications. No bunk-up, no matter how hot and heady is worth risking your health.
However, if Santa does unexpectedly delivers a bonus in the shape of a fella or gal you’d like to see more of in 2010 – maybe, just maybe, it might be an idea not to unwrap every promising treat this yuletide? Keep something tempting, heated up and steaming on the stove to tempt them well into spring.

description.hltext_display: CARBURANTI: QE, ENI AUMENTA DI UN CENTESIMO. VERSO ONDATA RINCARI
description.content:
(ASCA) - Roma, 22 dic - Tornano a rincarare i prezzi raccomandati sulla rete carburanti.
A muoversi e' stata Eni, con un centesimo su tutti i prodotti (benzina, diesel e gpl). Piccolo ritocco ma sempre in aumento per TotalErg. Gli altri per ora aspettano ma l'attesa non dovrebbe durare a lungo. Quanto ai prezzi praticati sul territorio, inevitabile anche in questo caso una tendenza all'aumento, con particolare riguardo al diesel e al gpl.
E' quanto emerge dal monitoraggio di quotidianoenergia.it effettuato in un campione di stazioni di servizio rappresentativo della situazione nazionale per la rubrica Check-Up Prezzi QE.
Nel dettaglio, oggi la media nazionale dei prezzi praticati della benzina (in modalita' servito) va dall'1,441 euro/litro degli impianti Esso all'1,461 euro/litro dei p.v.
Tamoil passando per 1,450 del market leader. Le no-logo sono a 1,368 euro/litro. Per il diesel si passa dall'1,330 euro/litro riscontrato nei p.v. Eni ed Esso all'1,343 euro/litro rilevato in media negli impianti Tamoil. No-logo a 1,255 euro/litro.
Punte, come di consueto, al Sud ormai a 1,47 in media sulla benzina e 1,35 per il diesel (poco al di sotto al Centro).
Il Gpl, infine, si posiziona tra lo 0,734 euro/litro rilevato nei p.v. Eni allo 0,744 degli impianti Q8 (0,706 Euro/l le no-logo).
red-luq/cam/rob

description.hltext_display: Вексельберг уходит с поста директора по газовому бизнесу ТНК-ВР
description.content: Ранее Вексельберг, также являющийся совладельцем ТНК-ВР, заявлял о своем намерении уйти с должности исполнительного директора нефтяной компании, чтобы максимально сосредоточиться на работе в фонде "Сколково", который он возглавляет, сообщает "Интерфакс". С недавнего времени Вексельберг является президентом Фонда развития Центра разработки и коммерциализации новых технологий (фонд "Сколково"). Источники, близкие к акционерам ТНК-BP и КЭС, сообщили, что сменить Вексельберга на посту исполнительного директора по газовому бизнесу ТНК-BP может президент, председатель правления "КЭС-Холдинга" Михаил Слободин. Вексельберг также является основным владельцем "КЭС-Холдинга". Слободин уже работал в ТНК-BP в 2002 году, он возглавлял департамент по развитию электроэнергетического бизнеса компании "ТНК" (TNKO), а после создания СП ТНК и British Petroleum стал вице-президентом по энергетике компании "ТНК-ВР Менеджмент" (TNBP). © Государственный интернет-канал "Россия" 2001 - 2010.
