description.hltext_display: La realidad virtual acerca al público cómo era la vida de la necrópolis en los siglos IV y V
description.content:
EnviarImprimir Comentar Fuente: Ayuntamiento de Cartagena
Una iniciativa pionera en España recrea interactivamente el yacimiento tardorromano del Museo Arqueológico de Cartagena a través de Una ventana al pasado
Ver un ágape funerario o descubrir cómo trabajaban nuestros antepasados en un enterramiento es ahora posible gracias a las nuevas aplicaciones de la tecnología digital al mundo de la museología. Con la iniciativa Una venta al pasado, el Museo Arqueológico de Cartagena se ha convertido en el primer museo de España en ofrecer un visor interactivo que usa la realidad virtual aumentada para reconstruir digitalmente un yacimiento arqueológico.
Esta mañana la Concejala de Cultura, Rosario Montero, acompañada por el Director General de Telecomunicaciones y Sociedad de la Información, Diego Pedro García, han presentado el resultado de esta iniciativa pionera en España y desarrollada conjuntamente entre ambas instituciones.
Rosario Montero ha destacado que esta recreación permite que la necrópolis sea accesible para todos los públicos ya que muchas veces el problema de los yacimientos es su dificil interpretación, y ahora será mucho más didáctica y educativa para los jóvenes y más fácil de entender para los mayores. La concejala también ha recordado que Cartagena es referente en cuanto a las aplicaciones de las nuevas tecnologías y a la conservación del patrimonio.

description.hltext_display: Gempa 6,5 SR Guncang Iran, 7 Tewas
description.content:
TEHERAN-Gempa hebat berkekuatan 6,5 SR melanda daerah pedesaan di Iran tenggara, Senin (20/12) malam waktu setempat, menewaskan sedikitnya tujuh orang dan melukai 33 lainnya.
Televisi pemerintah melaporkan, bencana itu menghancurkan Hosseinabad, sebuah desa berpenduduk ratusan jiwa di daerah Chah Malek, Provinsi Kerman, pada pukul 22.12 waktu setempat atau Selasa (21/12) sekitar 01.12 WIB.
Puluhan warga Rigan, kota kecil lain di kawasan rawan gempa tersebut, tertimbun reruntuhan rumah mereka yang hancur berantakan. Regu penyelamat yang diterjunkan berhasil menyelamatkan sebagian besar dari korban yang terjebak puing bangunan.
Wali Kota Rigan, Mohammad Barzang, menuturkan regu penyelamat masih bekerja keras menyelamatkan korban dan sepertinya tidak ada indikasi jumlah korban tewas akan meningkat secara dramatis.
Daerah bencana terletak tidak jauh dari kota bersejarah Bam, tempat gempa dahsyat berkekuatan 6,5 SR menewaskan lebih dari 26.000 orang pada 2003. Sambungan telepon ke kawasan itu terputus. Episentrum gempa terletak di sekitar 100 km dari Bam dengan kedalaman 5 km.
Dilaporkan, Selasa kemarin terjadi 25 gempa susulan, termasuk satu gempa berkekuatan 5 SR. Getaran gempa utama yang terjadi Senin malam tersebut terasa hingga di perbatasan Pakistan-Afghanistan.
Wakil Gubernur Provinsi Kerman, Javad Kamali, mengungkapkan gempa juga menyebabkan kerusakan serius terhadap gedung-gedung dan infrastruktur di daerah itu. “Petugas sedang berupaya keras membuka kembali jalan-jalan yang tertutup puing-puing akibat gempa.”
Ribuan orang tewas akibat gempa di pinggiran Iran karena rumah-rumah di daerah itu terbuat dari material yang tidak tahan gempa. Iran terletak di jalur seismik sehingga rawan gempa. Setiap hari, rata-rata satu gempa ringan terjadi di negara itu.
Tahun lalu, sebuah gempa mengguncang Hormozgan, Iran selatan, melukai 700 orang di kota pelabuhan Bandar Abbas. Dalam beberapa bulan terakhir juga terjadi banyak gempa. Pada awal November lalu, gempa 4,9 SR melanda Provinsi Lorestan dan melukai 80 orang. (ap,cnn-sep-38)

description.hltext_display: Flower Hut Expands To San Antonio To Serve Customers In This Region With Its Highly Dependable Flower Delivery Services
description.content:
(EMAILWIRE.COM, December 22, 2010 ) San Antonio ,Texas -Flower Hut, which has been in the Mcallen TX for over 7 years is now expanding to San Antonio, TX. This florist has over 22 years of experience in the flower business. Flower Hut is one of the most dependable florists as they deliver the highest quality flowers to their customers. They have numerous floral arrangements to choose from their online gallery. They are known for supplying the freshest flowers on order. After several years of successful florist business in Mcallen TX, Flower Hut proudly announces its expansion to San Antonio TX. Flower Hut is sure to become one of the most popular flower shops San Antonio TX.
Flower Hut expanding its flower shop to San Antonio imports flowers from South America and from various other parts of the world to provide its customers with the widest choice possible. Customers that are looking for the best florist San Antonio Tx need not worry anymore as they will find the best collection of flowers from this new flower shop san Antonio TX. This florist enjoys the highest level of customer satisfaction by their consistently good quality services. They are always prompt in delivering their customers’ orders. Customers need not have to worry about wrong notes on the flowers delivered or poor quality flowers anymore. They have many exciting floral arrangements on display so that customers can always find something that fits exactly the occasion to express their special sentiments.
Flower Hut supplies flowers for all occasions including wedding parties, sympathy and funeral flowers. Customers will also be able to find wide range of other gifts for their loved ones including fruit baskets, gourmet baskets, candy and chocolates, greeting cards, silk flower arrangements, plush stuffed animals and more. This San Antonio Florist prices all their floral products very competitively. Customers will be able to save a considerable amount of money by ordering their flowers from Flower Hut.

description.hltext_display: SPCT : "El PP de Pilar Barreiro presenta a la ciudadania su verdadero plan para sacar a Cartagena de la crisis"
description.content:
EnviarImprimir Comentar Fuente: SPCT
SPCT DENUNCIA QUE EL MISMO DIA QUE LA ALCALDESA ANUNCIA CONGELACION DE IMPUESTOS MUNICIPALES, VALCARCEL RECORTA LOS SUELDOS DE MAESTROS, PROFESORES Y PROFESIONALES DE SANIDAD EN MAS DE 10 %.
Si este el Plan que tiene Rajoy para solucionar los problemas del país, apaga y vámonos. Es increíble la desfachatez de esta formación política que por un lado critica las medidas del Gobierno Central, por injustas e insolidarias, y donde gobiernan las aplican y además mucho más restrictivas.
SPCT exige a Pilar Barreiro como cabeza de lista del PP en la Región de Murcia que se pronuncie sobre la idoneidad de las medidas, y que haga el esfuerzo, sin echarle la culpa a nadie, de aclarar si comparte o no, el recorte anunciado por el Presidente Valcárcel.
En vísperas de la huelga general, el PP de Cartagena, al igual que el del resto del país, cargo contra las medidas del Gobierno Central que recortaban el sueldo de los funcionarios en un 5 %. Ahora unos meses después, resulta que no sólo recortan el sueldo de los funcionarios del ámbito de la educación y de la sanidad, sino que lo hacen por un importe que dobla la reducción aplicada por el Gobierno Central.
SPCT se pregunta quién es el responsable de tener una televisión autonómica totalmente deficitaria e innecesaria, quién va a pagar por la hemodiálisis del Rosell y de los Arcos 80.000.000 euros a una empresa privada que además va a utilizar las instalaciones públicas, quién ha llevado a esta región a liderar las tasas de paro a nivel nacional y quien ha triplicado su deuda pública.
Desde SPCT estamos seguros que Pilar Barreiro con la contundencia que le caracteriza dará respuesta a estas preguntas y esperamos que esta vez sea original o al menos NO-TYPICAL, y no intente buscar culpables fuera, cuando los tiene al lado.

description.hltext_display: Weather Channel ranks Boonville as second snowiest place in U.S.
description.content: BOONVILLE, N.Y. (WKTV) - The Village of Boonville was recently named the #2 snowiest place in the United States, according to a Weather Channel ranking.Boonville Mayor Michael Kramer says that despite the fact there is very little snow these days, his village is still worthy of the honor."We'll take it," Kramer said. "We have to get on the map somehow."The Weather Channel rankings took into consideration snowfall totals over a 30 year period in places with at least 1,000 in population. Boonville averages 220 inches of snow per year, according to the rankings.Valdez, Alaska ranked number one with an average yearly snowfall of 297 inches. Kim Young, the Assistant Highway Superintendent for the village, says his first year on the job was 1978. That year, Boonville had the highest one day snowfall of 35 inches."We can average between six inches, to one to two feet," Young said of an average winter day in the village. Many residents were shocked to hear about the ranking, including Dan Young, who recalled snow storms so bad they lasted three days."I have seen where you can sit on top of the telephone poles, and your feet would be touching the snow banks where they plowed it up there," Young said.Mayor Kramer says the first snowfall this year came on the last day of November and he expects it to last into April. Kramer says because of a lack of industry, his village relies on the snow for revenue.Many snowmobilers and snowfest events come to Boonville during the winter months, Kramer said."I don't think we have ever put a finger on what it generates, but without it, we know were in trouble," Kramer said.

description.hltext_display: Ketika Bulan Berwarna Merah Darah
description.content:
WASHINGTON-Warga di kawasan Amerika Utara dan Eropa disuguhi tontonan peristiwa alam yang unik, Selasa dini hari kemarin. Pergerakan gerhana bulan total memperlihatkan perubahan warna yang menarik mulai dari merah muda, merah tembaga, hingga merah darah.
Berbarengan dengan titik balik matahari di belahan bumi utara, kali pertama dalam hampir empat abad, gerhana tersebut memperlihatkan posisi matahari, bumi, dan bulan berada dalam satu garis sejajar.
Meski tertutup bayangan, sosok Bulan tetap terlihat karena masih terdapat sisa cahaya yang dipantulkan oleh atmosfer kita ke arah satelit Bumi tersebut. Sebagian besar cahaya yang dibiaskan berspektrum warna merah sehingga bulan terlihat berubah warna menjadi kemerahan, jingga, bahkan kecokelatan.
Gerhana berlangsung selama tiga setengah jam, dimulai sekitar pukul 06.33 GMT (13.33 WIB) saat bayangan Bumi mulai menyentuh Bulan.
Puncak gerhana total berlangsung mulai pukul 07.41 hingga 08.53 GMT dan bayangan benar-benar meninggalkan bulan pukul 10.01 GMT.
Pakar gerhana Fred Espenak, menjelaskan gerhana itu jelas terlihat di kawasan Amerika Utara, Greenland, dan Islandia.
Warga Eropa hanya bisa melihat tahap awal sebelum bulan “tertelan” bayangan, sementara warga Asia barat menyaksikan tahapan berikutnya setelah bulan terbit. (afp-sep-38)

description.hltext_display: Госдума оградила детей от пагубной информации
description.content:
Госдума защитила детей от вредной информации. Во вторник в третьем чтении был принят закон, который запрещает публиковать в журналах, книгах, Интернете или показывать в детских передачах пагубную информацию, которая может подтолкнуть ребенка к насилию, наркотикам или самоубийству. Нести ответственность за содержание программ или книг будут сами распространители, а вот кто будет контролировать их - пока непонятно. Подробности - у корреспондента "Вести ФМ" Екатерины Казанцевой.
Принятый Госдумой законопроект - настоящий долгожитель российского парламента, его разработка длилась почти 13 лет, за это время он претерпел много изменений и сменил множество разработчиков. Новый закон вводит запрет на распространение среди детей различных информационных материалов, которые могут пагубно на них повлиять, например, научить нецензурно выражаться, попробовать сигареты, алкоголь или наркотики. Детским и подростковым интернет-сайтам, теле- и радиопередачам, книгам, газетам, журналам отныне запрещено публиковать информацию, которая может подтолкнуть ребенка к насилию или самоубийству. Также под запрет попадает продукция порнографического характера и информационные издания, отрицающие семейные ценности и формирующие неуважение к родителям.
Критики законопроекта замечали, что введение подробных запретов приведет к тому, что из сетки вещания телеканалов могут исчезнуть старые советские мультики и фильмы. Те же "Ну, погоди!" и "Кот Леопольд" многим в свете нового закона могут показаться жестокими. Документ разъясняет, что информационная продукция для детей может содержать эпизодическое и ненатуралистическое изображение или описание насилия при условии торжества добра над злом и выражения сострадания к жертве.
Современным создателям книг, мультфильмов и журналов можно смело опираться на советский опыт. Правда, закон предписывает более четко определять, на какой именно возраст рассчитан тот или иной фильм или книга. Диски, книги, телепередачи должны обязательно содержать информацию о том, на какой возраст все это рассчитано. Ответственность за то, что было опубликовано или выпущено в эфир, будет лежать на распространителях, говорит глава думского комитета по вопросам семьи, женщин и детей Елена Мизулина: "Определение возрастной классификации будут осуществлять непосредственно сами вещатели, издатели, распространители информационной продукции. Никакие здесь требования не выставлены - только оценить продукцию с точки зрения, есть запрещенная для детей информация или нет". Также законом вводится классификация информационных материалов для детей различного возраста. В частности, предусматриваются продукты для детей, не достигших 6 лет; для детей, достигших 6 лет; для детей, достигших 12-летнего возраста; для детей, достигших 16 лет; запрещенная для детей информационная продукция. За соответствием будет наблюдать специально уполномоченное ведомство, но какое именно - еще не решено. Возможно, в правительстве появится отдельный орган, который будет заниматься защитой детей от пагубной информации. Если этот орган обнаружит, что в детских или подростковых книгах содержится запрещенная или не соответствующая возрасту информация, информация о распространителе попадет экспертам, прошедшим государственную аккредитацию. Правда, мера ответственности пока не определена, продолжает Елена Мизулина: "Если эксперт нашел нарушение, он вносит представление распространителю. Если он выполняет его - все нормально. Если нет - вопрос решается в судебном порядке. Сейчас все вопросы ответственности: лишение лицензии, приостановление и прочее, содержатся во втором проекте закона, который будет рассматриваться во втором чтении в марте". Введение закона потребует тщательной подготовки, в частности, нужно будет внести изменения еще в несколько законов и принять не одно специальное постановление. На это правительству выдан срок в год и 9 месяцев, поэтому в полную силу закон о защите детей от вредной информации вступит на 1 сентября 2012 года.
Госдума защитила детей от вредной информации. Во вторник в третьем чтении был принят закон, который запрещает публиковать в журналах, книгах, Интернете или показывать в детских передачах пагубную информацию, которая может подтолкнуть ребенка к насилию, наркотикам или самоубийству. description.hltext_display: LA evacuations ordered; Calif braces for more rain
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
Skooter report 12/22/10 LOS ANGELES For six days now, the hammering rain wasnt enough to deter holiday spirit, but a seventh could prove to be absolutely dangerous.
Weather forecasters anticipated continuous heavy rains across California on Wednesday, and evacuations are at the ready late Tuesday as worry grew about the possibility of mudslides in the wildfire-scarred foothills across the southern part of the state.
Due to extreme weath conditions, Gov. Arnold SchwarzeneggerArnold Schwarzenegger prompted him to declare a state of emergency Tuesday for Kern, Orange, Riverside, San Bernardino, San Luis Obispo and Tulare counties.
Evacuation of 232 homes in and La Crescenta, foothill suburbs of Los Angeles were ordered by officials because of forecasts of more heavy rains on already saturated mountainsides. Dozens of homes and businesses were evacuated by San Diego police but no structural damage was reported in the city. A commuter rail station was closed and dozen homes were evacuated in the citys Sorrento Valley area due to torrential rains.
Source: AP

description.hltext_display: Paskutiniame šių metų koncerte SEL ir vėl demonstruos “aukštąjį pilotažą” (nuotraukos)
description.content:
Neseniai labdarai skirtą albumą “Aš kaip žąsis” išleidęs Egidijus Dragūnas džiaugiasi parduotu dešimties tūkstančių kopijų tiražu ir už juos surinktais beveik 300 000 litų. Visa ši suma bus skirta vėžiu sergantiems vaikams. Tiesa, ties šiuo įspūdingu skaičiumi grupės SEL įkūrėjęs neketina sustoti. Jo planas – labdarai surinkti mažiausiai pusę milijono litų.
REKLAMA
Kad svajonė kuo greičiau būtų įgyvendinta, Egis intensyviai ruošiasi dar vienam, naują albumą pristatančiam, įspūdingam SEL koncertui. Jis įvyks jau kitą savaitę, per pačius Naujuosius, sostinės “Ūkio banko teatro arenoje”. Egidijaus Dragūno teigimu, jis kartu su olandu Rank 1 bei lietuviais Ignu ir Virus J, surengs patį geriausią metų finišo vakarėlį, kuris paliks įspūdį ne tik muzikiniu, bet ir vaizdo turiniu.
Per maždaug 1,5 valandos trukmės gyvą SEL pasirodymą visi Naujųjų metų naktį susirinkę žmonės tikrai išgirs ne tik klasika tapusius hitus “Informacija keleiviams“ ar “Leisk“, bet ir naujojo albumo dainas „Sel 600“, “Aš tik vėjas” ir kitas.
Kaip ir SEL gimtadienis, naujametinis Egidijaus Dragūno šou išsiskirs masiškumu - labai daug garso, šviesų, lazerių bei keliasdešimt kvadratinių metrų LED ekranų. Dalis technikos specialiai šiam koncertui bus atgabenta iš D. Britanijos. Koncerto techninė įranga ir scena bus pradėta montuoti jau gruodžio 28 d. Iš viso prie SEL Naujametinio koncerto dirbs per 90 įvairiausių sričių specialistų.
“Galite būti ramūs, 2011-uosius sutiksime pakiliai. Tai bus dar vienas koncertas, kokio iki šiol Lietuvoje niekas nerengė. Nors man pačiam kaskart tenka konkuruoti su prieš tai buvusiu savo pasirodymu, stengiuosi lipti tik aukštyn ir kaskart demonstruoti “aukščiausią pilotažą”, - lakoniškai pakomentavo būsimą savo šou šiuo metu populiarumo viršūnėje esantis atlikėjas.

description.hltext_display: Thailand Cabut Status Darurat
description.content:
BANGKOK-Pemerintah Thailand kemarin sepakat mencabut status keadaan darurat di Bangkok yang diberlakukan selama delapan bulan terakhir ini. Langkah itu mengisyaratkan iklim politik di negara itu berangsur membaik dan gerakan demonstran Kaus Merah telah melunak.
Jika keadaan dirasa kembali memburuk, pemerintah bisa menerapkan hukum keamanan yang lebih moderat, yakni UU Keamanan Internal (ISA) yang memungkinkan pemerintah memberlakukan langkah-langkah antisipatif seperti jam malam dan larangan berkumpul. “Kabinet mengevaluasi situasi saat ini dan menyimpulkan gerakan para pengunjuk rasa lebih bersifat damai, taat hukum, dan simbolis,” ungkap juru bicara pemerintah Supachai Jaisamut, kemarin.
Status keadaan darurat diberlakukan di Bangkok dan beberapa provinsi sekitarnya mulai 7 April setelah para demonstran Kaus Merah yang menduduki pusat komersial Bangkok berhasil menembus kompleks parlemen.
Status itu diperluas ke provinsi-provinsi lain, termasuk ke beberapa basis Kaus Merah, untuk meredam gerakan mereka yang akhirnya berhasil ditundukkan oleh militer pada Mei lalu.
Secara keseluruhan, 91 orang tewas selama aksi unjuk rasa yang penuh dengan kekerasan tersebut dan lebih dari 1.800 lainnya terluka. Pencabutan status darurat di empat provinsi terakhir, termasuk Bangkok akan efektif diberlakukan mulai hari ini (22/12).
Pertemuan Pertama Pusat Penanganan Keadaan Darurat menegaskan, status keadaan darurat sangat diperlukan karena situasi politik di Thailand masih labil. Lembaga itu memberi kewenangan yang luas kepada pihak keamanan dan mengizinkan penangkapan dan pengintaian tanpa surat perintah, sensor media, serta penahanan tanpa dakwaan hingga 30 hari.
Secara teori, berkumpul lebih dari lima orang dilarang meski Kaus Merah beberapa kali mengadakan demonstrasi sejak Mei. Terakhir kelompok itu mengadakan rapat umum di Bangkok, Minggu lalu.
Pencabutan status darurat diumumkan lima hari setelah pertemuan pertama antara PM Abhisit Vejjajiva dan pemimpin Kaus Merah Thida Thavornseth untuk membahas pembebasan dengan jaminan terhadap para pemimpin pergerakan. (rtr-sep-38)

description.hltext_display: Ngô Thanh Vân - Johnny Trí Nguyễn: Mỗi người một nơi?
description.content: Gần đây Vân Ngô và Trí Nguyễn luôn sánh đôi tại các event. Nhưng tại buổi tiệc ra mắt nhóm nhạc "con cưng" của mình, họ lại khiến dư luận bán tín bán nghi khi mỗi người một nơi. Phải chăng, đây là một chiêu PR rất "bẫy rồng" ?

description.hltext_display: Microsoft переписывает Windows для планшетов
description.content:
Софтверный гигант Microsoft разрабатывает новую операционную систему Windows для персональных компьютеров, которая сможет работать на процессорах с ARM-архитектурой. Все существующие версии "Окон", за исключением узкоспециализированных, предназначены только для машин с x86-чипами производства Intel и AMD.
О том, что Microsoft не только готовит ARM-совместимую Windows, но и намерена продемонстрировать ее в январе на выставке CES, сообщило деловое издание The Wall Street Journal со ссылкой на источники в корпорации. Правда, для конечного потребителя система еще не готова. Инженерам Microsoft предстоит еще около двух лет работы, чтобы довести ее до ума.
Выпуск полноценной ARM-совместимой "операционки" позволил бы Microsoft предложить потребителям продукты, аналогичные планшету Apple iPad, и при этом совместимые с программами и файлами на уже существующих Windows-компьютерах. Кроме того, пользователям таких устройств не пришлось бы переучиваться - основные принципы работы остались бы теми же, что и на "больших" ПК. Существующие версии Windows доминируют на настольных ПК и ноутбуках, однако о сравнимом статусе в секторе смартфонов и планшетных компьютеров Microsoft пока остается лишь мечтать - здесь правят бал Apple и Google. Подавляющее большинство современных мобильных гаджетов оснащены процессорами, построенными различными производителями по технологиям британской ARM. Они в разы менее производительны, чем чипы Intel для ПК, но при этом куда более экономичны, что позволяет устройствам долгое время работать без подзарядки, делая их по-настоящему мобильными.
По словам источников WSJ, разработка ARM-совместимой Windows - часть более масштабного плана по созданию "модульной" операционной системы, которую можно было бы адаптировать к самому разному оборудованию. Например, отключая на планшетных ПК ненужные их пользователям части ОС без ущерба стабильности и совместимости.
Именно так в свое время поступила Apple, использовав элементы десктопной MacOS X для создания мобильной iOS, работающей как на смартфонах iPhone и плеерах iPod Touch, так и на планшетниках iPad. Хотя Intel , которые должны подойти для смартфонов и планшетных компьютеров, многие полагают, что Windows в ее нынешнем виде в принципе не подходит для нового класса устройств.
Ожидается, что генеральный директор Microsoft Стив Балмер выступит с "программной" речью на открытии (Consumer Electronics Show) в Лас-Вегасе вечером 5 января. В своем выступлении он представит новые технологии корпорации, ориентированные на потребителей. Однако перед речью у Балмера запланирована пресс-конференция - возможно именно ее глава Microsoft использует для важных объявлений. © Государственный интернет-канал "Россия" 2001 - 2010. description.hltext_display: Calabria, incendiata sede municipio. Autori arrestati e ustionati
description.content:
SAN FILI (COSENZA) - Un incendio è stato appiccato la notte scorsa nel municipio di San Fili, nel cosentino, ed ha distrutto la stanza del sindaco ed altri due uffici. I presunti autori, tra i quali un dipendente comunale, sono rimasti gravemente ustionati e sono stati arrestati dai carabinieri. Il fatto è accaduto verso le 3. I due, Franco Talarico, di 44 anni, dipendente dell'ufficio tecnico comunale, e Francesco Belmonte, di 42, commerciante, secondo l'accusa, sono entrati nel Municipio e dopo avere cosparso di liquido infiammabile la stanza del sindaco, l'ufficio tecnico ed una stanza adiacente, vi hanno appiccato il fuoco. Qualcosa, però, è andato storto ed i due sono rimasti gravemente ustionati.
Talarico e Belmonte sono comunque riusciti a fuggire. I carabinieri, giunti sul posto, hanno subito indirizzato le indagini proprio su Talarico e poco dopo lo hanno rintracciato, insieme all'amico, nell'ospedale di Cosenza, dove i due erano stati ricoverati. Per la gravità delle loro condizioni, i due saranno portati nel centro grandi ustioni dell'ospedale di Brindisi. I carabinieri del Comando provinciale di Cosenza, intanto, li hanno arrestati con l'accusa di incendio e li hanno piantonati in ospedale. Secondo quanto emerso dalle prime indagini, all'origine del gesto ci sarebbero dei rancori covati da Talarico per motivi di lavoro. A San FIli, nel cosentino, data alle fiamme la stanza del sindaco e altri uffici.

description.hltext_display: Pelajaran dari Kejurnas
description.content:
KEJUARAAN nasional tarung derajat Piala Presiden di Bengkalis, Riau yang berakhir pekan lalu menjadi pelajaran berharga bagi atlet Semarang, Ragil Titisari. Walau hanya kebagian medali perak, ada hal penting yang perlu dipetik dari event tingkat nasional itu. Dia harus menjalani persiapan lebih baik jika menghadapi kejurnas.
”Dibilang kecewa, saya memang kecewa. Tetapi saya tidak larut dalam kekecewaan itu, apalagi menjadikan putus asa. Saya harus berlatih lebih giat lagi untuk kejuaraan mendatang,” kata wanita kelahiran 21 Agustus 1987 itu.
Hal positif yang perlu dipetik dari kejurnas itu, menurut mahasiswi Unnes, dirinya harus optimistis dan berfikiran positif. Artinya, rasa percaya diri harus ditanamkan untuk bertanding menghadapi para atlet terbaik di Indonesia.
Dalam kejurnas itu, atlet yang tinggal di Jalan Banowati Tengah V/29B Bulu Lor, Semarang Utara ini meraih perak, setelah dalam partai final nomor tarung wanita di kelas 52,1 - 58 kg kalah dari petarung NTB yang bernama Riza.
”Saya harus mengakui lawan lebih baik. Ini menjadi pelajaran untuk menyiapkan fisik dan mental dalam mengadapi kejuaraan tingkat nasional,” kata pemilik tinggi 170 cm dan berat 53 kg itu.
Tak Takut Mahasiswa tingkat akhir di jurusan Kurikulum Teknologi Pendidikan Unnes ini mengaku senang menekuni olahraga asli Jawa Barat itu. Alumnus SMA Muhammadiyah Kendal ini tak merasa takut tubuh luka dan lebam karena tendangan maupun pukulan.
”Saya telanjur senang dengan tarung derajat. Jadi kejurnas ini bukan muara prestasi. Saya harus bersiap menghadapi babak kualifikasi PON tahun depan,” katanya.
Ragil merupakan salah satu andalan Semarang. Selain meraih emas Porprov 2009, pada Kejurda 2010 dia merebut emas. Peluang masuk tim PON di depan mata, karena untuk Jateng belum ada saingan sepadan di kelasnya.
Meski demikian, Ragil masih menyimpan penasaran. Pasalnya gadis murah senyum itu gagal tampil di PON 2008, lantaran tidak lolos babak kualifikasi. ”Kegagalan itulah yang membuat tekad saya untuk menjadi yang terbaik.”
Ambisi yang dipendam Ragil bisa tampil di PON 2012. Tentu saja dia tak ingin sekadar tampil, tapi membidik medali emas untuk dibawa pulang. (16)

description.hltext_display: 2010 Video Compilation of (Not So) Important Events
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
As 2010 comes to an unceremonious end, the media generally trots out it recaps focusing on multitudes of innocuous events that transpire during the preceding year. There most certainly have to be video and capture of the important people who passed away this year. Needless to say, the most newsworthy stories are replayed (ad nauseous) to remind us all what we witnessed in this changing world.
This year in the same view, I would like to present a compilation of recorded events that may have missed that critical editing room cut. They flow in no order whatsoever, but remain remarkable in several other categories. It would be my wish that the viewer pick their favorite clip from this menagerie and think of all the time and effort the character put forth in the administration of its accomplishment.
If you do see yourself captured in one of the clips, please remember that you may now be a public figure and there is no malice intended by this publication.

description.hltext_display: Donations make holidays a little brighter for kids in Herkimer County and Utica
description.content: MOHAWK, N.Y. (WKTV) - Christmas will be a little brighter for school children in Ilion and Mohawk, thanks to the United Way and its supporters.The organization dropped off wrapped toys to the Mohawk YMCA on Tuesday. From there, the toys will be given out at elementary schools in Ilion and Mohawk.The toys were donated at a recent United Way Christmas Party, and wrapped by Santa himself. "It will really help and make them happy to open gifts on Christmas morning," said YMCA Program Coordinator Amy Burke said. "Some kids don't really have that much."The United Way also dropped off presents to the Johnson Park Center later in the afternoon. Those will be distributed to children in Utica schools.

event_or_fact.property: It will really help and make them happy to open gifts on Christmas morning; Some kids don't really have that much.

description.hltext_display: Terancam Kehilangan Emas
description.content:
Ronde Tradisional Tak Dilombakan di PON
SEMARANG - Jateng terancam kehilangan sejumlah medali dari cabang panahan pada PON XVIII/2012 nanti.
Pasalnya, ronde tradisaional yang selalu menjadi andalan provinsi ini tidak dimainkan. Padahal, saat turun di PON XVII Kaltim tahun 2008 Jateng mampu menggondol satu medali emas dan dua medali perak.
Wakil Ketua Umum Persatuan Panahan Indonesia (Perpani) Jateng, Suyanto, menjelaskan tidak dipertandingkannya nomor itu memang hak prerogatif penyelenggara, dalam hal ini Provinsi Riau yang bakal menjadi tuan rumah PON. Namun pihaknya akan tetap berjuang agar nomor tradisional tetap di pertandingkan.
’’Alasannya adalah nomor tersebut merupakan ciri budaya bangsa. Sejarah panahan di Indonesia kan berasal dari nomor tradisional,’’ katanya di Klaten, saat dihubungi dari Semarang, Selasa (21/12).
Mendominasi PON XVIII/2012 Riau sendiri mempertandingkan tiga nomor, yakni ronde FITA perorangan dan beregu putra-putri, ronde nasional perorangan dan beregu putra-putri, dan ronde kompon perorangan dan beregu putra-putri.
Masing-masing nomor dijatah empat medali emas. Dengan demikian, total medali emas yang diperebutkan adalah 12 buah.
’’Bila memang jumlah medali yang disediakan untuk panahan hanya 12 buah, kami meminta agar nomor tradisional tetap dipertandingkan. Bagaimana nanti cara mengaturnya, kami serahkan kepada PB PON,’’ ujarnya.
Suyanto mengakui Jateng sangat berharap banyak pada nomor tradisional. Seperti pada Kejurnas Panahan di Lapangan ABC Senayan, Jakarta, Mei lalu, kontingen Jateng mendominasi perolehan medali dengan merebut empat emas pada nomor ronde tradisional. Di nomor 30, 40, dan 50 meter, medali emas disabet oleh Kuntatyo dan Pujiono dari Jateng. Satu emas di ronde tradisonal beregu juga direbut oleh trio Pujiono, Andreas, dan Harjanto.
Meski demikian, jika memang PON tetap tidak menggelar nomor tradisional, Jateng telah siap karena tiga atletnya kini menghuni Pelatnas untuk persiapan SEA Games 2011. Mereka adalah Sakuilla Awalia, Ayu Yulianti, dan Johan Prasetyo Adi.
Ketiganya diharapkan bisa bermain maksimal di ronde FITA. (H69-70)

description.hltext_display: Stutter inspires ?King?s Speech?
description.content:
Director Tom Hooper on the Red Carpet for the movie premier of The King's Speech in Toronto at Roy Thompson Hall September 10, 2010 (Craig Robertson/QMI Agency)
The King's Speech became a movie -- and now a major Oscar contender -- all because screenwriter David Seidler was a childhood stutterer.
Seidler was inspired by the struggles of King George VI -- the father of Queen Elizabeth II -- who also stammered but overcame it with the help of Australian speech therapist Lionel Logue.
Director Tom Hooper (The Damned United, John Adams) said Seidler actually wanted to make the real-life story into a movie several decades earlier but he got an important letter urging him to wait.
"The Queen Mother wrote to him and said, 'Please, not in my lifetime. The memories of these events are still too painful,' " said Hooper, 38, in town for TIFF in September.
"And he waited almost 30 years. And I can't think of many Hollywood screenwriters that would do that. They would put their self-interest ahead of it. And so the centre of the movie is that respect that David showed the Queen Mum, which I find very touching."
Seidler actually developed writer's block while penning the screenplay so he decided to try writing it as a play -- which never ended up getting produced. That's when Aussie actor Geoffrey Rush, who plays Logue, came on board. Colin Firth plays the King, whose nickname is Bertie.
The script actually appeared to Rush first in a brown paper package on his front door via a neighbour.
"On the surface of it, it's fundamentally about two middle-aged men who become friends," said Rush, 59, also at TIFF in September. "And that's not the kind of byline that you really want the producers to put on the poster. We didn't want to make that sort of movie that was beige or dull or deferential or reverent."
Rush, who had previously met Firth when they both appeared briefly together in Shakespeare in Love "and just clicked," said they hit the mother lode when Logue's grandson presented the filmmakers with his diaries.
"There was so much fantastic material in there that was much more interesting than inventing cliche Hollywood orientated storylines, certainly for me. And Colin, to a degree, because he was hearing then a lot of stuff about Bertie from a common Australian perspective, which is not in all the other history books and things.
"I'm very pleased and proud that there's an Aussie character in this story. He's unknown figure. The guy that history forgot. And you've got this very imperial figure, and this very colonial figure, and they're divided by class, culture, continents, and even back then it would have been a much greater kind of abyss. Seeing how this friendship mapped itself towards a very close connection between them, against those sort of odds, was a great dramatic thing to play. It was a choice part to get onto."
Hooper, who has an Australian mother and a British father, said there was no other choice than Rush to play Logue.
"When you think about Logue being an unorthodox and maverick person, Geoffrey's perfect," he said. "But also Geoffrey was terribly keen to avoid any cliche that led it to being a Crocodile Dundee meets The King ... I think by casting an Australian, I think we ended up further away from the Australian cliche."
And despite having some initial reservations about casting Firth as the King due to some physical differences between the actor and the real-life monarch, Hooper in the end was thrilled with his performance, now considered an Oscar frontrunner.
"I really, really want him to get all the recognition he deserves for this because he's as brilliant as he appears," said Hooper. "He's fiercely clever. He was very hard-working on this. He did an immaculate amount of research. And I think he connected to it in a very special way which shows in the film."
Oscar buzz only growing
The Oscar buzz for The King's Speech, about the real-life relationship between stutter-plagued King George VI (Colin Firth) -- father of current monarch Queen Elizabeth II -- and his Australian speech therapist (Geoffrey Rush), began in September at TIFF where it won the People's Choice Award.
And it's only getting louder.
The King's Speech just picked up the lion's share of the British Independent Film Awards last weekend in London, including best picture and acting honours for Firth, Rush and Helena Bonham Carter, who plays the King's wife.
Back at TIFF, Rush -- who won a 1996 Oscar for best actor for his role in Shine and was nominated two more times -- knows the road to the Academy Awards all too well.
"It's flattering, it's praise, it's an affirmation that people liked the film," he said while in Toronto for TIFF. "When we were in Telluride (before Toronto), people would come up on the street and say, 'I hope you get a nomination.' I think that's kind of syntax now for 'I really enjoyed your work.' It's like the shorthand you get when people go, 'Hey! Huge fan!' The best one was someone said that to Groucho Marx and he said, 'It's hot in here! I could do with a huge fan!' "
The term "Oscar buzz" doesn't bother The King's Speech director Tom Hooper, either.
"I've decided it's a way of people saying that they like the movie and it slightly means people don't have to explain why they like the movie 'cause they can just say, 'I think it might get nominated.' But mainly, I just hope it means that more people see it 'cause that's what I've made it for. If it achieves more people seeing it, then I'm happy to have all the buzz, really."
The Oscar nominations will be announced Jan. 25.

description.hltext_display: Shock as popular publican dies after falling down stairs
description.author: Eimear Ni Bhraonain
description.content:
A CHRISTMAS party night ended in tragedy after a popular publican fell down the stairs of his home to his death.
Ian Noone, of the Antique Tavern in Enniscorthy, Co Wexford, was out celebrating his staff Christmas social on Monday night. Tragically, Mr Noone was killed when he tumbled down the staircase after returning home from town.
It is believed he may have been going down the stairs to let his dog outside when he fell in the home he shared with his long-term French girlfriend, Delphine Riche.
His work colleagues were shocked at the sudden death of the 42-year-old.
A black ribbon hung outside the Antique Tavern and the pub closed as a mark of respect yesterday.
His co-worker Karl Forrester said Ian was an "excellent employer" who was "very kind" and a "very good" friend.
"Everyone in town is devastated and absolutely shocked," he said.
Enniscorthy councillor Paddy Kavanagh saw Mr Noone out with his staff on Monday night in the Castle Bar in the town. "He was there with all his staff and everyone looked like they were having a great time."
Local businessman Jimmy Gahan said Mr Noone was an "absolute gentleman".
"He was highly popular and the community is in shock with the circumstances being so tragic."
President of the Enniscorthy rugby club, Charlie Kavanagh, described Mr Noone as a "very jovial" man. He said he ran the bar in the rugby club and in the local golf club for some time and "couldn't do enough" for people.
Mr Noone is survived by his parents, Joe and Eileen, and brother Karl.
Removal takes place today from Browne's funeral home in Enniscorthy at 5.30pm to arrive at the Star of the Sea church in Riverchapel at 6.30pm. Funeral Mass takes place at 11am tomorrow and burial will follow in the local cemetery.

description.hltext_display: Government to hold consultative forums on Polytechnics - Veep
description.content:
Vice President John Dramani Mahama on Saturday announced that government would soon organise stakeholders' consultative forums throughout the country to re-classify polytechnic education and put the polytechnics at their rightful place.
He said the platform would also seek to find lasting solution to the frequent agitations from Polytechnic Teachers Association of Ghana (POTAG) and the intricacies in the Polytechnic education system.
The Vice President announced this during the 10th Congregation of Takoradi Polytechnic.
He said polytechnic education had an important role to play, particularly with the oil exploration and production in the country. A total of 2,318 graduates made up of 1,595 males and 723 females were awarded various Higher National Diplomas while 71 Civil Engineering graduates received competency based training certificates.
Vice President Mahama said government was bent on finding perpetual solutions to the impasse with POTAG to pave way for the polytechnics to carry out their mandate of training professionals for the appropriate institutions of technology and development. He said due to the pressure on the Ghana Education Trust fund, government would develop alternative ways of funding school projects throughout the country.
Vice President Mahama gave the assurance that government would continue to provide the necessary logistics that would empower the polytechnics to be responsive to their challenges.Reverend Professor Daniel A. Nyarko, Rector of Takoradi Polytechnic said his outfit would sign a Memorandum of Understanding with the University of Derby in the United Kingdom to mount specialised Bachelors and Masters Programmes in Electrical and Electronics Engineering.
He said the polytechnic would also sign another agreement to begin the training of aircraft maintenance technicians with the assistance of an Aircraft Maintenance Training Institute in Florida, USA. Rev Nyarko appealed to the government to provide the school with residential accommodation and lecture theatres.
Dr K.T. Oduro, Chairman of the Polytechnic Council called on the government to provide a hostel for the more than 3,000 students who were not accommodated on campus. He also called for better working conditions of polytechnic teachers to enable them train more professionals.

description.hltext_display: Chatroom
description.content:
In
In an online world, who's controlling who? When strangers Jim, Eva, Emily and Mo meet William online in his new
OChelsea Teens! chatroom, they're completely seduced by his fast-talking, charismatic character. But beneath the surface lies a much darker truth. William is a dangerous loner, a dysfunctional teenager channelling all his energies into cyberspace. He's become an analyser, a calculating manipulator who finds it almost impossible to interact normally with others in the real world, instead turning his hand to manipulating people online.
Cast:Aaron Johnson, Imogen Poots, Matthew Beard, Hannah Murray, Daniel Kaluuya, Megan Dodds, Michelle Fairley, Nicholas Gleaves, Jacob Anderson, Tuppence Middleton Director:Hideo Nakata Writer:Enda Walsh Duration:97 Official Site:http://www.chatroomfilm.com/ Release: Fri 24 Dec 10 Genre:Drama, Suspense/Thriller

description.hltext_display: Gagal Berkuasa
description.content:
MANCHESTER - Manchester City gagal menjadi penguasa klasemen Liga Primer Inggris selepas ditumbangkan tamunya, Everton, 1-2 di Stadion City of Manchester, Selasa (20/12) dini hari WIB.
The Toffees unggul dua gol lebih dahulu melalui Tim Cahill pada menit keempat, dan Leighton Baines (19). Gol balasan The Citizens tercipta dari bunuh diri Phil Jagielka di menit ke-72.
Bermain di hadapan pendukungnya, City tampil dominan. Vincent Kompany cs unggul jauh dalam penguasaan bola, yakni 69% banding 31%. Skuad tuan rumah melepaskan 33 tendangan, tetapi hanya lima yang mengarah ke gawang.
Sebaliknya, Everton tampil lebih efektif. Pasukan besutan David Moyes ini cuma melakukan lima kali tembakan, dua di antaranya berbuah gol.
Hasil ini kian memperburuk catatan The Citizens tatkala menjamu The Toffees. Dalam empat kali pertemuan terakhir di kandang sendiri, tim sekota Manchester United ini selalu takluk.
Mancio Kecewa Kekalahan ini juga membuat Kompany dkk turun ke posisi tiga.
”Kami kecewa, karena punya banyak kesempatan untuk mencetak gol,” ungkap Roberto ‘’Mancio’’ Mancini, manajer City.
Pria berkebangsaan Italia ini lantas menegaskan, ‘’Namun, kami harus memulai lagi. Musim ini masih panjang.’’
Eks pelatih Inter Milan itu mengakui timnya memulai pertandingan dengan tidak terlalu bagus. Sementara Everton langsung menghentak dan mencetak dua gol dalam 20 menit pertama.
‘’Musim lalu mereka juga punya dua kesempatan dan menghasilkan dua gol,” ujar Mancio.
Di kubu Everton, manajer David Moyes mengaku puas. Dia memuji kejelian Cahill dan Baines. Nama yang disebut terakhir itu saat ini menjadi incaran klub-klub top.
Berkat tambahan tiga poin, Cahill cs naik ke urutan ke-14 dari posisi 15. (rtr,A7-22)

description.hltext_display: ドル、８３円台後半＝小動きに終始〔東京外為〕（２２日午後５時） - 時事通信・経済ニュース
?King?s Speech? a royal treat
description.content:
THE KING'S SPEECH
Director: Tom Hooper
Stars: Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter
Time: 1 hour, 58 minutes
The King's Speech is one of the best movies you'll see all year. The film concerns the true story of an important friendship between two men: King George VI of England, and his speech therapist, Lionel Logue.
The movie won the People's Choice Award at the Toronto International Film Festival this past fall and all the big awards, including best picture, at the British Independent Film Awards earlier this week. Both Colin Firth, who plays the king, and Geoffrey Rush, who plays Logue, are expected to get Oscar nominations for their performances. And deservedly so.
King George VI, father of HRH Queen Elizabeth, the current queen, was not meant to be king. In 1936 his brother, Edward VIII was king, but abdicated the throne to be with the woman he loved and all that, and George VI -- Bertie, as he was known -- was left to lead the country into the Second World War.
Bertie stuttered. And his speech problem was only intensified by the new role of radio in the world, for now the royals had to go on the air with speeches and addresses to the public. After trying to give the closing speech at the British Empire Exhibition and being humiliated for his terrible stammer, Bertie goes off to yet another speech therapist. This one, Lionel Logue, has been discovered by Bertie's loving wife, Elizabeth (Helena Bonham Carter).
Logue, an Australian, is unorthodox in his methods and worse yet, he's familiar; he tells the future king that they must be equals when they work together and even calls him Bertie. The effrontery! Not surprisingly, Bertie quits his treatment with Logue, and more than once.
But Logue helps the future king, and slowly their friendship grows. He gets the future king to talk about (and think about) the origins of his stutter, and within their conversations are a hundred details about the British royals -- the domineering nanny, the lifelong isolation, the hidden, epileptic brother, etc. It's marvellous storytelling, and you really feel as if you get to know these men.
Firth is superb as Bertie, just as Rush is as Logue, and both actors are at the top of their form here. Helping them in supporting roles are Derek Jacobi as the Archbishop of Canterbury, Michael Gambon as George V, Timothy Spall as Winston Churchill and, in what can only be a little colonial in-joke, Australian actor Guy Pearce as Edward VIII.
The King's Speech is funny, intense, and deeply moving. It's a history lesson and a character study, wonderfully written and completely brought to life by a perfect cast.
At last fall's film festival The King's Speech screenwriter, David Seidler, told a story about asking permission of George VI's widow Queen Elizabeth, the beloved Queen Mother, to tell this story on film. She requested he wait until after her death, as the king's struggle with his speech issues was still a painful matter to recall. As Elizabeth lived to be 102, Seidler waited nearly 30 years to bring the story to a wider audience.
It was worth the wait.

they must be equals when they work together and even calls him Bertie.

description.hltext_display: Greek bond downgrade warning adds pressure on government as it votes on budget
description.content:
ATHENS, Greece - Greece's parliament is due to vote on the 2011 budget Wednesday, a day after the Fitch ratings agency warned of a possible downgrade of Greek bonds, adding pressure on the government.
Fitch said on Tuesday that the action "indicates that there is a heightened probability that Greece's sovereign ratings will be downgraded" from its current BBB-minus status after a review is completed next month.
It follows similar warnings from ratings agencies Moody's and Standard and Poor's earlier in December.
A series of ratings downgrades threw Greece into financial turmoil last year — and sparked a crisis for the euro — after the country's new Socialist government revealed misreporting of deficit figures that raised concern over Athens' ability to repay its debts.
The country came to the brink of default last May before receiving a bailout loan package worth euro110 billion ($145 billion) over three years from European Union countries and the International Monetary Fund.
The government is facing increasing hostility over austerity measures from unions and opposition parties
The latest in a wave of strikes this month will also see all public transport halted in greater Athens on Wednesday, but will not affect flights and ferry services.
Even the Greek Orthodox Church and skeptics within the Socialist Party have publicly criticized the reforms as unfairly hurting the poor.
Party veteran Vasso Papandreou, a former EU Employment Commissioner, said the successive cuts by the government were "strangling society," but said she would vote with the government.
"Does this mean we are talking about a credible budget that will be executed with precision and will get us out of the impasse?" she told parliament. "My answer is no."
The Socialists have 156 seats in the 300-member parliament.
___

description.hltext_display: У Бориса Моисеева нарушено кровообращение мозга
description.content:
К таким последствиям привел тяжёлый инсульт, случившийся у певца на днях
У поп-исполнителя Бориса Моисеева, госпитализированного в одну из частных клиник в центре столицы, медики выявили нарушение мозгового кровообращения, сообщает "Интерфакс" со ссылкой на ассистента певца Александра Юдина.
"В ходе наблюдения, проходившего в течение суток, Моисееву был поставлен диагноз "нарушение мозгового кровообращения". Состояние артиста тяжелое, но стабильное. Проводится интенсивная терапия в условиях стационара, угрозы жизни нет", - подчеркнул Юдин.
По его словам, врачи исключили ранее предполагавшийся сопутствующий диагноз "паралич".
"В настоящий момент диагноз паралича признан несостоятельным, угрожающих нарушений со стороны жизненно важных органов нет", - добавил ассистент певца.
Пресс-служба исполнителя вечером во вторник пригласила журналистов центральных СМИ на брифинг, посвященный здоровью артиста, однако в течение двух часов лечащие врачи исполнителя к журналистам не вышли, брифинг был отменен.
Добавить: Класс! Facebook
При перепечатке данной статьи или ее цитировании ссылка: Газета "Вечерняя Москва" - на первоисточник обязательна.

description.hltext_display: Couple in seventh heaven with little miracle Kayla
description.author: Eimear Ni Bhraonain
description.content:
A COUPLE who underwent seven IVF treatments were given the perfect gift this Christmas.
Gina Coakley and her partner Jason Carter had only been given a 0.05pc chance of ever having a baby naturally.
But the childhood sweethearts from Ballinaeranna, Co Carlow, kept the faith -- and they even cancelled their dream wedding to fund IVF treatments. After four rounds of IVF failed, they were told to give up.
But their efforts and patience paid off when little baby Kayla arrived in St Luke's Hospital in Kilkenny weighing a healthy 9lb 6oz.
She's four weeks old today and the doting parents are still in awe of their bundle of joy. Gina said it was a "complete shock" when she got pregnant on her fifth IVF.
"I was told on our fourth that it wouldn't work again. One doctor said, 'that's it'. We were told to give up but we moved clinics after Jason convinced me to try again."
Miscarried
However, the emotional rollercoaster was not over and Gina miscarried. "I miscarried twice," she said.
"But then on the seventh round of IVF, I got pregnant again. I was on a lot of medications until I was 12 weeks to help hold the pregnancy. I was shocked that I stayed pregnant. It was hard but I tried not to be negative."
The couple were due to marry in the Dolmen Hotel in Carlow this December but they were forced to cancel their big day last January.
"She's well worth it, we don't mind. We're together 14 years now so it doesn't matter, we're just so thrilled to have our baby."
Unlike many new mums, Gina doesn't mind if Kayla wakes several times a night. "It doesn't matter if she sleeps or not or if she cries. I love getting up to her."
She said Jason was "over the moon" and Kayla was already "daddy's girl".
Gina added: "He found it very tough. It's not as if men have much to do with IVF. But it's hard on them, too. We did seven in two-and-a-half years so we've been through a lot together.
"Christmas was so hard last year but this year we couldn't be happier."

description.hltext_display: Malaysia Senang Jadi Underdog
description.content:
KUANTAN- Kekalahan 1-5 Malaysia dari Indonesia dalam pertandingan pembukaan Grup A Piala AFF Suzuki 2010 di Jakarta, 1 Desember lalu, tidak bisa dijadikan ukuran ketika kedua tim bertemu sekali lagi di final pada 26 dan 29 Desember ini.
Ketua Persatuan Sepak Bola Malaysia (FAM), Tengku Abdullah Sultan Ahmad Shah mengakui, Malaysia akan turun sebagai underdog. Namun, kondisi itu dinilainya justru menguntungkan karena dari sisi mental, beban timnya menjadi lebih ringan.
Menurut Ahmad Shah, anak-anak asuhan Rajagopal sudah menunjukkan semangat dan mental yang bagus ketika menyingkirkan penyandang juara, Vietnam. Di semifinal, Malaysia menang 2-0 di Kuala Lumpur dan menahan imbang 0-0 Vietnam di Hanoi.
Terlalu Bertahan Namun dia menilai, Malaysia bermain terlalu bertahan dan keadaan ini bisa mengundang risiko jika pemain pertahanan membuat kesalahan saat menghadapi Indonesia di Bukit Jalil, Minggu (26/12) depan.
”Bagian pertahanan dan depan harus seimbang karena kita memerlukan sebanyak mungkin gol ketika bertemu Indonesia. Kalau bisa harus lebih banyak dari lima gol yang diciptakan Indonesia ke gawang kita,’’ tegas Ahmad Shah kepada harian Utusan, Selasa (21/12).
Dia berharap, para pemainnya dapat memanfaatkan peluang di kandang sendiri dengan sebaik-baiknya.
”Saya bangga dengan pemain karena bisa menahan tekanan pendukung Vietnam baru-baru ini dan mereka seharusnya menjaga kekuatan mental yang sama ketika berhadapan dengan pendukung Indonesia di Jakarta nanti (29 Desember),” tambahnya. (F3-43)

description.hltext_display: UN peacekeepers could be treated as rebels - Gbagbo ally
description.content:
An ally of Ivory Coast's incumbent President Laurent Gbagbo has warned UN peacekeepers they could be treated as rebels if they remain in the country after being told to leave.
Mr Gbagbo accuses the UN of siding with his rival Alassane Ouattara and ordered them out of the country.
The UN says Mr Ouattara won last month's poll and has urged all parties to recognise him as president.
It has extended the mandate of its 10,000-strong force by six months.
Mr Gbagbo says the polls were rigged in rebel-held areas of the north and was declared the winner by the Constitutional Council. But the UN mission in Ivory Coast, which was involved in organising the election, backed the electoral commission in saying Mr Ouattara had won.
At least 50 people have been killed in violence linked to the dispute, the UN says, amid fears of a return to civil war.
Mr Gbagbo's Interior Minister, Emile Guirieoulou, said of the UN mission: "If, against our will, they want to keep this force in our country, we won't co-operate with them.
"And if they choose to have authorities other than the legal authorities of the country, they become part of the rebellion."
He also dismissed reports of a mass grave in the main city Abidjan.
"It's lies. All that to get some sympathy."
On Monday, UN special envoy to Ivory Coast Choi Young-jin said the UN had been prevented from investigating the reports.
The UN also says it has received hundreds of reports of people being abducted by armed men at night. Some have later been found dead.
Gbagbo exile offer
UN peacekeeping chief Alain Le Roy told the AFP news agency that UN troops were being harassed by pro-Gbagbo groups.
"They want to cut all of our fuel. They are forcing us to leave the apartments we use," Mr Le Roy said.
UN troops are guarding the luxury Hotel Golf where Mr Ouattara has been based since the election and he meets members of the cabinet he has named.
Western - as well as African countries - have backed Mr Ouattara.
Nigeria's Minister of State for Foreign Affairs Aliyu Idi Hong told the BBC that it would be willing to let Mr Gbagbo go into exile in Nigeria.
The European Union says it will this week issue a travel ban on Mr Gbagbo and 18 of his closest allies, including his wife. It is also working on freezing any assets he may have in the EU.
The election, delayed for five years, was supposed to reunify the world's largest cocoa producer, which has been divided since 2002.

description.hltext_display: Child Protective Services case worker and retired officer facing child porn charges
description.content: SYRACUSE, N.Y. (WKTV) - A case worker with Oneida County Child Protective Services and retired Utica Police officer is now facing federal charges of child pornography.United States Attorney Richard S. Hartunian announced the arrest today of a Frankfort, New York man on child exploitation charges. According to the U.S. Attorney's Office, a federal criminal complaint filed in United States District Court charges Stanley Dorozynski, 53, of Frankfort with receiving and possessing child pornography. Dorozynski is currently employed as a case worker with Oneida County Child Protective Services, the U.S. Attorney's Office said. Dorozynski made his initial appearance Tuesday in federal court and has been remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal pending a detention hearing scheduled for December 23, 2010.The charges filed against Dorozynski are felonies, and upon conviction, he faces a mandatory minimum sentence of five years in federal prison, a maximum term of imprisonment of 20 years, fines of up to $250,000, and mandatory supervised release of no less than five years and up to life following any term of incarceration. In addition, conviction of the charged offenses will require Dorozynski to register as a sex offender. Dorozynski's arrest was the result of an investigation by the Police, assisted by the United States Secret Service. The joint effort is a part of Project Safe Childhood, a nationwide initiative designed to protect children from online exploitation and abuse.

description.hltext_display: Builders lose 50 percent savings worth $2.4 million
description.content:
The Menifee City Council decided Tuesday night to end a 50 percent discount in transportation fees paid by developers.
Over the past year, the discount has saved developers a total of about $2.4 million on Menifee projects.
However, the City Council recently learned that it has to repay that $2.4 million to a regional kitty of transportation funds. Those fees, paid by cities throughout western Riverside County, then get divided to pay for transportation projects throughout the region.
The Western Riverside Council of Governments, the agency that oversees the regional transportation fund, originally recommended the discount, which several cities adopted a year ago to stimulate their local economies. Only until recently did Menifee officials learn they have to repay the difference of the discount.
Mayor Wallace Edgerton questioned why the former city manager, former public works director and former Menifee councilman on WRCOG, who knew the city would have to repay the difference, failed to tell the council.
"What I'm very angry about is this council voted for a reduction in fees and were not aware that we, you, have to make up that 50 percent," Edgerton said.
City Manager Steve Harding said that it's not yet clear how cities are expected to repay the money to the regional fund but it doesn't appear that writing a check from the city's general fund is the only way.
Harding said officials have considered making up the difference by redoing the design of local projects to cost less or downgrading projects.
Harding said the data collected so far does not show whether the discount stimulated the local economy through more residential or commercial development.
Councilman John Denver suggested extending the discount three more months until more conclusive data emerged about the discount's effect on the Menifee budget.
The chief executive officer of the Building Industry Association, Mark Knorringa, asked the council to extend the discount especially because builders are facing increasing costs with new green building and fire sprinkler requirements.
Bryce Meyers, who represented a developer hoping to build a steakhouse in town, said the discount would save the developer $35,000 and could make a difference during a delicate time of deciding where to build.
Though the council decided to end the discount, the council went on to set up an economic incentive ad-hoc committee to brainstorm ways to entice businesses to choose Menifee.
Reach Julissa McKinnon at 951-375-3730 or jmckinnon@PE.com

description.hltext_display: PSIS Minta Tambahan Rp 5 Miliar
description.content:
SEMARANG- PSIS akan meminta tambahan dana Rp 5 miliar ke APBD 2011. Dana tersebut akan digunakan untuk melakoni kompetisi Divisi Utama musim ini.
Ketua Umum PSIS Soemarmo HS mengungkapkan hal tersebut di sela-sela membuka kejuaraan bola voli antarklub PBVSI Kota Semarang di Klipang, Semarang, kemarin.
Pada APBD Perubahan 2010, Mahesa Jenar mendapat bantuan Rp 1,2 miliar dari jumlah Rp 2 miliar yang diajukan. ‘’Jumlah Rp 5 miliar itu sesuai target dengan PSIS bertahan di Divisi Utama musim ini,’’ kata Soemarmo yang juga wali kota Semarang. Dia menegaskan, pengajuan dana tersebut akan melalui mekanisme yang berlaku.
Musim lalu, Mahesa Jenar menghabiskan Rp 9 miliar. Dana tersebut berasal dari APBD Perubahan Rp 8 miliar ditambah Rp 1 miliar dari APBD Murni 2010.
Dengan jumlah dana itu, manajemen akan melakukan penghematan agar dana yang ada cukup hingga akhir kompetisi. Anggaran Rp 5 miliar itu jauh lebih sedikit dibandingkan musim lalu. Padahal target yang dipatok sama, bertahan di Divisi Utama.
Respons Positif Sementara itu, pelatih PSIS Bonggo Pribadi merespons positif saran sejumlah pihak agar dilakukan pembenahan fisik pemain. Meski meraih kemenangan penting saat menjamu Persemalra Tual kemarin, penampilan para pemain dianggap belum sesuai harapan.
Labilnya kondisi fisik pemain itu disampaikan oleh Soemarmo yang datang langsung menyaksikan jalannya laga. Dia berharap para pemain meningkatkan kondisi fisik sebelum laga tandang ke Mitra Kukar. Tak hanya fisik, mantan Sekda Kota Semarang itu juga berharap, Imral Usman dkk mampu mempertahankan semangat juang di atas lapangan.
‘’Prinsipnya kami menerima secara terbuka segala saran dan kritik. Jika itu demi kemajuan tim, mengapa tidak dilakukan?’’ kata Bonggo, yang kemarin meliburkan para pemainnya. Tak hanya peningkatan fisik, dia juga mengaku akan melakukan sejumlah pembenahan dalam dua pekan ke depan.
Namun, dia memiliki penilaian lain terhadap performa anak-anak asuhnya pada laga yang berakhir 2-0 untuk PSIS tersebut. Setelah gol pertama tercipta melalui kaki Prananda, secara tidak sadar para pemain cenderung bertahan. Kondisi itu dianggapnya wajar karena pemain ingin mempertahankan keunggulan.
‘’Penampilan anak-anak pada babak pertama kental oleh pengaruh psikologis. Tuntutan harus menang membuat mereka kurang lepas. Ini bukan karena menurunnya stamina. Mereka takut lawan mencetak gol balasan,’’ kata Bonggo. (H54,K18-43)

description.hltext_display: Gulliver's Travels 3D
description.content:
In this contemporary re-imagining of Jonathan Swift's classic tale, Lemuel Gulliver is a perpetual underachiever and wannabe travel writer at a New York newspaper. When he finally makes an effort to actually venture out of the city to write a travel piece, a storm-tossed voyage lands him on an island inhabited by tiny folks called Liliputians. After a rocky beginning, the gargantuan Gulliver becomes an inspiration to his new six-inch-tall friends. He brings them modern-day wonders like a PDA and music video games - while they help him learn that it's how big you are on the inside that counts. See it in 3D at select locations.
Cast:Jack Black, Jason Segel, Emily Blunt, Billy Connelly, Amanda Peet, Catherine Tate, James Corden, Olly Alexander Director:Rob Letterman Writer:Jonathan Swift Duration:85 Official Site:http://gulliverstravelsthemovie.com/ Release: Sun 26 Dec 10 Genre:Comedy, Action/Adventure Distributor:20th Century Fox

description.hltext_display: فوضي السفر عبر أوروبا تهدأ لكن دون أن تنتهي
惠普以“蝴蝶”型设计理念造就灵活数据中心
description.content:
中国IDC评述网12月22日报道：惠普目前引进一种新的方式来帮助客户将用于建造和设计数据中心的资本投资额减半，并显著地降低碳排放。即将申请专利的惠普灵活数据中心(HP Flexible DC)提供标准化、模块化的数据中心设计与建造方式，使客户能够用灵活解决方案替代传统数据中心设计，在按需扩展的同时节省资源。
“节省资金与运营支出的压力是当今企业面临的最关键挑战之一。”Gartner副总裁兼研究主管David J. Cappuccio表示，“在构建新的数据中心时，客户必须考虑在支持业务增长的同时也能节省时间和成本的方案。”
“金融机构创建了一个数量庞大的数据资源，这意味着它们需要在不中断业务的情况下快速增加其数据中心容量。”富国银行企业资产部高级副总裁Bob Cashner表示，“惠普灵活数据中心以这种具有前景的新方式帮助机构在高效满足计算需求的同时，节省资本密集型数据中心成本。”
惠普灵活数据中心的“蝴蝶”型设计
惠普灵活数据中心基于“蝴蝶”型设计，从中央管理区延伸出四个预制区域或模块。该解决方案采用工业化组件以提高成本效率，并通过多种电力分配与散热分布选项简化构建流程。
惠普关键设施服务(HP Critical Facilities Services)提供咨询、工程设计与架构服务，与客户协作进行需求评估，并帮助客户进行数据中心基础设施建设的各个方面的规划与实施。
“金融服务提供商、政府机构和云与主机托管服务商等客户将发现惠普灵活数据中心可扩展、模块化的特性是引人注目的选择方案。”惠普技术服务部首席技术执行官Kfir Godrich表示，“惠普将帮助客户以创新的方式构建、运营数据中心，在生命周期内节省更大成本。”
惠普灵活数据中心的特点包括：
预制、标准化的组件帮助客户缩短建设和配置数据中心的时间，从而降低资本投入，加快投入市场的步伐。
模块化设计帮助客户在提高容量扩展能力的同时，保持规定的可靠性与冗余水平。
特定配置优化电力与散热资源利用率，从而达到低能耗与节电的效果，使得用户可以减少温室气体排放和设备的碳排放。
气冷(而非水冷)机械系统不但可以为客户节能，更可每年节水数百万加仑。
定价与可用性
惠普灵活数据中心由惠普关键设施服务提供，定价因地点和具体实施内容而异。惠普关键设施服务是惠普全面的数据中心基础设施服务(Critical Facility Services，CFS)的一部分。惠普关键设施服务提供先进的电力与散热制冷解决方案，并在关键业务设施的战略规划、设计和运维持续性服务方面具有丰富经验。

description.hltext_display: PSIS Yunior ke Zona Nasional n Liga Remaja Piala Suratin
description.content:
MALANG- PSIS Yunior bangkit dari keterpurukan. Setelah kalah 1-2 dari Persema, mereka menang besar atas Arema Malang. Pada pertandingan Grup XIIX-B Piala Suratin di Stadion Gajayana Malang, Selasa (21/12), anak-anak Semarang itu menang 3-0.
Kemenangan besar itu membuat PSIS nyaman. Kukuh Pramuyudha dkk memiliki selisih gol lebih baik, 4-2, dibanding Arema.
Hanya dua tim yang akan lolos ke zona nasional dari tiga tim peserta di grup tersebut. Arema masih memiliki satu pertandingan melawan Persema.
Jika Arema yang menang, PSIS tetap lolos karena punya selisih gol lebih baik dibanding Persema. Jika Persema yang menang, PSIS otomatis lolos, demikian pula jika laga berakhir seri.
‘’Dua tim berhak maju ke babak 16 besar nasional. Peluang kami 99 persen karena memiliki selisih gol yang lebih baik dibanding tim lain,’’ ujar manajer tim Rudi Wijaya.
Nasib Arema ditentukan pada pertandingan terakhir melawan Persema. Bila berhasil menang dengan selisih minimal tiga gol, mereka akan menemani PSIS. Sedangkan Persema hanya membutuhkan hasil seri.
Agresif Kukuh cs tampil agresif saat melawan Arema. Tim polesan Arlin Mirhan ini hanya membutuhkan waktu delapan menit untuk membuka keunggulan. Bola hasil tandukan Maulan menit ke-8 tak mampu dihalau kiper lawan.
Anak-anak Semarang terus meningkatkan serangan usai turun minum. Hasilnya, Taufik menggandakan keunggulan timnya menit 53 melalui titik putih. PSIS mendapatkan hadiah penalti setelah Edi Ratno dilanggar di kotak terlarang.
Kapten tim, Kukuh Pramuyudha melengkapi kemenangan PSIS menjadi 3-0 menit 67. Dia melewati beberapa pemain belakang Arema dan melesakkan bola dengan cepat ke gawang. (K18-43)

description.hltext_display: Rosberg szerint erős lesz a Mercedes 2011-ben

description.hltext_display: The heat is on for homeowners with wood boilers
description.content: SCHUYLER, N.Y. (WKTV) - The Department of Environmental Conservation is set to vote on a proposal on Wednesday that could change regulations for outdoor wood burning boilers.The issue has local politicians concerned for their constituents who live in rural communities.An outdoor wood burning boiler, an option for heating your house, looks like a small backyard shed with a short stack.Walt Kraszewski, who lives on Millers Grover Road in Schuyler, has had an outdoor wood burning boiler for a decade, and he wouldn't have it any other way. Thanks to the outdoor boiler, he keeps his house at a comfortable 72 degrees. He gets his wood free from a friend so that helps cut down costs big time.However, new legislation from the DEC could have made outdoor wood burning boilers, like the one Kraszewski owns, illegal. Fortunately for homeowners, legislation has been modified to grandfather in older outdoor boilers. Here's what the new regulation would do if it passes in a vote Wednesday: *Outdoor boilers installed after April 15, 2011 would have to be DEC-compliant.*Those models burn cleaner and are more environmentally friendly, but they also cost more. The units can reach $10,000. *Also, new regulation would dictate the location of the outdoor boilers, causing them to be set back further from neighboring properties. There are some exceptions for farmers. "The DEC has failed to hold a new public comment period on the revised regulations as promised during an October meeting of the Environmental Review Board," Senator James Seward said. "Suspending the vote on revised OWB (Outdoor Wood Boilers) regulations until they receive a full public review is necessary to ensure a proper balance between clean air and allowing upstate residents to make use of affordable, renewable energy sources like outdoor wood boilers."Assemblyman Marc Butler is in agreement with Seward, and he thinks this issue should be regulated on the local level, not the state level. "There are still some things in the bill I am uncomfortable with," Butler said. However, he calls the legislation a partial victory, because it grandfathers-in existing outdoor wood boilers. Butler plans to attend Wednesdays vote, with hopes of postponing any action. To read the DEC's proposal you can visit their website at www.dec.ny.gov/chemical/69348.html

event_or_fact.property: There are still some things in the bill I am uncomfortable with

description.content:
Based on a true story, prisoners of a Soviet Union labour camp flee their Siberian Gulag and begin a treacherous journey across thousands of miles of hostile terrain.

description.hltext_display: Siswa Berhamburan Keluar Kelas
description.content:
WONOGIRI - Merasakan ada guncangan gempa, para murid di berbagai sekolah di Kabupaten Wonogiri, Selasa (21/12), pada berhamburan berebut cepat keluar kelas. Ini dilakukan, setelah mereka merasakan bumi bergoyang dan panik bila getarannya tidak segera berhenti.
Getaran gempa 5,8 skala righter (SR) itu, dirasakan masyarakat Kabupaten Wonogiri pada pukul 10.58. Dampak gempa yang berpusat di 140 KM di kedalaman sekitar 16 KM tenggara Wonosari Kabupaten Gunungkidul DI Yogyakarta itu, getarannya dirasakan sampai keKabupaten Wonogiri.
Meski demikian, tidak ada laporan tentang kemunculan kerusakan sebagai dampak dari adanya getaran gempa itu. Petugas piket di ruang Sandi Telekomunikasi (Santel) Bagian Humas Pemkab Wonogiri, Rambat, menyatakan, pihaknya belum menerima laporan kejadian yang ditimbulkan oleh getaran gempa. ''Tidak ada laporan, sepertinya tidak sampai menimbulkan kerusakan,'' ujarnya.
Merasakan bumi berguncang, para murid SMK Negeri 1 Wonogiri yang tengah mengikuti pelajaran, spontan berusaha meninggalkan ruangan kelasnya untuk menyelamatkan diri keluar. Mereka berhamburan ke luar kelas sambil berteriak-teriak ''gempa-gempa, ada gempa.'' Upaya pengamanan ke luar ruangan kelas, juga dilakukan oleh para guru. Mereka baru kembali ke dalam kelas, setelah getaran gempanya berhenti.
Saat getaran gempa berlangsung, Bupati Wonogiri Danar Rahmanto, Wakil Bupati Yuli Handoko SE, Ketua DPRD Wonogiri Wawan Setya Nugraha SSos, bersama rombongan Pemkab Wonogiri, tengah melakukan kunjungan kerja 'nggugah' desa ke Desa Sumberagung Kecamatan Pracimantoro (sekitar 50 kilometer arah barat daya Kota Wonogiri).
Getaran gempa di wilayah berbatasan dengan Desa Song Banyu Kecamatan Rongkop Kabupaten Gunungkidul DIY ini, terasa sekali guncangannya.
Walau demikian, getaran gempa itu tidak sampai membuat panik warga masyarakat yang berkumpul di Balai Desa Sumberagung, termasuk tim seni kerawitan 'Agung Raras' yang tampil memberikan hiburan penyambutan kedatangan bupati. (P27-34)

description.hltext_display: Abidjan hotel siege humanitarian issue: French envoy
description.content:
A blockade of the hotel where Ivory Coast presidential claimant Alassane Ouattara is holed up is turning into a humanitarian issue, France's ambassador in the country said in a newspaper interview published on Tuesday.
A spokesman for Ouattara's camp said however that the restrictions around the U.N.-guarded Golf Hotel, in Abidjan's plush Riviera neighbourhood, had eased somewhat.
Ambassador Jean-Marc Simon was quoted by daily Le Parisien as saying: "Access is prohibited for all vehicles, which poses a problem for supplies, medicines and maintenance of the hotel. It has become a humanitarian issue."
Ivory Coast's November 28 presidential election was intended to heal the scars of a 2002-03 civil war but instead triggered a standoff between incumbent Laurent Gbagbo and Ouattara, with the latter recognised as victor by the outside world.
Ouattara's eight-point poll victory was overturned on grounds of alleged fraud by the Constitutional Council, a top legal body led by a staunch ally of Gbagbo.
Gbagbo is now subject to sanctions by the European Union, which includes former colonial ruler France.
Allies of Ouattara, including the prime minister of his parallel administration Guillaume Soro, are based at the Golf.
Ouattara is also presumed to be there although his presence has not been confirmed in recent days.
Patrick Achi, a spokesman for Ouattara's government, told Reuters on Tuesday that access restrictions had tightened late last week after a protest march but subsequently eased a bit.
"For several days after we had the march (on Thursday), they started blocking the whole thing ... But since then they loosened up and they stopped blocking so things are okay now," he said, adding that food, water and medical supplies had been hit.
"We have enough supplies. The U.N. have helicopters if need be," he said. "We are more concerned about our people out there in the streets, who are being killed."
U.N. mission chief Y.J. Choi said on Monday that Gbagbo's camp began reinforcing checkpoints set up at the access road to the Golf Hotel from December 16. The checkpoints were disrupting access to food and water supply trucks to the Golf Hotel.

Access is prohibited for all vehicles, which poses a problem for supplies, medicines and maintenance of the hotel.; It has become a humanitarian issue.
