description.hltext_display: What to Do When Someone Is Using Your Social Security Number
description.content:
Provided by IdentityHawk
When an identity thief has a victim's Social Security number, he or she has a passport to commit Social Security fraud, identity theft, and many other crimes. This is one of the many reasons why people should never carry their Social Security cards in their wallets or purses. From the time of issuance when we're children, Social Security cards should be stored in a safe location at home, away from credit cards, drivers' licenses, and other personal information.
If you suspect that a criminal has your Social Security number, the Social Security Administration can help point you in the right direction, but it can't fix your credit. You're the only one who can do that. To that end, here are some things to do if someone is using your Social Security number to commit identity theft and Social Security fraud:
1. Stay cool and focused. While identity theft is stressful, you're the only person who can help with this problem, and you can't solve it in a week or a month. It will take time. Stay as calm and focused as possible, and methodically address the problem.
2. Contact the credit reporting agencies. Contact TransUnion, Equifax, or Experian to place a fraud alert on your credit report. Each agency is required to alert the other two when you place an alert. The alert will prevent a thief from opening any new accounts in your name.
• Equifax: 1-800-525-6285; www.equifax.com • TransUnion: 1-800-680-7289; www.transunion.com • Experian: 1-888-397-3742; www.experian.com
3. Get a copy of your credit report. The law requires each credit agency to provide you with a free copy of your credit report when you place a fraud alert. Examine each report carefully, and look for accounts in your name that you did not open.
4. Contact each creditor. Make a list of the creditors, and contact them by phone and again by mail. Write down the names of the people with whom you speak at each creditor and when. Also, keep a list of all correspondence with each creditor. Remember that you're building your own case and rebuilding your credibility and creditworthiness from scratch. Keeping accurate records is one of your best tools for recovering from identity theft.
5. Contact the Federal Trade Commission. The FTC has an Identity Theft Hotline at 1-877-438-4338 and an online identity theft complaint form at https://www.ftccomplaintassistant.gov/.
6. Contact the Social Security Administration. Fill out the SSA's online complaint form at http://www.ssa.gov/oig/guidelin.htm or call them at 1-800-269-0271 to report the activity.
If a thief has your Social Security number, it will take a while to recover from identity theftbut you should know that you're not alone in your struggle. Millions of people are victims of Social Security fraud every year, and there are resources out there to help you if you're willing to go out and get them

description.hltext_display: Colorado Business
description.content:
gloProfessional, a Denver-based manufacturer and marketer of advanced skin-care products and cosmetics, recently named GyroHSR LLC as its marketing agency of record. The agency's Denver office will lead a strategic communications effort to increase gloProfessional's market share.
CasaTunes, the Fort Collins-based provider of whole-house music servers, announced the multiroom audio industry's first Android app for controlling the music playing throughout a house. The app works with Android versions 2.1 or later and is a free upgrade for owners of CasaTunes.
Mountain Metropolitan Transit announced that McDonald Transit Associates Inc. will be the new fixed bus route service provider for the city of Colorado Springs and the Pikes Peak region. McDonald Transit will begin operation in January.
Miramont Lifestyle Fitness announced the opening of Urgent Care at Miramont in partnership with Pinnacle III LLC, which will manage the facility. Urgent Care Miramont is next to the Miramont Lifestyle Fitness central location. The facility is under the direction of physician Jim Seeton and family nurse practitioner Laura Turk and will offer the community an innovative approach to health care.
EnergyLogic Inc. received a 2010 Larimer County Environmental Stewardship Award. EnergyLogic is a leading provider of home energy efficiency services, consulting, training and software services. The Larimer County awards honor environmental programs that are innovative and proactive and show exceptional effort and concern for stewardship of the environment of Larimer County.
Bio-Intervention Specialists and HSS Inc. announced their companies have signed a five-year partnership to deliver the Bio-Intervention Disinfection Service to hospitals across the United States.
Johnson Capital announced that professionals in its Denver office have recently arranged five debt placements totaling more than $56 million backed by interests in 12 different commercial properties.

description.hltext_display: 2010-12-14 09:05 Social ekonomi erbjuder en väg ur arbetslöshet
description.content:
Sociala företag och arbetskooperativ har länge varit vanligt förekommande på den europeiska kontinenten, men inte lika vanligt i välfärdens Sverige. Nu har Östsam genom ett partiöverskridande samarbete tagit fram en rapport om den sociala ekonomins status och förutsättningar i Östergötland.
Caroline Uneus (M) och Lelle Karlsson (V) har inte haft några problem med samarbetet. Foto: Gustav Skogens
I framförallt Frankrike, Italien och Storbritannien är den sociala ekonomin relativt etablerad. Kooperativa företag skapas när ett behov finns som samhällssystemet inte tillgodosett. Till exempel, saknar en italiensk bergsby barnavård på dagtid går ett gäng föräldrar tillsammans och startar ett dagis.
– Mentaliteten är, att gör vi det inte själva så finns det inte. Svenskar tänker traditionellt sett inte likadant eftersom vi litar på att välfärdsystemet ska ta hand om våra samhällsbehov, säger Caroline Uneus (M) som tillsammans med Lelle Karlsson (V) arbetat med kartläggningen av den östgötska sociala ekonomin.
Ständigt behov
Arbetet med rapporten, som är skriven av Sven-Inge Arnell, startade för drygt ett år sedan. 40 000 östgötar stod utan arbete och försörjde sig på gemensamma försäkringssystem eller socialbidrag, vilket kostade länet 10 och 20 miljarder kronor årligen. Lägg därtill de mänskliga kostnaderna i form av utanförskap, identitetssaknad och psykisk ohälsa som arbetslöshet för med sig. Syftet med projektet är att hitta nya vägar att integrera människor på arbetsmarknaden, att arbetslösa ska sätta sig själva i arbete.
– Det finns alltid ett stort behov för lösningar. Oavsett konjunkturläge finns det alltid en grupp som står utanför arbetsmarknaden, säger Lelle Karlsson.
Samarbetet över ideologigränserna har fungerat smärtfritt.
– Det har inte varit något problem. Arbetslösheten är ett konkret problem och vi presenterar en konkret lösning, säger Caroline Uneus.
– Vi har hittat den minsta gemensamma nämnaren och skalat bort den ideologiska retoriken i rapporten. Den ska fungera på alla nivåer: regionalt, kommunalt och i landsting, oavsett vilka som regerar, säger Lelle Karlsson.
Stor potential
Enligt rapporten finns det en positiv grogrund för Östergötlands sociala ekonomi. I samarbete med kommuner, landsting, näringslivet och arbetsförmedlingen kan sociala företag komma att spela en betydande roll i att hjälpa arbetsmarknadens utsatta grupper. I Östergötland finns nu tio till femton sociala företag, de flesta inom servicebranscher som städ, flytt och parkförvaltning. Lelle Karlsson ser en stor tillväxtpotential.
– Vi har tittat på dem som står längst ifrån arbetsmarknaden. Av de här 40 000 kanske det finns fem till tio tusen som passar att driva ett företag, säger Lelle Karlsson.
– Förutom den ekonomiska tillväxten är den mänskliga tillväxten minst lika viktig. Att gå från arbetslös och se att man kan driva ett företag betyder väldigt mycket för självkänslan. Vi arbetar utifrån ett underifrånperspektiv och inte toppstyre, säger Caroline Uneus.

FIRST NATIONAL BANK: Has hired Rocci Bryan to join its mortgage area in Loveland.
METRO DENVER PARTNERS: Has elected the following new officers for its board of directors: Jason Weston, president; Chris Ross, vice president; Brendan Gustafson, treasurer; Jason A. Anderson, secretary; Matt Brower, assistant secretary; and Doug Askam, immediate past president.
COLORADO PUBLIC TELEVISION, CPT12: Has appointed Kim Johnson to the position of chief operating officer.
HUTTON ARCHITECTURE STUDIO: Announced that Margaret Pauls has been named the new U.S. Green Building Council (Colorado) Green Schools Advocacy Committee co-chairwoman.
WHEELER TRIGG O'DONNELL LLP: The Denver- based law firm has named Miko Brown and LaMar Jost partners.
PETER WEBB PUBLIC RELATIONS INC.: Recently announced the promotion of Jennifer Holliman to account manager and Sarah Gianti as full-time account assistant.
E-470 PUBLIC HIGHWAY AUTHORITY: Announced the following personnel changes: Acting director John McCuskey has been named executive director; David Kristick was promoted to deputy executive director; Joe Donahue is chief financial officer; and Jason Myers joins as controller.

description.hltext_display: 小巧型投影机 三星P410M降至5199元
description.content:
三星SP-P410M是一款非常小巧的便携式投影机，由于采用了LED的光源使得其成本非常低廉。并且其最大的特点是无需连接电脑其自带了USB直接读取的功能。非常适合户外演讲及讲座。此机型的才考报价在4899元左右。对此有兴趣的朋友可以关注下这个产品。
三星SP-P410M其体积约为148.6×147×66.5mm，大小仅有一张光碟的大小。重量约为0.95kg。从携带方面绝对是一个不二选择的投影机，外表使用了钢琴烤漆显得十分稳重而又时尚，以及多种颜色的选择，更让其在家用方面更加完美。
这款投影机拥有800×600的分辨率和1000:1的对比度，亮度达到了170流明。接口方面配备了D-Sub和Video视频输入接口，并且配备了两个1W的扬声器。当然，作为一款采用LED冷光源的家用投影机，因为发热量没有普通投影那高，所以风扇的噪音也得到了很好的控制，只有28dB的噪音水平。
[产品型号]:三星P410M
[参考报价]:5199元

description.hltext_display: 英特爾提出2011年11大科技� �言，平板電...
description.content:
處理器龍頭大廠英特爾為2011年提出11大科技預言，包括平板電腦熱潮來襲、智慧電視出現、情境感知技術的普及都在英特爾的科技趨勢預測中，其中，英特爾更認為類似電影「關鍵報告」中的互動式數位電子看板將被廣泛運用。以下列出英特爾提出的2011年11大科技趨勢預測：
1. 智慧電視夢想成真
英特爾預測，在2011年底之前，眾多的無線、有線電視以及消費性電子產品廠商將跨足智慧型電視（Smart TV）市場，並吸引消費者開始採用智慧電視。
2. 平板電腦熱潮席捲市場
許多配備不同外型與作業系統的平板電腦將席捲2011年的科技市場，同時，結合小筆電（Netbook）與平板電腦優點的新型混種裝置也將亮相，像是曾在英特爾科技論壇（Intel Developer Forum）上出現、內含英特爾處理器的戴爾（Dell）原型機，或是新款11吋螢幕Macbook Air筆記型電腦，都是兼具小筆電與平版電腦優點的機種。
3. 筆記型電腦銷售更上層樓
歸功於英特爾在明年推出的新核心處理器將為消費者帶來各種新的HD以及繪圖相關功能，筆記型電腦的銷售不受平板電腦的影響，預測將持續成長。此外，科技產業的支出增加與企業換機潮也有助於筆記型電腦銷售。
4. 個人電腦與智慧型裝置將具備感知功能
當第一波情境感知或感知電腦（perceptual computer）上市時，這類運用硬體與軟體感知技術的電腦將大受市場歡迎。舉例來說，一項名為個人度假助理（Personal Vacation Assistant）的手機裝置將能透過情境感知運算科技，讓使用者得到最棒的旅遊經驗。這類裝置將運用硬體與軟體感測器，結合能辨識物體的攝影機並從GPS擷取資訊，幫助使用者得到在地資訊，包括觀光景點與美食資訊等。
5. 智慧型電子看板將被廣泛運用
類似電影「關鍵報告」中的互動式數位電子看板將被廣泛運用，這類產品結合許多新的互動模式，包括臉部與手勢辨識功能。
6. 消費者節能與環保的革新
隨著越來越多的住宅能源管理裝置與服務上市，消費者將能真正身體力行，實施節能環保措施。
7. 更嚴密的科技安全防護
明年的科技產業將聚焦於保護基礎設施與維護個人與企業資訊安全。Intel Core vPro處理器、英特爾併購McAfee一案以及與英特爾矽晶片相關的開發計畫，都將在此扮演重要角色。此外，英特爾也認為越來越多的網友將更注重網路隱私安全，包括在Facebook上分享的照片或Twitter帳戶安全問題等。
8. IT產業的「消費化」
在2011年，企業用裝置與消費性電子產品之間的界線將越趨模糊，員工用個人的電子裝置提高工作效率，同時企業也希望藉由裝置提高工作生產力。虛擬化、防盜技術、遠端管理以及安全防護等技術都將有助於IT產業的「消費化」。
9. 雲端技術與虛擬運算前景光明
當越來越多的雲端服務搶攻商業應用市場，企業雲也將跟著蓬勃發展。多數的大型企業已經在2010年發展虛擬運算，而預計內部雲端解決方案也將成明年企業的發展重點。
10. 汽車科技
當先進科技成為今日汽車的神經中樞，無論是新型娛樂功能、智慧型手機聲控裝置、安全科技或自動駕駛等新功能，汽車科技將持續吸引人們的目光。
11. 摩爾定律不死
創新科技與製造技術的提升將再次證明摩爾定律不死，科技產業將持續進步。這意謂著在2011年，數十億的新裝置將擁有更佳的運算與上網功能，矽晶圓將搭載更多功能，讓系統同時具備高效能、低功耗與更久的電池續電力。

description.hltext_display: Şimdi de Kobe Bryant a Taktı
description.content: Ermeni Soykırımı tasarısının ABD Kongre Genel Kurulu gündemine alınması için kampanya başlatan Ermeni asıllı Amerikalı ünlü reality şov yıldızı Kim Kardashian şimdi de Türk Hava Yolları'nın marka temsilcisi olan NBA yıldızı Kobe Bryant'a taktı. News.am internet sitesinin haberine göre, büyük kalçalarıyla ün yapan Kardashian, Kobe Bryant ile THY arasında imzalanan marka temsilciliği anlaşmasının iptal edilmesi için Twitter üzerinden kampanya başlattı. Kim Kardashian iki hafta önce de yine Twitter üzerinden Ermeni diasporasına seslenerek, ABD Temsilciler Meclisi Başkanı Demokrat Parti'li Nancy Pelosi'yi arayıp, Dış İlişkiler Komitesi'nin Mart ayında kabul ettiği Ermeni Soykırımı karar tasarısını Genel Kurul gündemine alması için baskı yapmalarını istemişti İH (GE) (Doğan Haber Ajansı) 23 dakika önce.. [2430023]

description.hltext_display: Fed program to aid Europe extended
description.content:
WASHINGTON The Federal Reserve has extended a program to ease strains from the European debt crisis. The program, which now goes through Aug. 1, lends dollars to other central banks in exchange for their currencies. The central banks can lend those dollars out to banks in their home countries to ease financial turmoil.
Denver Post staff and wire reports

description.hltext_display: Primary school league tables: good results down to strong discipline and school trips, says top primary
2010-12-15 09:07 Ostlänken lösning på kapacitetsbristen
description.content:
Planerna för Ostlänken, två spår för höghastighetståg genom Östergötland till Stockholm, är långt gångna. Men sedan finansminister Anders Borg avfärdat satsningen som ”robust olönsam” har den blivit en politisk icke-fråga. Per Sandström, före detta VD för Nyköping-Östgötalänken AB, vill vända på debatten.
Per Sandström lämnade VD-posten i våras och har hunnit fundera och förundras en hel del över sättet att hantera järnvägsfrågorna i landet.
Han är nu samordnare för infrastruktur på Regionförbundet Östsam.
– Hur lönsamt är det att ha kvar den situationen vi har? Ostlänken skulle lösa kapacitetsbristen och skapa tillväxt.
Dessutom kommer miljöfrågan som en bonus, säger Per Sandström.
Han syftar på att Södra stambanan som går genom Östergötland är idag kraftigt överbelastad och situationen ohållbar.
Enligt honom beror senaste tidens tågkaos i första hand inte på hårt vinterväder eller SJ:s inkompetens, utan att det inte längre finns några marginaler i tågtrafiken.
–Stannar ett tåg kan genast 5-20 tåg till bli stående.
Det är som fallande bowlingkäglor.
Södra stambanan har sämst punktlighet i Sverige och allra sämst är det mellan Stockholm-Linköping.
Faktum är att det var sämre tidspassning till exempel under sensommaren 2010 än under årets första vintermånader, säger han.
Skev verklighetssyn
Trots det sade regeringen i ett PM så sent som 30 mars i år att inga extra pengar kommer att avsättas till Södra stambanan fram till 2022, utan att det ökade trafikbehov kommer att kunna mötas genom ”nya investeringar och trimningsåtgärder” som ryms inom den satta budgeten. Man hänvisar till dåvarande Banverkets bedömning. Per Sandström köper inte resonemanget.
–Tittar man ut genom fönstret inser man att det är ett mycket märkligt sätt att se på verkligheten, suckar han. Vi har drivit Ostlänken så hårt eftersom vi förutsett den nuvarande kapacitetsbristen.
Om inget radikalt görs kommer stora trafikstörningar bli vardag och ett normaltillstånd i åtminstone 10-15 år.
Bortprioriteras?
Östergötland har idag landets fjärde största pendeltågsystem med tre miljoner passagerare per år.
När fler vill nyttja spåren riskerar Östgötapendeln att bortprioriteras.
–Efter mina år i bolaget kan jag konstatera att det finns en mycket stor samstämmighet mellan östgötar och sörmlänningar om att den akuta kapacitetsfrågan kräver utbyggnad av spårsystemet.
Tyvärr delas denna uppfattning ännu inte på central politisk nivå. Vi får se hur diskussionerna kommer att se ut efter årets vintersäsong.
Förutom att det saknas beredskap för det ökade trafiktrycket tycker Per Sandström att det är ännu värre att det saknas en tydlig vision för framtiden. Ingen vågar ta i frågan.
–Hur ser politiken, oavsett parti, på 2000- talet stambana nu när vi vet att 1900- talets stambana inte räcker till? Nöjer man sig att fortsätta att söka syndare och lappa och laga där det är som värst eller tar man bort skygglapparna och satsar på framtiden som är Ostlänken?
Det här är obekväma beslut att ta, men det är den tydligheten och ärligheten som jag tror att allt fler i landet kräver, avslutar han.

description.hltext_display: Vestas wins new contract.
description.content:
Vestas Wind Systems, the Danish company with 1,500 manufacturing employees in Colorado, received an order for 55 1.8-megawatt turbines, the company said Tuesday.
The equipment is for a wind-energy project in British Columbia. The contract includes delivery and commissioning along with a 10-year service and maintenance agreement. Delivery is scheduled for mid-2012, and commissioning is expected in late 2012.
The blades will be made in Windsor, towers in Pueblo and nacelles assembled in Brighton.

description.hltext_display: Suthers sues firms making advances on settlements.
description.content:
Colorado Attorney General John Suthers filed a lawsuit against two out-of-state companies that he says are illegally making loans disguised as cash advances on expected lawsuit settlements.
The lawsuit also claims Oasis Legal Finance of Northbrook, Ill., and LawCash of Brooklyn, N.Y., are engaged in deceptive trade practices that violate state law.
The companies sued in October alleging the state is improperly trying to regulate them as lenders. Suthers alleges in his suit that the companies charge as much as 215 percent interest in the form of fees on money they advance to clients who are borrowing against funds anticipated from lawsuit settlements.
Neither business is licensed in Colorado to make loans that exceed 12 percent, a state requirement.

event_or_fact.property: in his suit that the companies charge as much as 215 percent interest in the form of fees on money they advance to clients who are borrowing against funds anticipated from lawsuit settlements

description.hltext_display: 尽显大厂风范 华硕P7H57D-V-EVO仅1K5
description.content:
华硕P7H57D-V EVO主板支持最新的采用LGA1156封装的英特尔?Lynnfiel和Clarkdale处理器，集成内存和PCI高速控制器，可支持双通道DDR3内存。支持PCI Express 2.0插槽，提供卓越的图形性能。此外，Intel?Clarkdale 整合图形处理单元 (GPU) 处理器，搭配Intel?H57/H55芯片组可提供VGA输出功能，将为您带来新一代VGA性能的全新体验。它也提供独立的3D、2D及视频引擎，以通过硬件执行不同的图形控制功能。
华硕P7H57D-V EVO内存供电方面采用2相全封闭式电感供电，提供了4条DIMM内存插槽，支持DDR3 2133（OC）/1600/1333/1066MHZ多种内存速度规格，以符合最新3D图形、多媒体、因特网等应用所要求的高速运行带宽。双通道DDR3架构可大幅提升系统性能并消除宽带瓶颈。
在磁盘接口上，华硕P7H57D-VEVO主板提供了6个SATA2.0磁盘接口，支持RAID 0,1,5,10功能。通过板载桥接Marvell88SE9123控制芯片，还提供了2个SATA3.0磁盘接口，数据传输速度提升至500MB/s(理论值)。不过受限于目前传统存储介质的转速影响，单块普通硬盘极限也只有130MB/s的速度，要想体验这种极速快感只有期待SSD尽快降价了。值得一提的是主板还保留了UltraDMA 133/100/66接口，老IDE硬盘用户不必再为接口不兼容而犯愁了。
华硕P7H57D-V EVO主板板载ALC889顶级蓝光音效芯片、RTL8112千兆网络芯片。
在主板扩展接口方面，华硕P7H57D-V EVO为大家提供了一条全速PCI-E X16显卡插槽和一个PCI-E非全速PCI-E插槽，支持组建双卡SLI与CrossFireX系统，同时还提供了2个PCI接口、2个PCIe 2.0 x1插槽(2.5GT/s, 灰色插槽)接口及1个PCIe 2.0 x1接口(5GT/s, 蓝色插槽)，为大家安装各种扩展设备提供了便利。
在主板I/O接口方面，华硕P7H57D-V EVO提供了PS/2键盘接口、4个USB2.0接口以及2个USB3.0接口、光纤音频接口、IEEE1394a接口、e-SATA接口，视频输出方面提供了VGA+DVI+HDMI全视频输出设计，配合32nm i5/i3强大的视频处理芯片，可满足中高端用户的使用需要。
[产品型号]:华硕P7H57D-V EVO
[参考价格]:1510元

description.hltext_display: Se upp för jultjuvar
description.content:
Jul- och nyårshelgerna närmar sig med stormsteg och under dessa högtider ökar också inbrotten i hela landet. Inbrottstjuvarna passar på när de vet att villaägare eller lägenhetsinnehavare firar ledigheterna på annat håll, och många riskerar att komma hem till tömda hem.
Under jul- och nyårshelgerna är många bortresta och hus och lägenheter står tomma, vilket inbjuder inbrottstjuvar till att hälsa på. Det är då viktigt att vidta brottsförebyggande åtgärder för att förhindra inbrott.
Polisen i Östergötland jobbar just nu aktivt med detta inför den kommande julhelgen.
Brett samarbete hos polisen
Det sker ett samarbete mellan de olika avdelningarna inom polisen. Bland annat har studenter vid Linköpings universitet informerats på universitetets hemsida om hur de kan förebygga inbrott i sina studentbostäder och Närpolisen i Linköping har kontaktat alla grannsamverkansgrupper som finns i kommunen och gått ut med information. Polisen ska också finnas mer synlig på de orter där inbrott brukar begås, såsom orter nära E4:an.
Oftast genom altandörren
– De flesta inbrott sker genom altandörren eller genom att man slår sönder ett fönster på husets baksida. Sedan tar man det som man snabbt kan omsätta i pengar. Smycken, elektronik och annat försvinner snabbt säger Thomas Rahnel, chef på stöldroteln i Norrköping.
Allmänheten viktig
Allmänhetens hjälp är oerhört viktig för Polisen i arbetet att försöka hindra att inbrott begås. Polisen uppmanar alla länets invånare att anmäla alla incidenter, både fullbordade och försök till inbrott, eller bara misstänkta beteenden till Polisen.
Vid pågående brott ska du ringa 112. Annars kan du lämna tips via 114 14. Nu finns det också möjlighet att lämna tips via ett webbformulär på Polisen.se.
Vad gör man?
Om du ändå drabbas av inbrott, tänk på följande: Gå ut ur huset vid upptäckt av inbrott och ring till polisen. Börja inte gå omkring i bostaden eller rota bland sakerna för att konstatera vad som är borta, det kan förstöra spår för polisens tekniker.
Smarta välinformerade tjuvar
Man ska tänka på att man inte är anonym på Facebook och att det faktiskt finns ligor i våra grannländer som regelbundet kollar efter välbärgade personer. Läser deras loggar och kontrollerar om de ska resa bort. Man kollar till och med med vilka de ska resa bort och sedan går man in på till exempel hitta.se och får ut adressen på huset eller husen.
Sedan slår man in koordinaterna på GPS-mottagaren i bilen och åker sedan och tömmer husen på allt av värde. Ibland hittar tjuvarna mycket värdefull information i intet ont anande personers loggar på Facebook som man kan utnyttja. Det handlar ofta om när man ska resa bort eller var man ska befinna sig vid vissa tidpunkter.
Viktigt med grannsamverkan
Det gäller också att tänka på att ha någon som tar in posten, kanske skottar lite snö på tomten, ser till att gardinerna ändras, och samverkar på andra sätt.
– Det är förvånansvärt ofta som folk förlitar sig på larm, men det händer att man glömmer detta. Många inbrott är dock väl planerade och man kanske inte alltid tänker på att man
röjer sina julvanor på

description.hltext_display: American Airlines cuts ties with Orbitz
description.content:
CHICAGO American Airlines yanked all of its airfares from Orbitz Worldwide on Tuesday, severing ties with the online travel giant that the carrier formed a decade ago with United and other leading airlines.
Chicago-based Orbitz stopped selling tickets for travel on American and American Eagle flights after a Cook County Circuit Court judge allowed the nation's No. 3 airline to cancel contracts amid a dispute with the online travel agency and its corporate parent, Travelport. The carrier said it would continue to honor tickets sold through Orbitz.

description.hltext_display: 小巧便携 佳能FC290S复印机 仅需1880
description.content:
佳能 FC290S是一款集小巧、便携、时尚为一体的复印机。这款时尚的复印机在颜色方面有红色、黄色、蓝色以及紫红四种颜色可供选择。目前南昌地区的参考价格为1880元，对此感兴趣的朋友们可以关注下。
佳能 FC290S在外观设计方面采用了非常流行的流线型设计，使得外形非常清爽简洁，使其被赋予了时尚又美观的称号。佳能 FC290S体积为439×359×115mm，重量约为8KG左右，携带非常方便。
佳能 FC290S在性能方面也拥有不错的表现。在感光材料方面采用了OPC鼓，显影系统为墨粉喷射系统，定影方式是佳能快速热启动，曝光控制可以手动，也可以设置为自动，复印装置是间接静电转印，连续复印可达10张，可以满足一般用户的复印要求。
[产品型号]:佳能FC290S
[参考报价]:1880元

description.hltext_display: Jeweler Shane Co. emerges from bankruptcy.
description.content:
Centennial- based Shane Co., the largest privately held jeweler in the U.S., said Tuesday it has emerged from Chapter 11 bankruptcy.
The 20-store retailer filed for Chapter 11 protection from creditors in January 2009, after a dismal luxury-goods shopping season and a $36 million cost to fix an inventory-management system that was purchased for $8 million to $10 million.

entity.property: privately held jeweler in the U.S.

description.hltext_display: Belarus sets Russian rouble bond coupon at 8.7 pct
description.content:
Reuters - 23 minutes ago
* Coupon set at 8.70 pct
* Issue was postponed last month
* Comes amid improvement in Russia-Belarus relations
MOSCOW, Dec 22 - Belarus set an 8.70 percent coupon on its 7 billion Russian rouble bond on Wednesday, tapping the market after a one-month delay it blamed on unfavourable global conditions.
Minsk's debut on the Russian market comes as Alexander Lukashenko was officially re-elected to a fourth term in office in a vote that was followed by a violent police crackdown on the opposition. [ID:nLDE6BD10S]
Relations with Moscow, often tense in the recent past, appear to have thawed a bit, with Russia agreeing to scrap duties on oil products saving Minsk some $4 billion a year and averting the threat of winter energy supply disruptions.
The placement of the 2-year paper in Russia will start on Thursday, disclosure documents showed.
Belarus, hit hard by last year's economic downturn that also affected its main trading partners, Russia and the euro zone, issued its debut $1 billion Eurobond this summer.
It tried to tap the Russian market in late November, but decided to delay the placement. At the time, the order book had been filled with a coupon guidance of 8.75 percent. [ID:nLDE6AN0CS]
The order book was re-opened on Dec. 16, and lead managers said on Wednesday that it had been filled with orders at a 8.70 percent coupon level -- towards the upper end of the 8.50-8.75 percent guidance. [ID:nLDE6BK1K3]
Russia's domestic OFZ treasury bonds maturing in March 2013 are currently yielding 6.3 percent , having eased slightly from last week's 1-year highs around 6.7 percent.
The rouble bond market has been hit by expectations of Russian central bank interest rate hikes, a seasonal influx of liquidity from a year-end government spending splurge and ongoing global risk aversion.
With yields elevated, Russia's finance ministry cancelled two OFZ treasury bond auctions planned for Wednesday [ID:nLDE6BK0QH] and postponed its plans for rouble Eurobonds until conditions improve [ID:nLDE6B2196].
(Reporting by Yelena Fabrichnaya; Writing by Toni Vorobyova; Editing by Jessica Bachman)

description.hltext_display: MAGNA ANNOUNCES MANAGEMENT CHANGE
SEC looking into hasty exit of H-P's CEO
description.content:
SAN FRANCISCO Federal investigators have been gathering information about Mark V. Hurd's sudden departure as chief executive of Hewlett- Packard, the latest twist in a five-month story that has put the company in the middle of a Silicon Valley soap opera.
Officials with the Securities and Exchange Commission have started a preliminary investigation that centers on Hurd's surprise resignation from H-P in August, according to a person with knowledge of the matter who asked for anonymity. The exact nature of the investigation remains unclear, although there have been allegations that Hurd leaked inside information about a pending H-P acquisition.
Hurd is now co-president of Oracle.

description.hltext_display: Ny blogg lanseras i Linköping
description.content:
Idag lanserade kommunen en ny blogg, Ung Linköping. På den bloggen kan ungdomar i åldern 13-19 år få tips på aktiviteter och evenemang som är på gång under jullovet.
Sara Hugosson är en av ungdomsombuden i Linköpings kommun. Foto: Tommy Pettersson
Bloggsidan visar upp en provkarta av fritidsgårdars program och tips på friluftsaktiviteter. Länkar leder vidare till bland annat fritidsgårdarnas egna Facebook-sidor.
Julbloggande
Kommunens ungdomsombud är de som ansvarar för att hålla den bloggen uppdaterad.
– Vi vill på ett smidigt sätt samla ihop aktiviteter och evenemang för unga i Linköping. Vi har sett ett behov av att presentera detta på ett och samma ställe, säger Sara Hugosson, ett av de två ungdomsombuden i Linköpings kommun och fortsätter.
– Bloggen fungerar som en plattform som vi hoppas ska erbjuda en bredd. Vi lanserar den inför jullovet eftersom det är mycket på gång som unga kan göra. Men bloggen fortsätter förstås med aktiviteter även efter lovet.
Kommunalrådet Paul Lindvall anser att det är betydelsefullt för kommunen att öppna en kanal riktad till och från ungdomar:
– Linköping har regionens yngsta befolkning. Därför är det viktigt med en kanal där de kan vara delaktiga och få kontakt med andra. Förhoppningsvis kan det leda till diskussioner om vad som är på gång i Linköping och bidra till stadens utveckling, säger Paul Lindvall.
– Bloggen Ung Linköping är ytterligare ett led i vårt arbete att använda webben som en effektiv kanal. Bloggen är ett flexibelt uttryckssätt där vi kan samla aktiviteter för ungdomar på ett och samma ställe, säger Catarina Thuning, kommunikationsdirektör i Linköpings kommun.

description.hltext_display: Posco undecided on Korea Express
description.content:
Posco hasn’t decided whether to bid for a stake in Korea Express Co., the steelmaker said in a regulatory filing yesterday. Local media reports earlier reported that Posco is considering buying a stake in the logistics company after Asiana Airlines and Daewoo Engineering & Construction said last week they may sell their respective holdings.
Shares of Posco, the world’s No. 2 producer of stainless steel, rose the most in six months in trading on the reports.

description.hltext_display: House OKs food-safety bill, sends it to Obama
description.content:
/scriptWorkers load a truck with lettuce in Watsonville, Calif. Produce is among the concerns addressed in the new food-safety bill. ( file photo ) if(requestedWidth 0)} WASHINGTON The House has passed a sweeping bill aimed at making food safer following recent contaminations in peanuts, eggs and produce, sending the legislation to President Barack Obama for his signature.
The legislation passed Tuesday would give the government broad new powers to inspect processing plants, order recalls and impose stricter standards for imported foods. The $1.4 billion bill also would require larger farms and food manufacturers to prepare detailed food-safety plans and tell the Food and Drug Administration how they are working to keep their food safe at different stages of production.
Praising the House, FDA Commissioner Margaret Hamburg said the bill will give her agency new tools to make substantial improvements in food safety.
"This law makes everyone responsible and accountable at each step in today's global food-supply chain," Hamburg said.
The food-safety bill has faced several false starts since the House first passed it in July 2009. It stalled in the Senate for more than a year as small farms objected to the increased oversight and conservatives complained about the cost. Most recently, the Senate passed the bill in November with tax provisions that were supposed to originate in the House under the Constitution, threatening completion of the bill.
House leaders tried to revive the bill by including it in year-end budget legislation, but that legislation later died when Senate Republicans objected to adding food safety and other unrelated measures to the giant spending bill. Democratic leader Harry Reid gave the legislation a last-minute, surprise reprieve Sunday by working with Republicans to pass a stand-alone food-safety bill by voice vote, sending it to the House. The House passed it 215-144, sending it to Obama just under the wire as Congress prepares to adjourn for the year.
The legislation has unprecedented backing from many major food companies, many of which realize that safe food is good for business.
Recent outbreaks in spinach and other foods have hurt those industries financially as consumers hear about widespread recalls.
Still, the bill came under fire from advocates of buying locally produced food and operators of small farms, who said it could bankrupt some small businesses.

event_or_fact.property: the bill will give her agency new tools to make substantial improvements in food safety
This law makes everyone responsible and accountable at each step in today's global food-supply chain

description.hltext_display: The Sims Medieval Special Edition to enchant players early next year
description.author: staff
description.content:
The Sims was last seen painting the town red and burning rubber across the gaming terrain with its Late Night Expansion Pack and Fast Lane Stuff pack respectively. Electronic Arts is all set to take players into another realm and background altogether as a special limited edition version of The Sims Medieval is now up for pre-order.
Through this offering, gamers can take complete advantage of three new themed throne rooms namely Dark Magic, Barbarian and Princess themes. A pair of exclusive outfit sets known as Monarch and Executioner are also unveiled where the former lets players adorn the garb of royalty while the latter offers a leather apron and black hood. The latest iteration is looked upon as a new standalone game from the acclaimed franchise.
“With the Limited Edition version of The Sims Medieval, we are giving players several great bonuses for being among the first to experience our new standalone franchise within the world of The Sims,” revealed Scott Evans, General Manager of The Sims Studio.
The Sims Medieval comprises of various features transporting owners to medieval times where they can embark on quests, complete storyline elements, level-up their characters and build up a medieval kingdom. Different situations are opened up to them such as opting to present poison or marry a witch and having duels to the death. They can also punish Sims by throwing them into the Pit of Judgment. The quests unfurl in a variety of ways depending on the desired Hero Sim.
Players can expect to be pulled into a world that boasts of all the elements and environments that are associated with the dark theme. These include quest-based gameplay as well as medieval objects like thrones, swords and stocks. The Hero Sim can be completely customized and set off on epic quests as well as fulfill their daily responsibilities like forging armor, trading for exotic goods and healing the unwell.
The Sims Medieval along with its Limited Edition for PC and Mac is slated to release in March 2011 tagged with a price of $49.99.

description.hltext_display: Sutton Trust: keep Offa independent and boost its powers
官网：湖人此败错在自身 雄鹿完成不可能任务
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
官网：湖人错在自己
腾讯体育讯 北京时间12月22日消息，在结束了一段漫长的客场之旅后，湖人回到了洛杉矶，但谁也没想到，他们竟以79-98遭到雄鹿的屠杀，五连胜就此终结。赛后，NBA官网头条评论道：湖人回到斯坦普中心，却载了一个大跟斗。
湖人在与雄鹿过去的6次交手中，都是铩羽而归，而雄鹿在过去一周时间里，接连输掉了3场比赛，并且由于球员伤病而阵容不整，健康的球员只有9位。但就是面对这样一个并不起眼的对手，湖人的跟斗却栽得相当厉害??对手获胜的欲望明显比他们强烈。科比更是在第四节没能控制住情绪，在与裁判的较量中吃到两个技术犯规而被逐出场。这让在场边的主教练杰克逊也无可奈何了。
“我告诉他们，他们不可能打得比这场比赛更烂了。”杰克逊在赛后说道，“这正是我们一直都担心的，下半场我们短暂地打出了一点状态，其余时间就根本缓不过气来了。”其实，早在这场比赛开始前，湖人就曾公开表示过对这场比赛的担心。他们结束了漫长的客场之旅，重新回到主场，有可能会出现心理上的松懈。
实际情况似乎也是这样的，湖人在比赛中的大部分时间都被雄鹿的防守压制着。而雄鹿依靠着一个9人的轮换阵容，在斯坦普中心打出了一场星级防守战，更在本赛季第三次命中率过半百。赛后，雄鹿主教练斯科特点评本场比赛时表示，他不想刻意去说进攻和防守哪一端做得更好，他认为雄鹿今天在攻防两端都表现得很出色，“下半场，我们在防守端的表现一如既往地好，让他们只得了33分，第四节只有13分。这可是一个不容易完成的任务。”
科比在赛后依然对这场比赛的失利以及被逐出场感到窝火，拒绝了任何记者的提问。而湖人其他球员在赛后则对这场比赛的失利做出了检讨。费舍尔说道：“我认为这跟对手没有多大关系，完全是因为我们根本没有打出自己的比赛。”奥多姆也表示：“这场失败是我们自讨的，这本来是一场能够拿下的比赛。”
在休息两天后，湖人将会在圣诞大战中主场迎战热火。
（无疆）

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Bank to pay over $550 million for role in dodging U.S. taxes
description.content:
NEW YORK Deutsche Bank admitted criminal wrongdoing and agreed to pay more than $550 million in connection with its participation in tax shelters that enabled the rich to temporarily avoid paying hundreds of millions of dollars in U.S. taxes, authorities announced Tuesday.
Federal prosecutors and the Justice Department's tax division announced the deal, saying a nonprosecution agreement requires the bank to continue cooperating and to submit to the appointment of an independent expert who will review its compliance measures and ensure it does not help people dodge taxes in the future.
Authorities said the $553,633,153 payment by the bank will include that amount of taxes and interest that the Internal Revenue Service was unable to collect from taxpayers from 1996 to 2002 because of the misconduct. It also includes a civil penalty of more than $149 million.
In a statement, Deutsche Bank said it was pleased that the investigation had been resolved.
"Since 2002, the bank has significantly strengthened its policies and procedures as part of an ongoing effort to ensure strict adherence to the law and the highest standards of ethical conduct," it said.

description.hltext_display: Qwest's CFO will move to Sprint Nextel
description.content:
/scriptJoseph Euteneuer has been Qwest's CFO since September 2008. if(requestedWidth 0)}
Sprint Nextel Corp. said its chief financial officer will retire soon, and the company will import Qwest's finance chief to replace him.
Sprint said Joseph Euteneuer will move over from Qwest when that company's merger with CenturyLink Inc. is completed. When that happens, current CFO Bob Brust will retire.
Brust had been CFO at Sprint since May 2008, before that spending 2000 to 2007 with Eastman Kodak Co., where he was also CFO.
Euteneuer was named CFO at Qwest in September 2008 after working as CFO from 2002 to 2008 for XM Satellite Radio Holdings, which merged into Sirius XM Radio Inc.
He also has held various management positions with Comcast Corp.
Euteneuer will be based at Sprint's corporate headquarters in Overland Park, Kan.
"Joe has an excellent reputation in the industry and has a strong background in a variety of financial disciplines, including finance and accounting, mergers and acquisitions, and financial operations," said Sprint chief executive Dan Hesse.
Sprint said in October that its third-quarter loss widened, missing analysts' forecasts, as the company saw its biggest net subscriber gain since 2006 but continued to lose postpaid customers.
Shares of Sprint were recently up 6 cents to $4.33. The stock has risen 19 percent this year.

event_or_fact.property: Joe has an excellent reputation in the industry and has a strong background in a variety of financial disciplines, including finance and accounting, mergers and acquisitions, and financial operations

description.hltext_display: ＜外交文書公開＞機密電報焼却痕跡 情報公開消極性浮き彫り
description.content:
毎日新聞12月22日（水）15時0分
外務省が作成・取得から３０年を経過した外交文書の原則公開を徹底してから今回で３回目。沖縄関係の機密電報の一部焼却の痕跡が見つかったことで、改めて同省の情報公開に対する消極姿勢が浮き彫りとなった。
また、同じファイルにつづられた「沖縄返還交渉機密漏洩事件」の文書がないことでは、担当者は「欠落と言い切れない」と釈明。所管課などが文書を適宜、分割統合する際に他のファイルに入れた可能性や同じ文書のコピーなので不要と判断して廃棄した可能性もあるという。
担当者は「変なことはしていない。操作せずにやっているためにおかしな結果になっているのだと思う。ファイルにつづられた文書をありのままに公開しているだけだ」と話した。
外交文書の公開制度は７５年１２月にスタートした。作成から３０年以上経過しても、公開されていない文書が約２万２０００冊もあり、３０年公開ルールは事実上、形骸化していた。このため、岡田克也前外相は今年５月、「外交記録公開に関する規則」を施行。外部有識者を含む「外交記録公開推進委員会」が仕分けし、外相が了承したものを自動公開することになった。
新規則で、同省は「文書をして語らしむ」との方針の下、記者への概要説明をやめている。その結果、十分な調査もされず、「焼却」の詳細や欠落の理由は不明だ。
ＮＰＯ法人情報公開クリアリングハウスの三木由希子理事は「一連の記録から一部だけ抜き取って廃棄することなど本来あり得ないし、やってはいけない。歴史的な意思決定過程が分からなくなる。文書の検証は研究者や報道機関の役目だが、外務省はそれを理由に説明の機会をなくしていいことにはならない」と指摘する。【内藤陽】

description.hltext_display: Microsoft Windows Phone 7: Two months in the open
description.author: staff
description.content:
It’s been a couple of months since the Windows Phone 7 platform made its debut and everyone concerned has been watching how it fares in the mobile OS wars. The Microsoft News Center had a word with Achim Berg, VP of business and marketing for Windows Phones, Microsoft, over the kind of response meeting Windows Phone 7.
Berg’s favorite way of describing a Windows Phone 7 handset is that ‘It’s a different kind of phone, fast and easy’. Microsoft has called devices using the platform as a ‘phone to save us from our phones’ and even launched the ‘Really’ advertisement campaigns poking fun at the amount of time users spend on smartphones. The sales figures are cited to have met the company’s expectations, though we could bet our socks that any marketing official is never going to say otherwise.
On the developer front, the tools provided for the platform are cited to make an easy job of creating games or apps for it. More than 4,000 apps currently populate the Windows Phone Marketplace. Manufacturers are said to have sold more than 1.5 million handsets in the initial six weeks itself. Speaking of phones running the OS, HTC is offering the Surround and the HD7, while Dell, Samsung and LG have unveiled the Venue Pro, the Focus and the Quantum, respectively.
Microsoft seems to have the first Windows Phone 7 update planned for sometime in the next couple of months. The company is also looking at introducing a wider range of devices with tags sporting various price points through phone manufacturers.

description.hltext_display: 2010年12月21日外交部发言人姜瑜举行例行记者会
description.content:
2010年12月21日，外交部发言人姜瑜主持例行记者会。
问：据俄罗斯媒体报道，中俄将于明年在日本海举行联合军演。请证实。这是否是中俄战略协作伙伴关系的一部分？第二个问题，白俄罗斯近日举行总统选举，但一些国家表示不承认选举结果。中方对选举结果有何评论？
答：近年来，为有效应对各种新威胁、新挑战，不断深化中俄两国战略协作伙伴关系，拓展两军全方位互利务实合作，中俄两军在双边和上海合作组织框架内举行了多次联合军事演习，提高了双方共同应对新威胁、新挑战的行动能力，为维护地区和世界的和平与稳定做出了积极贡献。
关于明年中俄联合军演，我不掌握这方面的具体情况。你可以向主管部门了解。
关于第二个问题，白俄罗斯总统选举是白俄罗斯的内部事务。我们尊重白俄罗斯人民的选择，希望白俄罗斯继续保持政治稳定、经济发展，希望两国全面友好合作关系不断巩固和加强。
问：温家宝总理刚刚结束了对印度和巴基斯坦的访问。请介绍访问成果。另据印度媒体报道，两国总理会谈期间谈及了克什米尔问题。中方是否认为该问题阻碍了中印关系发展？
答：正如你所说，温家宝总理刚刚结束对印度和巴基斯坦的正式访问。印巴两国都是南亚重要国家，也是我们的重要邻邦。中印、中巴关系发展对南亚、亚洲乃至世界和平与繁荣具有重要影响。温总理对印巴两国的友好访问内容丰富，成果丰硕，将增进中国与两国睦邻友好和互利合作、维护周边和平稳定和共同发展。
关于克什米尔问题，这是印巴之间的历史遗留问题。作为印度和巴基斯坦的邻国和共同的朋友，我们真诚希望两国通过对话协商，妥善解决这一问题。
问：上周，菲律宾旅游部长访问了香港，与特区政府就“人质事件”的后续处理工作进行了沟通。中央政府对此是否满意？
答：上周，菲律宾旅游部长访问了香港。根据香港特区政府通报，特区政府与菲方就“8·23人质事件”后续事宜进行了商谈并已达成一致，我们对此表示欢迎。我们希望有关措施尽快得到落实。
问：中欧经贸高层对话今天在北京举行，请介绍相关情况。
答：第三次中欧经贸高层对话今天在京举行。此次对话双方围绕宏观经济形势、贸易和投资、竞争、创新、海关合作等专题，进行了深入讨论，达成重要共识，取得了积极成果。
中欧经贸合作互利共赢，发展势头良好。双方一致认为，在当前全球经济缓慢复苏、不稳定不确定因素很多的情况下，双方应继续加强合作，努力促进中欧经济平稳健康发展，推动全球经济强劲、可持续、平衡增长。双方还就彼此关心的具体问题进行了坦诚沟通。
当前，中欧合作孕育着新的机遇，合作空间十分广阔。我们愿与欧方继续努力，增进理解，缩小分歧，挖掘潜力，共同培育新的合作亮点，推动中欧全面战略伙伴关系不断向前发展。
问：美国新墨西哥州州长理查森结束访朝后称，朝鲜表示愿接受国际原子能机构人员赴朝核查。中方对此有何评论？
答：我们注意到有关报道。中方一贯致力于实现半岛无核化。根据9.19共同声明，朝鲜有和平利用核能的权利，但同时必须接受国际原子能机构的保障监督。我们希望有关问题在六方会谈框架内处理。
问：美国新墨西哥州州长理查森访朝后，中方是否认为朝鲜半岛局势有所缓和？
答：我们支持美朝保持接触，希望有关接触有利于为重启六方会谈、妥善解决有关问题创造条件。
当前朝鲜半岛局势仍然复杂敏感。我们呼吁有关方保持冷静克制，采取负责任的态度，切实防止再次发生不幸事件。维护半岛和平稳定符合有关各方的共同利益。
中方希望有关各方积极互动，相向而行，尽快重启对话协商进程，在六方会谈框架下，根据各方达成的9·19共同声明的精神，平衡解决各方关切，为实现半岛无核化和长治久安作出共同努力。中方将一如既往，为此发挥建设性的作用。
问：俄罗斯驻华大使今天表示，俄方认为朝鲜半岛局势最危险的时刻已经过去。中方如何看待当前半岛局势？
答：当前朝鲜半岛局势仍然复杂敏感。我们呼吁有关方保持冷静、克制、理性，采取负责任的态度，缓解紧张、对立，推动局势走向缓和并重回对话谈判轨道。
各方应该认识到，枪炮武力不是解决朝鲜半岛问题的办法，对话谈判才是解决问题的正确途径。
问：请介绍落实《南海各方行为宣言》后续行动联合工作组会议相关情况。
答：中方与东盟国家于今天至12月23日在中国昆明举办落实《南海各方行为宣言》后续行动联合工作组第五次会议。我们期待各方就落实《南海各方行为宣言》后续行动指针有关内容达成共识，尽早实施各方共同确定的合作项目。
中方一贯高度重视并认真恪守《南海各方行为宣言》，以增进政治互信，推动南海合作，为最终解决有关双边争议创造有利条件，共同维护南海和平稳定。
问：据报道，一艘中国渔船与韩国海警执法艇发生冲撞。请介绍情况。中方是否担心该事件给当前半岛局势增添复杂因素？
答：首先我要指出，你提到的事件与当前半岛局势没有直接关系。
中方对这一事件表示严重关切，已向韩方提出严正交涉，要求韩方全力搜救我失踪船员，严惩肇事者，赔偿中方人员和财产损失，并采取切实措施杜绝类似事件再次发生。
中方有关部门高度重视对遇险船员的搜救和善后工作。事发后，有关部门立即组织附近渔船和专业救助船赶往搜救，韩方也出动直升机和救助船前往现场搜救。据了解，目前搜救工作仍在进行中。
问：关于中国渔船与韩国海警执法艇冲撞一事。你刚才说，中方要求韩方“严惩肇事者”。但有报道称是中国渔船在韩国水域冲撞了韩国海警执法艇。请证实。
答：我们认为，不管在什么海域，海警冲撞渔船、造成人员伤亡都是不应该发生的事情。事件发生在中韩渔业暂定措施水域，根据《中韩渔业协定》，两国渔船均可进入该水域作业，两国执法部门分别管理各自渔船，相互通报对方国家渔船违法行为，但无权登临对方国家渔船执法。
问：本周末，联合国安理会就朝鲜半岛局势举行了紧急磋商。有报道称，中国阻止安理会发表声明谴责朝鲜。请证实。你是否认为中方呼吁的六方会谈团长紧急磋商能于近期举行？
答：关于第一个问题，个别媒体的报道不符合实际情况。安理会12月19日紧急审议了半岛局势。中方支持俄罗斯倡议。安理会全体成员和朝鲜、韩国常驻联合国代表与会，并阐述了各自对半岛问题的看法和立场。包括中国、俄罗斯、美国在内的安理会成员为避免半岛再次发生武装冲突做出了努力，这是具有积极意义的。
当前半岛形势复杂敏感。我们希望安理会及时呼吁有关各方保持最大程度冷静克制，避免采取可能导致局势升级的举动，尽快恢复对话，通过和平方式解决问题。我们反对任何可能导致半岛局势进一步恶化升级、破坏地区和平稳定的行动。
中方秉承上述精神，以建设性的态度参加了安理会有关讨论，我们愿就此与有关各方继续保持沟通。
关于第二个问题，我们认为，没有沟通就没有信任，没有协商就不可能解决问题。对话并不意味着迁就任何一方，而是要各方共同承担起责任。当前半岛紧张形势进一步凸显了六方团长紧急磋商的必要性和紧迫性。
从我们与各方沟通情况看，大家总体上认同中方的立场和看法，只是在具体方法和步骤上还有一些不同的考虑。我们希望各方从维护东北亚和平稳定、推进半岛无核化的大局出发，认真研究中方建议，尽快作出积极回应。
问：据报道，美墨西哥州州长理查森今天结束对朝鲜的访问并过境北京。中方官员是否会与他接触？
答：我知道有媒体去机场采访理查森州长。据我了解，中方没有与他进行双边接触的安排。我刚才说过，中方支持美朝展开接触，希望有关接触能为重启六方会谈、妥善解决相关问题创造条件。

article.source: Ministry Foreign Affairs People's Republic China

description.hltext_display: TV: De ska göra det
description.content:
Truppen ska senare bantas till 16 spelare. I truppen finns inga större skrällar. Magnus Jernemyr plockas in för att stärka försvarsspelet och Kim Andersson är med trots stora skadeproblem. Sverige inleder VM mot Chile den 13 januari i Göteborg.
Målvakter: Dan Beutler, Flensburg, Mattias Andersson, Grosswallstadt, Johan Sjöstrand, Barcelona.
Vänstersexor: Jonas Källman, Real Ciudad, Fredrik Petersen, Bjerringbro.
Högersexor: Niclas Ekberg, Köpenhamn, Jan Lennartsson, Ålborg.
Mittsexor: Mattias Gustafsson, Lübbecke, Robert Arrhenius, Kiel, Tobias Karlsson, Flensburg, Magnus Jernemyr, Barcelona.
Vänsternior: Jonas Larholm, Ålborg, Kim Ekdahl du Rietz, Lugi, Fredrik Larsson, Aragon.
Mittnior: Dalibor Doder, Minden, Lukas Karlsson, Kolding.
Högernior: Kim Andersson, Kiel, Oscar Carlén, Flensburg.
